******* RECENTLY REDUCED FOR A QUICK SALE**********
4 BED, 3 BATH SEMI DETACHED TOWNHOUSE IN RIVIERA DEL SOL.
GOOD SIZE PRIVATE GARDEN WITH BARBEQUE AREA.
INDEPENDENT FULLY FITTED KITCHEN WITH MARBLE WORK TOPS
PANORAMIC SEA AND MOUNTAIN VIEWS FROM UPSTAIRS TERRACE
THIS WOULD MAKE A FANTASTIC FAMILY HOME OR A GOOD RENTAL INVESTMENT.
CLOSE TO GOLF AND AMENITIES.
URBANISATION HAS A GOOD SIZE SWIMMING POOL AND GARDENS.

Cortijo. 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms. Excellent Views
A detached country cortijo completely renovated throughout enjoying excellent country and mountain views.
The accommodation features a lounge/dining room with open fireplace, a fully fitted kitchen with built in appliances and air conditioning, 3 bedrooms, an en-suite bathroom, a family shower room and a small office.
The property has four terraces measuring approximately 123m2 plus a garden area.
Ideally situated only 1km from Triana and 3kms from Velez Malaga. The beach is only 10kms and the property has vehicle excellent access from a country road.

bank repossession
apartments. 2 Bedrooms. 1 Bathroom
Brand new two bedroom apartments featuring a fitted bathroom, lounge and kitchen.
Located within the beautiful white village of Periana, only 5 minutes from Lake Vinuela and 30 minutes from the beach.
Malaga airport is approx 50 minutes.

bank reposession
build Size 189m2
Independent Villa. 3 Bedrooms. 2 Bathrooms.Garage.
An independent villa located on a small urbanisation within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants.
This spacious property features a lounge/dining room, kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms.
The property also enjoys air conditioning and double gates leading to a drive and garage.
Only 5 minutes from Lake Vinuela and 20 minutes from the Beach. Malaga airport is a 50 minute drive.

bank reposession
apartment. One bedroom. Swimming pool. Sea Views
A third floor one bedroom apartment featuring a lounge, kitchen and bathroom and enjoying a communal swimming pool, tennis courts and sea views.
Located only 200 metres from the beach
Only 40 minutes from Malaga airport

Townhouse. 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. 500 metres from beach.
bank repossession
a spacious townhouse featuring three bedrooms, two bathrooms, lounge/dining room and a fitted kitchen.
Located within a quiet urbanization and enjoying a communal swimming pool.
Walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and the beach, 5 minutes to Baviera golf course and 40 minutes to Malaga airport.

bank repossession
renovation project.
Semi detached villa. 2 bedrooms. Swimming pool.
A semi detached villa set within an established urbanization featuring a swimming pool and views over the surrounding mountains and countryside.
The property requires major renovation work
Walking distance to bars and restaurants, 5 minutes to Lake Vinuela, 20 minutes to the beach and Baviera golf course and 45 minutes to Malaga airport.

bank repossession
townhouse. One bedroom. One Bathroom.
A one bedroom townhouse requiring updating located within the historical area of Velez Malaga near the fortress.
The property is in walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport and only 3kms from the beach and 40 minutes from Malaga airport.

bank repossession
brand new apartments only 200 metres from the beach.
One bedroom apartment 66,000 euros
2 bedroom apartment 81,000 euros.
Walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants, beach and public transport.
Only 40 minutes to Malaga airport.

bank repossession
townhouse. 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Historical Area. Excellent views.
A three bedroom townhouse featuring a lounge, kitchen, 2 bathrooms and a patio.
The property enjoys excellent views over Velez Malaga and the surrounding mountains and countryside.
Situated with the historical area of Velez Malaga close to the fortress.
Walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants and only 3kms from the beach and 40 minutes from Malaga airport

bank repossession.
3RD Floor Apartment. One bedroom. One bathroom.
Situated within the heart of Velez Malaga close to the Townhall and Plaza Carmelitas.
This spacious apartment is well presented throughout and easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. The beach and Baviera golf course are only 3kms and Malage airport is 35 minutes.

bank repossession
semi detached Country house. 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Terrace.
The property has many original features and requires renovation work.
Enjoying excellent country and mountain views.
Located approx 10 minutes from the Lake, 30 minutes from the beach and 55 minutes from Malaga airport.

bank repossession.
Townhouse. 4 Bedrooms. 4 Bathrooms
A spacious townhouse located on Anoreta golf course enjoying a lounge, kitchen, 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms.
Only 5 minute drive to the beach and 15 minutes to Malaga airport.

bank repossession.
Independent House. 3 Bedrooms.
Only 15 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport.

bank repossession
build Size 79.99m2
2 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms. Swimming pool. Garage. Store room
A third floor modern apartment featuring two bedrooms, two bathrooms, lounge and a kitchen.
The property also enjoys a balcony and communal swimming pool plus a garage and store room are included within the price.
Located within the picturesque white village of Alcaucin only 5 minutes from Lake Vinnuela, 25 minutes from the beach and 50 minutes from Malaga airport.

Town house, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, patio. Arranged as 2 independent apartments.
A light and spacious town house located in the historical center of Velez Malaga enjoying 3 double bedrooms and private patio.
The ground floor comprises of a spacious lounge, double bedroom, modern fitted shower room, fitted kitchen and a private patio. The first floor consists of a spacious lounge with patio doors leading onto the Juliet balcony, family bathroom, 2 double bedrooms and a kitchen .
The property also has a roof terrace but requires a staircase.
Perfectly located in the historical center of Velez Malaga, within easy walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 5 minutes' drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 35 minutes' drive to Malaga airport.

Village House. 2 bedrooms. 1 bathroom. Patio. Excellent views.
A Spanish townhouse situated in a picturesque white village enjoying 2 double bedrooms and a patio with village, countryside and distant sea views.
The property consists of 2 double bedrooms, fitted kitchen with patio doors leading onto the patio, family bathroom, spacious lounge featuring patio doors leading onto the front patio enjoying village, country and distant sea views plus out buildings which could be converted to create two additional bedrooms or a self-contained apartment.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 10 minutes' drive to the beach and Anoreta golf course and 25 minutes' drive to Malaga airport.

Town house, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, roof terrace, garage.
A well-presented town house enjoying 4 double bedrooms, integral garage and a spacious roof terrace with surrounding village and countryside views.
The ground floor consists of an entrance hall, spacious lounge/dining room featuring an open fire place, family bathroom with shower, fully fitted kitchen , double bedroom, utility room with stairs leading down to spacious 3 car integral garage. The first floor comprises of a family bathroom, 3 double bedrooms, master bedroom enjoying fitted wardrobes and patio doors leading onto a Juliet balcony with village views, landing with patio doors leading onto the spacious roof terrace with excellent village and mountain views.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 15 minutes' drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and 35 minutes' drive to Malaga airport.

Detached villa, 3 Bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, conservatory, Swimming pool, garage
Fantastic Sea and coastal views.
A well-presented detached villa on a corner plot within walking distance to the port, beach and Baviera Golf course.
The property consists of 3 double bedrooms, master bedroom enjoying fitted wardrobes and an en suite bathroom with corner Jacuzzi/bath, fully fitted kitchen/breakfast room, family bathroom with shower, spacious lounge/dining room featuring a wood burning stove, air conditioning unit and patio doors leading into the conservatory with patio doors to the garden with swimming pool, outdoor shower, landscaped gardens and stunning sea and coastline views
The property also enjoys double glazed windows, solar panels for heating water, garage and out buildings for storage.
Perfectly situated within walking distance to bars, shops, restaurants, the beach and Baviera golf course and only 30 minutes from Malaga airport.

Build Size.142m2 Plot Size.5,714m2 5 bedrooms. 3 bathrooms. Swimming pool. Workshop. Bar/entertainment room. A detached 4 bedroom country house beautifully renovated throughout with beautiful countryside and mountain views. The accommodation features:- A large farmhouse style modern fitted kitchen/dining room with built in appliances and exposed beamwork to ceiling, a music room/bedroom 5, a study area with french doors leading into a beautiful lounge/dining room with wood burning stove and french doors leading out onto the garden and a ground floor bathroom. The first floor enjoys a master bedroom with ensuite shower room and door leading onto a first floor terrace with spectacular views, two additional double bedrooms; one of which features a large walk in dressing room plus a single bedroom. The first floor also features a family bathroom with corner bath. The property has air conditioning units throughout plus enjoys high vaulted ceilings with exposed beams. To the front of the property there is a covered terrace. The main garden features an 8m x 4m swimming pool and a bar/entertainment room with terrace above. There is also a spacious brick built workshop. The property is situated approx 12 minutes from Comares, 15 minutes from Rio Gordo, 25 minutes from Benamargosa, 40 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. Access is via a track, accessible in all vehicles and approx a 5 minute drive from the road. This idyllic country retreat obtains an excellent rental income for those looking for a "Home and Income". The property generates 895 uk stirling per week High Season. 548 uk stirling per week mid season. 398 uk stirling per week low season.

Town house, 4 bedrooms, front patio, roof terrace, breathtaking views.
A well-presented town house enjoying four bedrooms, a spacious front patio and first floor terraces with beautiful views of the surrounding white pueblo and countryside.
The ground floor consists of spacious front patio with beautiful village and countryside views, front door leading into a spacious lounge/dining room with air conditioning, a fully fitted kitchen with built in appliances, single bedroom currently used as an office and a cloak room with w/c. The first floor comprises of a family bathroom with walk in shower, patio doors in the hall way opening onto the roof terrace with stunning country side and village views, 2 double bedrooms and 1 single, master bedroom enjoying air conditioning, an en suite bathroom with walk in shower and patio door leading onto a separate terrace with stunning views.
The property also features an under build storage room and solar panels for heating the hot water.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 20 minutes drive from the beach and Baviera golf course and only 40 minutes drive from Malaga airport.
Viewing highly recommended to appreciate the sensational views, size and standard of this excellent village house

A spacious townhouse featuring three bedrooms, a modern fitted bathroom, lounge, spacious kitchen/diner, utility area and a roof terrace with two additional storage rooms and enjoying excellent town, mountain and countryside views.
Ideally located within the historic area of Velez Malaga near to the fortress and only 3kms from Baviera Golf course and the beach at Torre del Mar.
Malaga airport is only a 40 minute drive.

Penthouse Apartment. 2nd Floor. 3 bedrooms. 45 m2 terrace. Fantastic Views.
A modern penthouse apartment, built only 8 year ago, featuring an entrance hallway, guest cloakroom with w.c and wash hand basin, large lounge/dining room with air conditioning and patio doors onto the 45m2 terrace with fantastic town and mountain views, a master bedroom with built in wardrobes, modern fitted family bathroom enjoying a Jacuzzi bath, 2nd bedroom with built in wardrobes and bedroom 3 with patio door onto the terrace. The independent modern fitted kitchen features built in appliances plus has a patio door onto the terrace.
The property is offered in excellent decorative order throughout and situated only 500 metres from the beach.
Bars, shops, restaurants and public transport are all within easy level walking distance.
Baviera golf course is only 1km and Malaga airport is a 40 minute drive.
Viewing highly recommended to appreciate the standard and superb views.
Furniture negotiable.
Community fees 65 euros per month.

Detached Villa. 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Garage. Swimming Pool.
Spectacular Views.
Build Size 129m2 plus 19m2 Garage. 677 m2 Plot Size
The accommodation features an entrance hallway with store room, lounge/dining room with fireplace and patio doors to the covered sun terrace and rear garden, modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances and door to rear garden, master bedroom with built in wardrobes and patio doors overlooking the swimming pool plus an en-suite shower room, two additional double bedrooms and a family shower room.
The gardens are easy to maintain and completely enclosed featuring a swimming pool with toilet and outdoor shower facilities, large terraced areas plus a detached garage which could be modified to create independent guest accommodation.
Air conditioning throughout.
This west facing property enjoys excellent mountain and countryside views plus superb sunsets.
Walking distance to the beautiful white village of Vinuela, full of bars, shops, restaurants, a medical centre and only 5 minutes from Lake Vinuela, 20 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from the airport.
Furniture negotiable.
A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the size, standard, location
and breathtaking views.

Luxurious Country House. 7 bedrooms. 4 bathrooms. Garage. Swimming Pool.
Spectacular Sea views.
exclusive agent
a detached country house, beautifully renovated and extended throughout, retaining all the original charm and features whilst incorporating a stylish Moroccan theme.
The ground floor accommodation features a well fitted modern kitchen with granite work tops and built in appliances, a dining area leading through to the lounge area with wood burning stove, a double bedroom with en suite shower room, additional double bedroom with potential to create an en suite by converting store room, an internal hallway with stairs leading up to :-
The first floor accommodation featuring a master bedroom with en-suite, dressing room and French doors onto a spacious balcony with superb sea views, an additional double bedroom with en-suite and access onto the balcony, plus another double bedroom with en-suite shower room.
An independent building measuring 40m2 is currently used as a store room/utility room and an office. These rooms could easily be modified to create two studio apartments/ guest suites.
To the front of the main property is a large covered terrace enjoying the breathtaking sea views creating ample shaded area for an outdoor lounge and al fresco dining. There is a well equipped outdoor kitchen plus numerous private terraces creating additional dining/relaxation areas.
The Moroccan style swimming pool measures 48m2 and is surrounded by terraced areas and lead to a covered terrace with Moroccan arches and a door to the garage measuring 22m2.
The rear of the property is enclosed by brick walls with solid rustic style wooden doors giving individual access to the main house and to the independent building.
Additional features include high ceilings, large wooden shuttered windows with mosquito nets, air conditioning throughout, light and spacious rooms.
Access is via a country road accessible in any vehicle.
Located only 20 minutes from the beach and Anoreta golf course and 30 minutes from Malaga airport.
A fantastic country retreat enjoying spectacular sea and country views.
The property offers numerous possibilities to create a home and income.
Due to location and the tranquillity of the area, the property would be ideal to create a yoga retreat/ mindfullness centre, to create a bed and breakfast business or to attract an excellent rental income.
A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the views and individuality of the stunning property.

Detached Villa, 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, swimming pool, garage.
A well presented 5 bedroom detached villa perfectly situated only 5 minutes walk to the beach.
The ground floor consist of entrance hall, modern fully fitted kitchen, 3 double bedroom all enjoying fitted wardrobes, ceiling fans and air conditioning units, family bathroom with walk in shower, spacious lounge with open fire place, air conditioning unit and patio doors leading onto terrace overlooking the garden and swimming pool The lower level comprises of 2 bedrooms, a single and a double bedroom with air conditioning units, ceiling fans, cloak room with W/C, shower room, spacious lounge with open fire place and patio doors leading onto the rear patio, lawn area, outdoor kitchen with bbq, swimming pool and outdoor shower.
The property also features electric shutters on all windows, double glazed windows and a double garage.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops bars and restaurants, only a 5 minute walk to the beach , port and Baviera golf course and only 35 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Granada city centre, Town house, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom
A well located town house enjoying 2 double bedrooms, located in Granada city centre.
The ground floor consist of, lounge featuring patio door leading onto front communal patio, fully fitted kitchen with gas hob with extractor over, family bathroom featuring panel bath. The first floor comprises of two double bedrooms.
Ideally located in Granada city centre, within walking distance to shops bars and restaurants, only 10 minutes walk to Albaicin and the Alhambra palace, only 10 minutes drive to Granada airport and 20 minutes drive to sierra Nevada ski resort.

Detached Villa. 5 bedrooms 3 bathrooms. Swimming Pool.
Spectacular coastal and sea views.
A well presented two storey detached villa, set only 5 minutes from the white village of Moclinejo, enjoying breathtaking sea, coast and mountain views
The property features:
Ground floor accommodation.
A spacious lounge /dining room with fireplace and patio doors with sea views opening onto a covered terrace, a modern fitted kitchen, a double bedroom/office and a downstairs shower room.
First floor accommodation features:-
Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and patio doors onto a balcony with sea views, a family bathroom, 3 double bedrooms each with private balconies.
Stairs from the first floor landing lead to:-
The utility area and room terrace with fantastic sea, mountains and countryside views. A spiral staircase leads to another terrace with 360 degree views over the coastline to Nerja and Malaga, the white village of Moclinejo and surrounding mountains and countryside.
The gardens are easy to maintain with picturesque displays of mature flowers trees and shrubs. Attractive sun terraces are elevated to achieve superb views whilst dining al fresco, sunbathing and from the infinity swimming pool. Below the swimming pool are two storage rooms and a pump house plus a water deposit.
Access is via a track accessible in all vehicles approx a 5 minute drive from the village. The beach is only 20 minutes drive, Anoreta golf course only 10 minutes and Malaga airport is approx 35 minutes.
The current owners are successfully renting the property for holiday lets and achieve 1600 euros per week high season and 900 euros per week low season.

Very spacious family home located in the popular area of La Cala Hills.
The detached villa offers 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 1 of them ensuite to the master bedroom. Large lounge and dining area, fully fitted kitchen and separate utility room. The villa is on a plot of 680m2 with large wrap around garden and private pool. Electric gates to the front of the property with off road parking for 2 cars. Marble floors, hot and cold air conditioning throughout, fully fitted wardrobes in all bedrooms, built in safe, alarm system fitted.
Would make a great family home! Close to all local amenities, school, sports centre, bars and restaurants and only 5 minutes drive to Fuengirola and the village of La Cala de Mijas with its beautiful sandy beaches.

Renovation Project
Town house, 3 bedrooms, 1.5 bathrooms
A well located town house enjoying 3 double bedrooms, property requires renovating.
The ground floor consists of, spacious lounge featuring cloak room with w/c, kitchen, double bedroom. The first floor comprise of 2 double bedrooms featuring high wooden beamed ceilings, family bathroom with shower and high wooden beamed ceilings.
The property has mains water, electric and sewage
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 25 minutes drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 45 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Town house, 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, patio, roof terrace
A well located town house enjoying 3 double bedrooms, private patio and a roof terrace with stunning town, mountain and country side views.
The ground floor consists of an entrance hall, lounge featuring an open fire place and wooden beamed ceiling, fitted kitchen with patio doors leading onto a private patio with an out building and stairs leading up to a double bedroom and roof terrace with stunning town, mountain and countryside views, family bathroom with panel bath. The 1st floor comprises of 2 double bedrooms with high wooden beamed ceilings.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops bars and restaurants, only 35 minutes drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 55 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Town house, 4 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, patio
A well located townhouse enjoying 4 double bedrooms with wooden beamed ceilings and a private patio.
The ground floor consists of a lounge featuring wooden beamed ceiling and open fire place, 2 double bedrooms also with wooden beamed ceilings, family bathroom with shower, kitchen with patio doors leading onto private patio. The first floor comprises of a spacious landing, 2 double bedrooms, master bedroom enjoying wooden beamed ceilings and patio doors leading onto a Juliet balcony with stunning views.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops bars and restaurants, only 35 minutes drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 55 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Townhouse 3 bedrooms. 3 bathrooms. west facing terrace. Garage.
A beautifully presented modern townhouse set only 200 metres from the beach.
The property features
Ground floor accommodation.
A spacious lounge/dining room, downstairs cloakroom with w/c, modern fitted kitchen leading onto a rear terrace.
First floor accommodation features
Three double bedrooms and a modern fitted bathroom.
Second floor has been converted into a potential 4th bedroom/playroom.
Garage. Stairs from the property leads down to the garage which is fully tiled with a shower room, fitted kitchen area, additional built in storage cupboards and a window providing natural light.
Could easily be modified into additional living accommodation if required.
To the front of the property is a private garden/patio.
Ideally located only 200 metres from the beach, 5 minutes from Baviera golf club and 35 minutes from Malaga airport.

Country house, 4 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, Sea Views.
A well presented 4 bedroom country house enjoying stunning sea and costal town views.
The property comprises of a lounge featuring open fire place and patio door leading onto the front patio with bbq area, 3 spacious double bedrooms, fully fitted kitchen, family bathroom with shower, a rear covered patio enjoying stunning sea and costal town views, an out building currently used as guest spare bedroom and an under build with store room leading into an internal patio.
The property also enjoys a terraced vegetable patch, various fruit trees, mature shrubs, plants plus has an irrigation system.
Ideally located only 5 minutes drive to shops, bars and restaurants, only 15 minutes drive to the coast and Baviera golf course and only 35 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Apartment 3rd floor, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, balcony, roof terrace and spectacular views.
A well presented 3rd floor apartment enjoying 2 double bedrooms and spacious roof terrace with stunning sea, mountain, lake and country side views.
The apartment comprises of spacious lounge featuring patio doors leading onto a Juliet balcony with stunning town, mountain and countryside views, fully fitted kitchen, family bathroom with panel bath, 2 double bedrooms, master bedroom enjoying patio doors leading onto a terrace with beautiful mountain and countryside views.
The property also enjoys a communal roof terrace with stunning 360ordm; views of lake, countryside, mountain and sea views.
Sold Fully furnished.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 35 minutes drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 50 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Town house, 4 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, patio
A traditional Spanish townhouse enjoying 4 double bedrooms featuring high wooden beamed ceilings and a private patio.
The ground floor consists of a lounge with open fire place, fitted kitchen with patio doors leading onto a private patio with an outbuilding and separate entrance onto a rear street and a family bathroom with shower. The first floor comprises of 4 double bedrooms, all featuring high wooden beamed ceilings.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars, banks and restaurants, only 35 minutes drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 45 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Town house, 3bedrooms, 1 bathroom, roof terrace
A well presented townhouse featuring 3 double bedrooms and a spacious roof terrace with stunning town, countryside and mountain views.
The property consists of a lounge with open fire place, separate dining room, fully fitted kitchen, family bathroom with panel bath, 3 double bedrooms, master bedroom featuring patio doors leading onto the roof terrace and bbq area and stairs leading up to further roof terrace with stunning town, countryside and mountain views.
Ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, only 35 minutes drive to the beach and Baviera golf course and only 55 minutes drive to Malaga airport.

Fantastic 2 bedroom apartment - Miraflores
Beautifully refurbished, ready to move in!! Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom top floor apartment in the very popular Miraflores. Only a few minutes walk to the new boardwalk and beach.
Completely refurbished to a very high standard, closed terrace with glass curtains offering views to the sea. Air conditioning throughout, 2 brand new shower rooms, new sliding interior doors, comes fully furnished with fully fitted kitchen.
This property comes with rentals for 2016 and the present owner can also pass over details for rentals into 2017 if needed. This property would make a great investment for a holiday rental property or beautiful permanent home.
Secure complex with beautiful communal pool and garden areas, pool bar and close to all local amenities, parking to the front of the property.
Must be seen!!!

Fantastic investment to build.
Plot of land 2.725m2 with a co efficiency to build of 45%. The land currently has a valid building licence to construct 7 luxury townhouses on the land. All has south, southwest panoramic sea views. There is also another project to build 5 bespoke independent, very modern villas on the plot of land. It has access from the road, water, electricity and sewage already laid and building can start from tomorrow. We have all documentation in the office for potential investors to revise.

Village House .2 bedrooms. 1 bathroom. Store room. Patios.
A village house situated within a quiet street featuring a lounge/dining room, two double bedrooms with vaulted ceilings, fitted shower room and a fitted kitchen.
To the front of the property there is an enclosed patio. To the rear there is a private courtyard /patio leading to a store room.
Situated within walking distance to shops, bars, banks, restaurants, medical centre and the village swimming pool.
Only a 20 minute drive to the beach and 45 minutes to Malaga airport.

XL1046 Price reduced ! Original price 319,000€ Now priced at €279,990€! These 3 bedroom town houses included a third floor and a basement of 49m2 are built to a very high specification, located within Laura Golf, a 27 hole golf course. Fantastic selection of apartments, duplex apartments and townhouses built to a very high specification located within Laura Golf, a 27 hole golf course. All the properties enjoy double glazing, fully installed air conditioning, beautifully fitted kitchens with built in electrical appliances, communal gardens and swimming pool plus a garage. Perfectly located in the Guadalhorce valley and only 15 minutes from Malaga airport and 10 minutes from the beach. Laura golf enjoys spectacular views over the surrounding countryside and mountains. Laura golf not only boasts an excellent course but also features an equestrian centre, lawn bowls, bars and restaurants plus paddle tennis. There are numerous designs and styles to choose from plus options to choose a private garden, corner terrace or front line golf views. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate. En trámite / Pending

XL1045 Prices reduced! Original Price 195,000€ Now Price at 159,990€ ! Size from 105m2 Fantastic selection of apartments, duplex apartments and townhouses built to a very high specification located within Laura Golf, a 27 hole golf course. All the properties enjoy double glazing, fully installed air conditioning, beautifully fitted kitchens with built in electrical appliances, communal gardens and swimming pool plus a garage. Perfectly located in the Guadalhorce valley and only 15 minutes from Malaga airport and 10 minutes from the beach. Laura golf enjoys spectacular views over the surrounding countryside and mountains. Laura golf not only boasts an excellent course but also features an equestrian centre, lawn bowls, bars and restaurants plus paddle tennis. There are numerous designs and styles to choose from plus options to choose a private garden, corner terrace or front line golf views. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate. En trámite / Pending

XL1056 Featuring an entrance hallway, lounge, three bedrooms, fitted kitchen and a shower room. The property enjoys an enclosed private courtyard with a water well plus additional storerooms, which could be renovated to create additional living accommodation. Stairs lead to a large roof terrace with storeroom, enjoying views over Velez Malaga. The property is perfectly located in lower Velez-Malaga, within the historical area, close to the Municipal market and within level walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants, banks and public transport. The beach at Torre del Mar is only 3kms and Malaga airport is only 40 minutes drive. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate. En trámite / Pending

XL1093 This well presented apartment offers a spacious lounge/ dining room with patio door access to the terrace, a modern fully fitted kitchen with appliances, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en-suite bathroom and a separate family bathroom. The apartment also enjoys a communal swimming pool, gardens and includes a private garage. Air-con/heating is available throughout. Within walking distance to the beach, shops, bars and restaurants and only 40 minutes from Malaga airport. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate. En trámite / Pending
desc.es: XL1093 Este apartamento tiene un espacioso salón comedor con acceso directo a la terraza / patio, con una cocina moderna completamente equipada, con electrodomésticos. Tiene 2 dormitorios dobles con armarios empotrados y un dormitorio principal con armarios empotrados y baño en suite, además del cuarto de baño familiar separado. El apartamento disfruta de piscina comunitaria, jardines y garaje pripado. Tienen Aire Acondicionado / bomba de calor. Muy cerca de la playa, tiendas, bares y restaurantes, a tan solo 40 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. Calificación energética en trámite

desc.en: XL1096 Community fees 30 euros/month A beautifully presented modern duplex apartment perfectly located only 15 metres from the beach! The accommodation on the lower floor features a lounge, modern fitted kitchen and cloakroom with toilet. The upper floor enjoys two bedrooms, a modern fitted bathroom and a balcony leading to the roof terrace. Situated only 10 minutes from Baviera golf course and 40 minutes from Malaga airport. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate. En trámite / Pending

XL484 An extremely large townhouse featuring 5 bedrooms, two bathrooms, two kitchens, lounge and dining room. The house is currently divided into two properties with two separate entrances. The property also enjoys a large roof terrace, patio, balcony and Jacuzzi bath. Excellent property for two families or to create a home and income. Located 5 minutes from the beach, 5 minutes to the autovia and 45 minutes to Malaga airport.

XL850 A detached three bedroom country cortijo situated within a mainly flat plot measuring approx 6,000m2. The property although dated, is liveable and consists of three bedrooms, a lounge, kitchen, outside bathroom plus two further rooms that could be renovated to create further living accommodation. To the front of the property there is a sun terrace and to the rear an enclosed courtyard. The surrounding land is mainly flat and usable. There are numerous fruit trees and vines and pleasant views over the surrounding countryside. The village of Triana is approx 4km along a good drivable track and access from Lake Vinuela is approx 1.5km and the majority of the track has been made into a road.

XL838 An extremely spacious village house located at the foot of the ancient fortress and enjoying stunning sea, and surrounding town and country views. The property features a large lounge/dining room, downstairs cloakroom, modern fitted kitchen. First floor comprises of a fitted bathroom and three bedrooms. The second floor has an additional double bedroom plus a spacious roof terrace with excellent views. A utility room and storage room lead from the terrace. Excellent vehicle access/parking to the property.

XL345 A rustic country house that has undergone complete renovation throughout comprising of three bedrooms, master bedroom with en-suite, family bathroom, lounge/dining room with open fireplace and separate kitchen. Two sun terraces. The property is situated within a plot measuring approx 1,000m2 with space for pool. Fantastic country views. Approached via a track measuring approx 3km. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate.
En trámite / Pending

XL114 Reduced ! Three properties located within a small hamlet close to Comares. Two semi detached properties connected via integral door but easily segregated. Rear patio leading to garden area of approx 1,000 m2 with superb views of surrounding countryside and mountains. Space for pool. In front of the property is a two storey property with garage and further garden area. Excellent opportunity to create a home and income with letting units. Price recently reduced! Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate. En trámite / Pending

XL579 A 3 bedroom detached house located within the centre of Benamargosa. The property features a large entrance hallway with stairs leading to first floor. The accommodation comprises of a lounge, dining room leading to front sun balcony, fully fitted kitchen/ breakfast room, three double bedrooms, fitted bathroom, rear sun balcony plus two internal patios. Property is sold fully furnished. The garage on the ground floor measures 100m2 and could easily be modified to create a seperate apartment. This property is mortgageable. Una casa de pueblo con 3 dormitorios, salon, comedor, cocina mueblado y un baño. Garaje de 100m2 La casa tiene luz, agua y una hipoteca. Calificación energética / Energy Performance Certificate.
En trámite / Pending

A semi detached country house requiring complete renovation throughout. The property features two rooms on the ground floor plus a small staircase leading to an additional room above. The lower tier features a 10m x 5m swimming pool with attractive terraced surround and shower. The garden also enjoys a selection of mature trees, flowers and shrub borders. The garage located at the rear of the garden leads to a large additional storage area. Additional parking is available in front of the garage. A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the location, breathtaking views and standard of this spacious family home.
