La piscina cuenta con un gran patio con una ducha al aire libre y zona de bar para el entretenimiento. Unos escalones de la parte delantera a la trasera conducen a un patio superior con unas excelentes vistas al mar . La planta baja cuenta con un garaje para dos coches . Perfectamente situado a poca distancia de la playa y a sólo 5 minutos en coche de Torre del Mar, a 10 minutos de Añoreta y Baviera campos de golf y a 35 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. Se recomienda visitar su interior para apreciar su tamaño y calidades, así como el diseño de esta lujosa vivienda con orientación sur.

desc.en: A very well presented 3 bedroom town house ideally located at the picturesque white village of Canillas de Aceituno, enjoying superb country and mountain views from the terraces. The ground floor features a lounge with fireplace, a dining room, a modern fitted kitchen, shower room and one double bedroom. The first floor features 2 bedrooms, 1 shower room, 2 terraces and a balcony. The terrace enjoys far reaching views overlooking the beautiful surrounding mountains and countryside. The property is tastefully decorated, with a rustic look which fits perfectly with the style of the area. Viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the quality and style of this charming townhouse. Approximately 110 m2 build. Only 35 minutes from the beach of Torre del Mar and about an hour from Malaga airport.
desc.es: Bonita casa de pueblo situada en el pintoresco pueblo de Canillas de Aceituno, con unas magníficas vistas del pueblo, las montañas y el campo de alrededor. En la planta baja, consta de salón-comedor, cocina, baño y un dormitorio y en la planta superior tiene 2 dormitorios, un baño, 2 terrazas y un balcón. Tiene una decoración muy cuidada, con todo tipo de detalles, bajo un aspecto rústico, que encaja perfectamente con el entorno. Aproximadamente 110 m2 construidos. A tan sólo 35 minutos de la playa de Torre del Mar y a una hora aproximadamente del aeropuerto de Málaga.

desc.en: A very well presented 3 bedroom town house ideally located at the picturesque white village of Canillas de Aceituno, enjoying superb country and mountain views from the terraces. The ground floor features a lounge with fireplace, a dining room, a modern fitted kitchen, shower room and one double bedroom. The first floor features 2 bedrooms, 1 shower room, 2 terraces and a balcony. The terrace enjoys far reaching views overlooking the beautiful surrounding mountains and countryside. The property is tastefully decorated, with a rustic look which fits perfectly with the style of the area. The property has a basement with an approximate area of 70 m2. The basement area has permission to build a totally independent 2 bedroomed apartment because it has direct access to the adjoining street. The apartment will be ideal for guests or for rental possibility, creating the chance for extra income. Viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the quality and style of this charming townhouse. Approximately 165 m2 build including the basement. Only 35 minutes from the beach of Torre del Mar and about an hour from Malaga airport.
desc.es: Bonita casa de pueblo situada en el pintoresco pueblo de Canillas de Aceituno, con unas magníficas vistas del pueblo, las montañas y el campo de alrededor. En la planta baja, consta de salón-comedor, cocina, baño y un dormitorio y en la planta superior tiene 2 dormitorios, un baño, 2 terrazas y un balcón. Tiene una decoración muy cuidada, con todo tipo de detalles, bajo un aspecto rústico, que encaja perfectamente con el entorno. En el sótano tiene un espacio en bruto de unos 70 m2 aproximadamente, donde podría realizarse un apartamento de dos dormitorios independiente, ya que tiene acceso directo por la calle contigua, ideal para invitados o bien para su explotación en alquiler lo que le permitirá obtener unos ingresos extra. Aproximadamente 165 m2 construidos incluyendo el sótano. A tan sólo 35 minutos de la playa de Torre del Mar y a una hora aproximadamente del aeropuerto de Málaga.

desc.en: A two bedroom townhouse located within the historic area of Velez Malaga near to the fortress. The property has been completely renovated internally and features a modern fitted kitchen, modern fitted shower room, lounge with air conditioning unit, master bedroom with built in wardrobes and access to an adjoining room with air conditioning unit which could be used as either a dressing room or a second single bedroom. Walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants and 10 minutes drive from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. excellent price! priced to sell quickly.
desc.es: Casa de pueblo de dos dormitorios situada en el casco antiguo de Vélez-Málaga, cerca del Castillo. La vivienda ha sido completamente reformada por dentro y consta de una cocina moderna, equipada, un cuarto de baño moderno, Salón con aire acondicionado, dormitorio principal con armarios empotrados y acceso a una habitación anexa con aire acondicionado, que puede utilizarse tanto como vestidor o como dormitorio secundario. Muy cerca de tiendas, bares y restaurantes, a 10 minutos en coche de la playa y a 45 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. tiene un excelente precio, urge venta!

desc.en: now reduced from 79,500 euros An extremely spacious 4 bedroom house located in a sought after area in lower Velez Malaga within easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. The property features an entrance hallway, large lounge, separate dining room, kitchen, shower room, 4 bedrooms and utility room. The lounge leads onto a private rear terrace and spacious rear garden with outbuildings. The property is approx 150 years old and boasts many original features including beamwork to ceilings and French doors with Juliet balconies. Only 10 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. Property requires updating throughout.
desc.es: Una casa muy espaciosa de 4 dormitorios situada en una zona muy demandada en la parte baja de Vélez Málaga, muy cerca de tiendas, bares, restaurantes y transporte público. La vivienda se compone de hall de entrada, un gran salón con comedor separado, cocina, cuarto de baño, 4 dormitorios, y trastero. El salón conduce a una terraza trasera privada y a un espacioso jardín trasero con dependencias. Tiene más de 150 años de antigüedad, y mantiene muchas de las características originales como son los techos con vigas, puertas francesas y balcones tipo Julieta. A tan sólo 10 minutos de la playa y a 45 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga La vivienda necesita reforma.

desc.en: A beautifully presented three bedroom village house located within the picturesque white village of Comares enjoying excellent views. The property has been renovated throughout to a high standard and features an entrance hall way, a split level dining room leading through to the lounge with fireplace housing a wood burning fire and an ornate archway leads through to the rustic style fitted kitchen. The property also features three spacious bedrooms, a fitted shower room, a separate cloakroom plus a roof terrace with excellent mountain and countryside views. The property enjoys exposed beam work to the ceilings, terracotta floor tiles, wooden windows with shutters and a rustic fitted kitchen. An internal viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the charm and character of this beautiful village house. Only 35 minutes from Torre del Mar and Baviera Golf course and one hour from Malaga airport.
desc.es: Preciosa casa de pueblo de tres dormitorios, situada en el pintoresco pueblo blanco de Comares, disfrutando de unas excelentes vistas. La vivienda ha sido renovada con un alto estándar de calidad, y tiene un hall de entrada, comedor en dos alturas, que conduce al salón con chimenea, donde un arco ornamental, conduce a la cocina completamente equipada, en estilo rústico. La vivienda tiene 3 espaciosos dormitorios, cuarto de baño y aseo, además de una terraza en la azotea con unas excelentes vistas a la montaña y al campo. Los techos de la vivienda son de vigas de madera a la vista, el suelo es de terracota, y las ventanas con persianas de madera, lo que hace que todo mantenga un estilo rústico, acorde con el mobiliario de la cocina. Recomendamos visitarla para apreciar su carácter y calidez así como la calidad de esta bonita y acogedora casa de pueblo. A tan sólo 35 minutos de Torre del Mar y Baviera Golf, y a una hora del aeropuerto de Málaga.

desc.en: A beautifully presented brand new ground floor apartment featuring two bedrooms, modern kitted kitchen with access to a private patio , modern fitted bathroom, separate shower room and a spacious lounge/ dining room. Perfectly located near the sports centre and village swimming pool. The property also benefits from pre installation for air conditioning, double glazed windows and built to a high specification throughout.
desc.es: Apartamento de nueva construcción en planta baja, con dos dormitorios, cocina, cuarto de baño, salón comedor, aseo y acceso a patio privado. Con una ubicación perfecta, cerca del polideportivo y la piscina municipal. La vivienda tiene preinstalación de aire acondicionado y doble acristalamiento. Ha sido construida con un alto estándar de calidad.

desc.en: A beautifully presented three bedroom link detached house located within the picturesque village of Los Iberos, only 5 minutes drive from the beach. The property has been renovated throughout to a high standard and features a covered front terrace with access to the ground floor accommodation: a modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances and a separate dining area, lounge with pellet fire and ground floor bedroom. The first floor accommodation enjoys a modern fitted bathroom and two double bedrooms. The master bedroom leads onto the first floor terrace with sea and countryside views. The property also enjoys a private garden which is completely enclosed. A large metal gate creates access to park a car and the garden has displays of flowers and shrubs, a free standing swimming pool and a utility/storage room. A rare opportunity to find a village property with a private garden and parking! An internal viewing is highly recommended. Only 10 minutes from Torre del Mar, Baviera Golf and Añoreta golf courses and 40 minutes from Malaga airport.
desc.es: Bonita villa de tres dormitorios, situada en el pintoresco pueblo de Los Iberos, a tan sólo 5 minutos en coche de la playa. La vivienda ha sido reformada , con un alto estándar de calidad. Tiene una terraza frontal cubierta, con acceso a la planta baja donde se encuentra una cocina moderna completamente equipada con armarios, y comedor independiente, salón con chimenea de pellets y dormitorio en planta baja. La primera planta disfruta de un cuarto de baño completo y dos dormitorios dobles. El dormitorio principal conduce a la terraza de la primera planta con vistas al campo y vistas al mar. La vivienda también disfruta de un jardín privado completamente cercado. Tiene una puerta metálica que dá accesso al parking y al jardín, con flores, arbustos, con piscina y un trastero/almacén. ¡Es una oportunidad inusual de encontrar una vivienda en el pueblo con jardín y parking privado!. ¡Recomendamos visitarla! A tan sólo 10 minutos de Torre del Mar, Baviera Golf y Añoreta Golf, y a 40 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga.

desc.en: Build size 111m2 plus 52m2 detached chalet. Plot Size 2177m2. Detached Villa. 4 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Swimming pool. Plus Detached Chalet. 3 bedrooms. 1 Bathroom. Small pool. A beautifully presented detached villa plus a detached chalet, ideally situated within breathtaking countryside with excellent vehicle access. The main house features a lounge with fireplace, dining area, well fitted kitchen, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, a conservatory with utility area and an additional room with independent access to the garden and bathroom, which could create guest accommodation/office/study. The land is fenced with gated access to the driveway leading to a carport and ample parking area. The land has been beautifully landscaped, featuring numerous trees, flowers and shrubs, an attractive pond plus a vegetable plot. To the side aspect there is an attractive swimming pool with sun terrace and outdoor kitchen/barbecue area. Within the plot is a detached chalet featuring three bedrooms, a lounge, kitchen area and shower room. The chalet enjoys a private garden with small pool creating perfect guest accommodation/ rental possibilities/income. Located only 5 minute drive from the village of Rio Gordo and 35 minutes from the beach at Torre del Mar. Malaga airport is approx 1 hour.
desc.es: Tamaño Construido 111m2 más 52m2 cabaña de madera. Terreno 2177m2. Chalet independiente: 4 dormitorios, dos cuartos de baño y piscina. Además tiene una cabaña de madera con 3 dormitorios, aseo y piscina. Bonito chalet individual , con cabaña de madera de dos plantas, con una situación ideal en un paraje maravilloso con un excelente acceso de vehículos. La cas principal tiene un salón con chimenea, comedor, y cocina completamente equipada, cuatro dormitorios, dos baños, invernadero con una zona de lavadero y una habitación adicional con acceso independiente desde el jardín, y cuarto de baño, lo que se podría utilizar como habitación de invitados, oficina o estudio. El terreno está vallado, y tiene una puerta de acceso que conduce al garaje y a una amplia zona de aparcamiento. Ha sido ajardinado con mucho gusto, con numerosos árboles, flores y arbustoc, así como un atractivo estanque y un huerto. En el lateral de la casa hay una bonita piscina con una zona para tomar el sol, y una cocina exterior con zona de barbacoa. En el mismo terreno hay una cabaña de madera, con tres dormitorios, salón, cocina y cuarto de baño. La cabaña de madera tiene su propio jardín privado y su pequeña piscina individual, lo que genera la estancia perfecta para invitados o para su explotación en alquiler, para obtener ingresos adicionales. Situada a tan sólo 5 minutos en coche del pueblo de Rio gordo y a 35 minutos de la playa de Torre del Mar. El aeropuerto de Málaga está aproximadamente a 1 hora

desc.en: A beautifully presented two storey villa, ideally situated close to the village of Alcaucín and the Natural Park, enjoying fantastic views over Lake Viñuela and the surrounding countryside. The accommodation (ground floor from the front of the property and first floor from the rear) features an entrance hallway, lounge featuring a fireplace and patio doors onto a first floor covered terrace with spectacular views over Lake Viñuela, a fully fitted kitchen with built in appliances and a larder, a master bedroom and a family bathroom. Stairs lead down to the ground floor featuring a second lounge/reception room with patio doors onto the sun terrace, three double bedrooms, a spacious shower room and a utility room which could easily be modified to create a kitchen, thus giving a completely self contained apartment. The property also has an independent store room/workshop/office. Additional features include air conditioning (hot and cold), mosquito screens, mains water and electric, plus Satellite TV, telephone and internet. The gardens have been beautifully landscaped by the present owners and features an 8m x 4m swimming pool, large sun terraces/patios, a raised barbecue/entertainment area with pergola and attractive natural stone walls with displays of mature flowers, trees and shrubs plus a fruit orchard hosting apple, plum, pear, grapefruit, orange, lemon and nispero trees. Situated only 5 minutes from the white village of Alcaucin and the national park and 1 hour from Malaga airport.
desc.es: Preciosa villa de dos plantas, con muy buen aspecto, y una situación ideal, muy cerca del pueblo de Alcaucion y del parque natural, que disfruta de unas fantásticas vistas al lago de la viñuela y los campos de alrededor. La vivienda (planta baja desde la parte frontal de la casa y primera planta desde la parte trasera) se compone de un hall de entrada, salón con chimenea, con unas puertas dobles que conducen a la terraza cubierta, con unas vistas espectaculares del lago de La Viñuela, con cocina completamente equipada, con electrodomésticos, y despensa, dormitorio principal y cuarto de baño. Las escaleras conducen a una planta inferior que se compone de un salón con puertas a la terraza /solarium, tres dormitorios dobles, y un espacioso cuarto de baño, y cuarto de servicio que se puede reformar para crear una cocina, suficiente para definir un apartamento completamente independiente. La casa tiene también un cuarto independiente que se puede utilizar como almacén, taller u oficina. Como características adicionales, tiene aire aconcionado (frio/calor), mosquiteras en todas las ventanas, agua y electricidad, así como canal satelite TV, teléfono e internet. Los jardines han sido creados y diseñados con mucho gusto por el actual propietario, tiene una piscina de 8mx4m, grandes terrazas solario, patios, y zona de barbacoa y ocio, con una pérgola y paredes de piedra natural. Tiene árboles, flores y plantas ornamentales maduras, así como árboles y arbustos , además de árboles frutales como son manzanos, ciruelos perales, pomelo, naranjo, limonero, y níspero. más una fruta huerto de manzanos de alojamiento , ciruela , pera , pomelo , naranja, limón y níspero árboles. A tan sólo 5 minutos del pueblo de Alcauín, el parque natural y a 1 hora del aeropuerto de Málaga.

desc.en: A well presented detached villa ideally located in the countryside enjoying excellent country and mountain views. The property is situated within a plot measuring approximately 6,410m2 and gates lead to a concrete driveway and spacious paved parking area . The plot features mature flowers, trees and shrubs plus grapevines producing a good annual crop. The property was built in 2003, yet has been built in a rustic design, giving an impression of a property dating back over a century. The accommodation features an entrance hallway, a spacious lounge with log burner and air conditioning unit, fitted kitchen/dining room, two double bedrooms and a family shower room. The property has vaulted ceilings with beamwork and features oil fired central heating via radiators, plus recently installed double glazed windows. To the front of the property there is a spacious terrace with Jacuzzi plus pergola and awnings for shade. The property also enjoys an outside kitchen/dining area plus there is a brick built shed. The property has mains water and electric plus telephone/ and internet. Located only 3kms from the village and access is via a good track which is part concrete ( approx 1km). The Beach at Torre del Mar is only 35 minutes and Malaga airport is approx 1 hour
desc.es: Una villa bien decorada, con una situación ideal en el campo, que disfruta de unas excelentes vistas al campo y a las montañas. Está situada en un terreno de aproximadamente unos 6.410 m2 con puertas de entrada que dirigen por una carretera de cemento al a la zona pavimentada de parking y a la vivienda. La finca tienen plantas ornamentales, arboles y arbustos maduros, además de viñas que producen una buena cosecha al año. La vivienda se construyó en 2003 bajo un diseño de estilo rústico, dando la impresión de que data de hace más de un siglo. Se compone de un vestíbulo de entrada, con un espacioso salón con chimenea de leña y aire acondicionado, cocina equipada y comedor, con dos dormitorios dobles y un cuarto de baño. Tiene los techos abovedados con vigas y sistema de calefacción central por radiadores, recientemente se ha instalado ventanas con doble acristalamiento. En la parte fontal de la vivienda hay una espaciosa terraza con jacuzzi y pérgola y toldos para dar sombra. También tiene una cocina / comedor exterior al aire libre con un cobertizo de ladrillo. Tiene electricidad, agua, teléfono e internet. Situada a 3 km del puebo con acceso por un camino asfaltado parcialmente con cemento (aproximadamente 1 Km.) La playa de torre del mar está a unos 35 minutos y el aeropuerto de Málaga a 1 hora.

desc.en: brand new semi detached house with swimming pool and fantastic sea views. The property features two double bedrooms with built in wardrobes, spacious lounge with fireplace, kitchen, modern fitted bathroom, separate cloakroom/w.c. plus a large basement (approx size of two bedrooms) The property also enjoys private sun terraces and patios plus off road parking for 2 vehicles. Only 10 minutes from Baviera Golf, 40 minutes from Malaga airport and5 minutes from the beach. viewing highly recommended. only one left!
desc.es: Chalet pareado de nueva construcción con piscina y fantásticas vistas al mar. La vivienda consta de dos dormitorios dobles, con armarios empotraods, un espacioso salón con chimenera, cocina independiente, 1 baño modernos, aseo/ baño separado, y un gran sótano (aproximadamente el tamaño de dos dormitorios). La vivienda también tienen solarium privado, terrazas y patios, y parking exterior para dos vehículos. A tan sólo 10 minutos de Baviera Golf y a 40 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. recomendamos visitarla, solo queda una!

desc.en: 440m2 Build Size. 1031m2. plot size. 5 Bedrooms. 3 bathrooms. Swimming Pool. An excellent opportunity to purchase this luxurious two storey detached property currently arranged as two independent properties. Upper floor accommodation features a spacious entrance hallway with stairs leading down to the lower level accommodation, two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, utility room, and a single room, a lounge/dining room measuring approx 41m2 and enjoying a wood burner and two double patio doors leading onto a large terrace measuring approximately 60m2 plus a large well fitted kitchen/breakfast room 26m2 with access onto the sun terrace enjoying fantastic views over the surrounding countryside and mountains. The lower level accommodation features a central hallway, 28m2 office/ storage area, large recreation room/workshop 48m2, toilet, a spacious bedroom measuring approximately 29m2, a double bedroom with en-suite plus a 30m2 livingroom area with american kitchen with patio doors leading onto a spacious covered terrace 50m2. The beautifully landscaped gardens feature a 13m x 5m swimming pool, ample lawns and terraces plus a storage cupboard and pump room. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning and heating system. The gated driveway provides parking to the front of the property and to the side aspect. An excellent opportunity for two families to purchase together or to create a home and income. Upper level measures approx 203m2 and the lower level 238m2 and both have independent access and would therefore create an excellent bed and breakfast business, dental/medical practise, a health suite or offices and storage areas. Perfectly located within walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants, 5 minute drive from Lake Viñuela, 15 minutes from the beach at Torre del Mar and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. Viewing highly recommended to appreciate the size and standard of this excellent property.
desc.es: 440 m2 Construidos, 1031 m2 de terreno, 5 dormitorios, 3 baños, con piscina Una excelente oportunidad de adquirir este lujoso chalet individual de dos plantas, actualmente dividido en dos viviendas independientes. La planta superior se compone de 2 dormitorios dobles, dos cuartos de baños, un dormitorio individual, una sala de lavado y plancha, y un gran salón comedor de aproximadamente 41 m2, con estufa de leña. Tiene un gran hall de entrada con escaleras que conducen a la vivienda de la planta baja . Desde el salón comedor se accede por dos puertas dobles a una gran terraza de aproximadamente 60 m2. Tiene una gran cocina completamente equipada, con zona de desayunos de aproximadamente 26 m2, con acceso al solarium donde puede disfrutar de unas maravillosas vistas a los alrededores, al campo y a las montañas. La vivienda de la planta baja, tiene un pasillo central, que da acceso a un dormitorio de unos 28 m2, una gran sala de recreo y entretenimiento de 48 m2, un aseo, un espacioso dormitorio de 29 m2, un dormitorio doble en suite, y una sala de estar con estufa de leña, y cocina americana de 30 m2, con acceso directo a una estupenda terraza cubierta de 50 m2. Todas las estancias de la vivienda disponen de unidades de aire acondicionado y calefacción en ambas plantas Sus preciosos jardines albergan una piscina de 13m x 5 m, con amplios jardines muy cuidados y terrazas cubiertas , además de un cuarto para herramientas de jardinería y otro cuarto para la depuradora. Una vez dentro del terreno, en el camino de entrada hay espacio de aparcamiento para varios coches tanto frente al chalet como en los laterales Una excelente oportunidad para dos familias, o bien para generar ingresos extras con el alquiler de una de las dos viviendas. La planta superior mide unos 203 m2 aproximadamente, y la planta baja 238 m2, ambas con acceso independiente, incluso sería ideal para explotar como alquiler vacacional para turismo rural, o para instalar un negocio del tipo clínica dental o de otra especilidad, o bien cualquier otro negocio, ya que hay suficiente espacio tanto de almacén como para instalar oficinas. Con una situación perfecta, situada muy cerca de tiendas, bares y restaurantes, a 5 minutos en coche del lago de la viñuela, a 15 minutos de la playa de Torre del Mar y a 45 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. Recomendamos visitarla para poder apreciar sus excelentes calidades, dimensiones, aspecto cuidado con todo lujo de detalles y maravillosas vistas.

desc.en: a beautifully presented village property perfect to create a home and income. The accommodation comprises of:- Ground floor. Two independent bedrooms with en-suite shower rooms perfect as bed and breakfast accommodation plus a store room/workshop. First floor accommodation. Door leads through to the breakfast room overlooking the garden/patio area with door into the spacious lounge/dining room featuring two French doors onto a balcony with excellent country and mountain views. The kitchen is fully fitted with built in appliances plus there are two double bedrooms, separate toilet/cloakroom and a fully fitted bathroom with separate shower cubicle. Second floor accommodation. The second floor is identical to the apartment below and enjoys ground floor access from a street behind. This apartment also enjoys a balcony plus a spacious covered terrace with views over the village and surrounding countryside. This beautiful Andalusian property boasts ornate brick arches and wooden shuttered French doors and windows. Built to a high standard and well presented throughout. This property is ideal to create a home an income. The current owners have been successfully renting the property for holidays and on average attain approximately 10,000 euros per annum. Totalán is a pretty white village with approximately 650 habitants. The nearest beaches are Cala de Moral and Rincon de Victoria only a 15 minute drive. Malaga city centre and airport are just a 25 minute drive. Walking distance to bars, shops, restaurants and the village swimming pool. The large commercial shopping centre in Rincon de la Victoria is just an 8 minute drive. Furniture negotiable. Internal viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the size and superb standard of this excellent “andalusian style” property.

A detached villa ideally, located only 5 minutes from Competa with fantastic sea, mountains and countryside views. A gated entrance leads to the property and parking area. Accommodation. Front door leads into a conservatory with excellent sea and countryside views with door into the entrance hallway. Access from the hallway leads into a split level living/ dining area with a wood burning stove and air conditioning system. An ornate brick archway leads into the modern fitted kitchen. Access from the dining area leads to the lounge ( additional living area) with air conditioning and wood burning stove and has direct access to the rear garden. An inner hallway leads to two bedrooms and a modern fitted bathroom featuring a Jacuzzi bath and an en-suite shower room from the master bedroom and dressing room. Heating: Gas underfloor heating, ac/ heating and woodburning stoves. On a lower level adjoining the garage is a further bedroom and guest cloakroom with a covered terrace outside. This area could be utilised to provide additional guest accommodation. Gardens. Beautifully presented full of mature flowers, trees and shrubs with winding pathways and a picturesque pergoda leading to the orchid house which could easily be modified to create another guest apartment. At the side of the house is a summer kitchen/utility room and, at the front of the property is the 8m x 4m swimming pool with spacious sun terrace and patio area. On a lower level adjoining the garage is a further bedroom and guest cloakroom with a covered terrace outside. This area could be utilised to provide additional guest accommodation. Ideally located with good vehicle access and only 5 minutes from Competa, 30 minutes from the beach and one hour from Malaga airport. Mortgage available approx 200,000 euros ( subject to meeting lender´s criteria) Califación Energética:E

Just Reduced by 70.000.-€ ! Fantastic country property perfect for use as a private residence or a boutique hotel/ bed and breakfast business. Ideally located on the outskirts of the village of Cómpeta enjoying breathtaking views over the surrounding mountains, countryside and coastline. Good access from the main road via a concrete drive and within walking distance of all the local amenities. Ground Floor Accommodation A light and spacious open plan living area with central arches and access to the swimming pool, an Andalucian style kitchen featuring granite worktops, stainless steel electric oven, extractor hood and ceramic hob, an office/study, a separate tiled utility room, a guest cloakroom with 2 separate toilets, a storage room and a boiler room. A sweeping marble staircase leads from the lounge to the first floor with a galleried landing and access to a small terrace. First Floor Accommodation. A large master suite with double bedroom, private S/W facing terrace, fully tiled en-suite shower room. Additional separate luxurious bathroom with corner bath, granite surround and twin wash hand basins, walk-in dressing room with wall length fitted wardrobes and twin aspect windows. There are 2 further large double bedrooms (one with fitted wardrobes), both having en-suite shower rooms and private terraces. There is also a laundry room with fitted shelving, and access to the rear of the property. Additional Features Double glazed windows, Gas central heating via radiators, air conditioning, solar panel heated swimming pool. The swimming pool area is covered and enjoys breathtaking views over the countryside, mountains and coastline. A spacious terrace surrounds the pool and recreational area and features a bar/barbecue area, shower room and toilet. The property is enclosed by an ornate wall with double wooden doors. On a lower level there is a large gated parking area. Located 35 minutes from the beach and 1 hour from Malaga airport. Viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the size, location and superb standard of this elegant Spanish property.

A three bedroom country villa enjoying breathtaking views over the sea, mountains and surrounding countryside. Accommodation comprises of:- An arched covered terrace with cocktail bar, ideal for entertaining and al fresco dining, a large fully fitted kitchen with built in appliances, centre island and door leading to rear patio. Archway from the kitchen area leads to the independent dining room with a brick built archway into the lounge featuring a log burning stove. The property also offers three bedrooms, a modern fitted family shower room plus an en-suite bathroom from the master bedroom The private driveway leads to a spacious parking area. The garden to the front of the property comprises of numerous flowers, trees and shrubs plus a large patio enjoying excellent sea, mountain and countryside views. Steps lead down to a lower level featuring the swimming pool, sun terrace and pergola. To the rear of the property there is a private patio with direct access from the kitchen. The surrounding land is terraced and full of almond and olive trees. Ideally located within a 5 minute drive to Sedella, 40 minutes to the beach and Baviera golf course and 1 hour 10 minutes from Malaga airport. Good vehicle access in any vehicle. Viewing highly recommended to appreciate the charm and spectacular views of this perfect country home.

XL1357 A beautiful renovated finca full of charm and character and boasting excellent country and mountain views. The accommodation on the ground floor comprises of a lounge/dining room with original fireplace housing a wood burning stove, original built in cupboard and ceiling with exposed beams. The kitchen/breakfast room features a good selection of base and eyelevel units with worktops over, built in appliances including an oven, hob and fridge freezer. The ground floor also features two double bedrooms and a modern fitted bathroom. The kitchen leads onto a covered patio with ornate arches overlooking the swimming pool area and excellent country views. The first floor features a guest suite with independent access comprising of a double bedroom, en-suite shower room and private sun terrace. The fourth bedroom/study/office has independent access and is located on the lower level. Good vehicle access leads to the spacious parking area and front terrace. The surrounding land offers a good selection of mature trees and the pool house. The rear garden is enclosed by an ornate brick wall and enjoys sun terraces/patios and an 8m x 4m swimming pool. Perfectly located within a small hamlet/village called Romo near Comares. The property is walking distance from a bar/restaurant, 15 minutes from Comares, Colmenar and Riogordo. The beach at Torre del Mar is only 35 minutes and Malaga airport is 50 minutes. A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the character, location and views of this Andalusian property dating back over 300 years.

a detached country house enjoying panoramic country views and walking distance to bars and restaurants. 4 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Build Size140m2. Plot size 490m2. This two storey property features : Ground floor accommodation, Lounge/dining room with fireplace and French doors onto the rear garden and swimming pool, fitted “rustic style” kitchen with built in appliances, bedroom 4 ( currently used as a dining room), bedroom three, ground floor bathroom and inner hallway with under stairs storage cupboard and stairs with picture window leading to first floor landing. First floor accommodation Two double bedrooms and a fully fitted bathroom. Door from the landing leads onto the spacious sun terrace with excellent country and mountain views. The garden comprises of a rear patio/sun terrace area with pool , a lower platform and numerous olive and almond trees below. To the side aspect is a parking area for two cars. Sympathetically renovated and extended approximately 10 years ago. This charming property boasts large wooden windows with shutters and wooden French doors, creating a light and airy living space with excellent views from all aspects. A rare opportunity to find a country property within easy walking distance to bars and restaurants. Furniture and Ford Mondeo car negotiable. Viewing highly recommended. Approx 1 hour 10 minutes from malaga airport and 40 minutes from the beach. Califación Energética: G
desc.es: una casa de campo individual que disfruta de unas magnÍficas vistas panoramicas al campo, situada muy cerca de bares y restaurantes 4 dormitorios. 2 cuartos de baño. Tamaño construido 140m2. Terreno 490m2. Esta vivienda de dos plantas tiene las siguientes características : Estancia en la planta baja: Salón comedor con chimenea y puertas francesas que conducen al jardín trasero, con piscina y cocina diseñada en estilo rústico con electrodomésticos incorporados, habitación 4, (actualmente utilizada com comedor), habitación 3, cuarto de baño en la planta baja, y pasillo interior con armario empotrado de almacenaje bajo las escaleras, y escalera con ventana que conduce al recibidor de la primera planta. Estancia en la primera planta. Dos dormitorios dobles y cuarto de baño completo totalmente equipado. Las puertas del recibidor conducen a una espaciosa terraza/solarium con excelentes vistas del campo y las montañas. El jardín se compone de patio trasero / area de terraza solarium con piscina, y en un nivel inferior una zona con numerosos olivos y almendros abajo. En la zona lateral hay un espacio de aparcamiento para dos vehículos. Restaurada y ampliada hace aproximadamente 10 años. Esta encantadora casa, cuenta con grandes ventanas de madera, con persianas y puertas de madera, que crean un ambiente muy luminoso y ventilado, con unas excelentes vistas desde todas las perspectivas de la casa. Una extraordinaria oportunidad de encontrar una casa de campo muy cerca (se puede ir andando) de bares y restaurantes. El mobiliario y el coche Ford Mondeo son negociables. Recomendamos su visita para apreciar esta casa. A 1 hora y 10 minutos aproximadamente del aeropuerto de Málaga y a unos 40 minutos de la playa. Califación Energética: En Trámite

desc.en: A lovely penthouse in Benalmadena, with fabulous views to the sea and over the town. The apartment has a terrace with panoramic views, which will allow for a BBQ area. The 1st floor consists of a fully fitted kitchen, with lounge and combined dining area. Upstairs are two double bedrooms, 1 master bedroom with en suite and a separate family bathroom. There is a garage and storage area included in the price. The complex has a communal pool, garden, sports area and playground.
desc.es: Mágnífico ático en Benalmádena, con fabulosas vistas, cerca de la playa, en un entorno muy tranquilo. 120 m2 construidos + 20 m2 terraza + 25 m2 solarium. La vivienda se compone de salón comedor, una amplia cocina completamente amueblada y equipada, 1 dormitorio principal con cuarto de baño en suite, 2 dormitorios dobles y cuarto de baño familiar. Tiene plaza de garaje y trastero incluido en el precio. La urbanización cuenta con piscina, jardín comunitario, zona deportiva y zona de juegos. Cerca de______________Torrequebrada golf está a _______ y el Aeropuerto de Málaga a _____ minutos en coche.

desc.en: Build Size: 411m2 plus guest house 54m2 Plot Size: 80,000m2 A luxurious Cortijo plus an additional detached guest house, perfectly located within a stunning setting and enjoying panoramic views towards the sea, surrounding countryside, Maroma mountain and the Sierra Tejeda. This impressive cortijo is built to an exceptional standard and unique design. The accommodation features three double bedrooms with ensuites and French doors leading onto the spacious south facing terrace, an impressive split level lounge/dining room with French doors onto a terrace, cast iron wood burner and beautiful vaulted ceilings with beam work, a spacious fitted kitchen with built in appliances plus a walk in larder, entrance lobby featuring a vaulted ceiling with beam work and guest cloak room and a large sun terrace with spectacular views. The lower level measuring 140m2, is currently used as a workshop and garage and has a cloakroom , water and electricity and could easily be modified to create extra living accommodation or a reception area/offices for a business with separate access via the impressive arched front door. The guest house is a completely renovated finca and comprises of a covered terrace, lounge with fitted kitchen area and wood burner, double bedroom and a modern fitted bathroom. A gated entrance and 200 metre driveway leads to a large gravelled parking area with a covered car port and store/utility room. The properties are positioned within approx 80,000m2 of private land with a variety of trees including 120 olives, Algarrobo and almonds. Located between the picturesque white villages of Sedella and Canillas de Aceituno. Velez Malaga, the coast and Baviera golf course are about 25/30 minutes away and the airport at Malaga is about 80 km. The properties offer enormous scope to create the perfect county home with guest accommodation or an excellent business opportunity. This idyllic and tranquil setting would create an excellent bed and breakfast business within rural tourism encouraging twitchers, cyclists, quad bikes/ mountain bikes, and hikers or to completely relax and unwind and create a yoga/relaxation retreat. The lower level of the cortijo could easily be modified to create additional accommodation ie owner accommodation, offices or a very impressive reception area. A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the standard of this superb cortijo and guest house. Califación Energética: E
desc.es: Tamaño Construido: 411m2 más casa de invitados de 54m2. Terreno: 80,000m2 Cortijo de Lujo con un chalet individual para invitados, con una situación perfecta en un entorno que permite disfrutar de unas maravillosas panorámicas al mar, el campo de alrededor, La maroma y Sierra Tejeda. Este impresionante cortijo se ha construido con una calidad excepcional y un diseño único. La vivienda comprende tres dormitorios dobles en suite y puertas estilo francés que conducen a una espaciosa terraza orientada al sur. con un impresionante Salón/Comedor a diferente nivel con puertas estilo francés que conducen a la terraza, y una estufa encastrada de hierro, con un precioso techo abovedado trabajado con vigas de madera. La espaciosa cocina tiene los electrodomésticos empotrados además de una gran despensa. El vestíbulo de entrada con techo abovedado y vigas, aseo de invitados,y una gran terraza solarium con unas espectaculares vistas. El nivel inferior mide 140 m2 y actualmente se utiliza como taller y garaje, también tiene un aseo, agua y electricidad, y se puede modificar fácilmente para crear una vivienda extra o un área de recepción/ oficinas para un negocio, con acceso independiente a través del impresionante arco de entrada frontal. La casa de invitados está completametne reformada y se compone de terraza cubierta, salón, cocina equipada , chimenea, dormitorio doble, y baño completo moderno. Una puerta de entrada y 200 metros de camino nos llevan a la gran zona de aparcamiento con gravilla con un porche cubierto para coches, y un almacén o trastero. La vivienda está construida sobre un terreno de aproximadamente 80.000 m2 de terreno privado con una variedad de árboles, incluyendo 120 olivos, algarrobos y almendros. Situada entre los pintorescos pueblos blancos de Sedella y Canillas de Aceituno. Velez Malaga, la costa y Baviera golf están a unos 25/30 minutos en coche y el aeropuerto de Málaga a 80 Km. de distancia. Esta vivienda ofrece enormes posibilidades de crear la casa de campo perfecta con alojamiento para invitados, o bien una excelente oportunidad de negocio en explotación. Esta ídílica y tranquila estancia le permitirá crear un excelente negocio de alojamiento y desayuno para turismo rural, y fomentar la práctica de hobies como ciclismo , quads, bicicleta de montaña, montar a caballo, o para relajarse por completo fomentando actividades como yoga, relajación y retiro. La parte más baja del cortijo se puede acondicionar fácilmente para crear un alojamiento adicional o la vivienda del propietario, oficinas o una impresionante área de recepción. Recomendamos visitarla para apreciar el standar de calidad de este magnífico cortijo con chalet de invitados independiente. Califación Energética: E

desc.en: Build Size 196m2. Plot Size. 323m2 Detached Villa. 5 bedrooms. Two bathrooms. Two kitchens. Fantastic opportunity to acquire this second line villa enjoying excellent coastal and sea views. The accommodation is currently arranged as two independent apartments. Apartment 1. Private driveway and patio. Spacious lounge with woodburner, open plan modern fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms and a modern fitted bathroom. Apartment 2. Private garden with patio and covered terrace enjoying excellent sea views. Spacious lounge/dining room with fireplace and superb views, fitted kitchen, fitted shower room and three bedrooms. Califación Energética: En Tramité/ pending perfectly located only 100 metres from the beach, beach bars/restaurants and public transport. Malaga airport is approx 45 miute drive and Baviera golf course aprox 10 minutes. Ideal property to create a home and income.
desc.es: Construido 196m2. Parcela. 323m2 Chalet individual. 5 dormitorios. dos baños y dos cocinas Fantástica oportunidad de adquirir esta Villa en segunda línea de playa con unas excelentes vistas de la costa y del mar. La vivienda se encuentra actualmente distribuida como dos apartamentos independientes. Apartmento 1. Con camino y patio privado. Espaciosos salón con estufa de leña y cocina moderna abierta, completamente equipada, dos dormitorios dobles y baño completo moderno. Apartmento 2. Jardín privado con patio y terraza cubierta con excelentes vistas al mar. Espacioso salón comedor, con chimenea, y magníficas vistas, cocina amueblada, cuarto de baño completo con ducha y 3 dormitorios. Califación Energética: En Tramité Con una situación perfecta, a tan sólo 100 metros de la playa, bares, restaurantes y transporte público. El aeropuerto de Málaga está a uns 45 minutos aproximadamente y Baviera Golf a 10 minutos aprox. en coche. Vivienda ideal para crear un hogar e ingresos extra.

desc.en: Build Size:116m2 Plot Size:183m2 A rare opportunity to acquire a Spanish village house with a swimming pool. The property has been beautifully renovated throughout by the current owners and can be used as two separate properties with independent access or as one family home with guest suite. The ground floor accommodation features a lounge, large modern fitted kitchen/ breakfast room with door to enclosed patio and door leading to inner hallway and separate/guest accommodation comprising of a large bedroom/ lounge with kitchen area ( could be reverted back to two bedrooms) and a modern fitted shower room. The first floor accommodation features a double bedroom and modern fitted bathroom. To the front of the property there is an enclosed patio and to the rear there is a covered outdoor kitchen/lounge featuring a gas cooker, fridge/freezer and washing machine. This area leads to two patios enjoying excellent village and countryside views. Steps lead down to the swimming pool 4.5m x 2.5m and utility room. To the rear there is independent street access. Located within the picturesque village of Triana within easy walking distance to the village shops and bars. The beach and Baviera golf course is approx 15 minute drive and Malaga airport approx 45 minutes. Viewing highly recommended. Califación Energética: En Tramité/ pending
desc.es: Construido:116m2 Terreno:183m2 Gran oportunidad de adquirir una casa de pueblo con piscina. La vivienda ha sido completamente renovada por los actuales dueños y se puede utilizar como dos viviendas independientes, ya que tienen acceso independiente, o bien como una casa con suite de invitados. La planta baja se compone de salón, gran cocina moderna, completamente equipada, office o zona de desayuno, con una puerta que conduce al patio y a un hall interior que lleva al apartamento de invitados formado por un gran dormitorio/salón con zona de cocina (podría volver a convertirse en dos dormitorios) y un cuarto de baño con ducha moderno. La zona de la primera planta tienen un dormitorio doble y un baño completo moderno. En la parte frontal de la vivienda hay un patio y en la parte de atras hay una cocina exterior cubierta o bien salón con cocina de gas, frigorífico, congelador y lavadora. Esta zona conduce a dos patios con unas excelentes vistas del pueblo y del campo de alrededor. Las escaleraas bajan a una piscina de 4.5m x 2.5m y un cuarto trastero. La parte de atrás tiene su acceso independiente desde la calle. Situada en el pintoresco pueblo blanco de triana, está muy cerca (andando) de tiendas, y bares. La playa y Baviera Golf están a 15 minutos aproximadamente en coche, y el aeropuerto de Málaga a 45 minutos. Recomendamos visitarla para apreciar sus calidades. Califación Energética: En Trámite

desc.en: Located within the heart of the historical centre of Velez Malaga. The property has been completely renovated throughout and features three bedrooms, modern fitted kitchen/breakfast room, lounge, patio, downstairs cloakroom, first floor modern fitted bathroom plus additional first floor lounge. Formerly used as a small shop offering scope to create a home and income. fantastic location. 10 minutes from the beach and Baviera Golf and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. Califación Energética: En Tramité/ pending
desc.es: Situado en el corazón del centro histórico de Velez Malaga. La vivienda ha sido completamente renovado y se compone de 3 dormitorios, cocina moderna/zona de desayuno, salón, patio y aseo en la planta baja, En la primera planta hay un cuarto de baño completo y un salón adicional en la primera planta. Ha sido utilizada como una pequeña tienda lo que la convierte en el lugar ideal para tener la vivienda y el negocio. con la ubicaciÓn perfecta. A tan sólo 10 minutos de la playa y de Baviera Golf y a 45 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. Califación Energética: En Tramite

desc.en: Build Size 160m2. A four bedroom townhouse located within a sought after street in Velez Malaga within easy level walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. The property is over 100 years old and features many period features throughout. The accommodation comprises of an entrance hallway with two reception rooms and a ground floor bedroom, stairs to the first floor lead to a spacious landing, three bedrooms, kitchen and bathroom The property also features two juliet balconies and a patio. The property requires renovating throughout to restore once more to it´s former glory. Only 10 minutes drive from the beach and 40 minutes from Malaga airport.
desc.es: Casa de 160 m2 construidos. Casa de pueblo de 4 dormitorios situada en una conocida calle de Vélez-Málaga, de fácil acceso, y muy cerca de tiendas, bares, restaurantes, bancos, y transporte público. La vivienda tiene más de 100 años y conserva muchas características de la construcción de las casas de antaño. Se compone de hall de entrada con dos estancias de bienvenida, y un dormitorio en la planta baja. Las escaleras conducen a la primera planta con un espacioso distriuidor que da acceso a tres dormitorios, la cocina y el baño. Tiene dos balcones tipo julieta y un patio. Requiere renovación para sacar todo lo mejor de esta vieja gloria. A tan solo 10 minutos en coche de la playa y a 40 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga.

desc.en: Price just reduced to 120,000 euros! A three bedroom, 2 bathroom townhouse beautifully presented throughout and featuring 4 large sun terraces. The accommodation comprises of an entrance hallway, spacious lounge with air conditioning unit, a separate dining room, fitted kitchen, fitted bathroom and 3 good size bedrooms. To the front of the property there is a private covered dining terrace. Patio doors from the master bedroom lead to a large sun terrace. There is a further patio to the rear of the property with a store room. Steps then lead to another sun terrace with good views over the surrounding town. The property also features good vehicular access , air conditioning in the lounge and Master bedroom, satellite T.V. and telephone. The property is ideally located in a small cul-de sac with good vehicle access and within walking distance to shops, banks, bars and restaurants. The beach is only a 5 minute drive and Malaga airport approx 40 minutes.
desc.es: Precio rebajado a 120,000 euros! Chalet adosado de 3 dormitorios y dos baños, con muy buen aspecto que disfruta de 4 grandes terrazas / solarium. La vivienda se compone de hall de entrada, un salón espacioso con unidad de aire acondicionado, salón independiente, cocina amueblada, baño completo y 3 dormitorios de buen tamaño. En la parte frontal de la vivienda hay una terraza cubierta, Las puertas del patio desde el dormitorio principal conducen a una gran terraza solarium. También tiene un patio adicional en la parte de atrás de la vivienda con un trastero. Las escaleras te llevan a otra terraza con unas magníficas vistas de los alrededores Tiene un buen acceso de vehículos, aire acondicionado en el salón y en el dormitorio principal, televisión por satélite y teléfono. Tiene una situación ideal, ya que está situada en una pequeña calle sin salida con muy buen acceso de vehículos y a muy cerca del tiendas, bancos, bares y restaurantes. La playa está a tan solo 5 minutos en coche y el aeropuerto de Málaga aproximadamente a 40 minutos.

desc.en: Build size 178m2. 5 Bedrooms. 2.5 bathrooms. A spacious townhouse located in the heart of the historical centre of Velez- Malaga and only 100 metres from the indoor market, historical monuments, shops, bars and restaurants. The property, which is over 100 years old, has been sympathetically renovated by the present owner and boasts high ceilings, exposed beams and brickwork plus a private courtyard/garden area. The accommodation comprises of an entrance hallway with two bedrooms and a downstairs cloakroom. Stairs lead to the first floor with large lounge/dining room featuring a wood burner and door onto the courtyard and three wooden French doors onto Juliet balconies, fitted kitchen, stairs to the second floor and door leading to the courtyard. The beautiful rear courtyard features a covered terrace, modern fitted bathroom and two bedrooms. The first floor enjoys the master suite with French doors overlooking the courtyard below and a very spacious modern fitted en-suite bathroom. A rare opportunity to find a spacious and beautifully renovated townhouse, located so close to the historical centre with on street parking to the front of the property. Califación Energética: G The property is perfect as a home or to create a home and income by using ground floor level as an office or as a bed and breakfast business.
desc.es: Tamaño construido 178m2. 5 dormitorios. 2.5 cuartos de baño. Una vivienda situada en el corazón del casco histórico de y a tan sólo 100 metros del mercado, monumentos históricos, tiendas, bares y restaurantes.. La casa, que tiene más de 100 años de antiguedad, ha sido completamente reformada por el actual propietario con un estilo muy cuidado, en consonancia con el entorno, y tiene techos altos, vigas de madera y ladrillos y una zona de patio/jardín privado. La vivienda se compone de hall de entrada con dos dormitorios y aseo en la planta baja. Las escaleras conducen a la primera planta con un gran salón comedor con chimenea, y puerta de acceso al jardín, , con tres puertas de madera francesa en los balcones tipo julieta, cocina amueblada, y escaleras que conducen a la segunda planta y una puerta de acceso al jardín. La bonita parte trasera del jardín tiene una terraza cubierta, un baño completo reformado y dos dormitorios. La primera planta tienen un dormitorio principal en suite, con puertas francesas que dan al jardín de abajo y un cuarto de baño en suite moderno y espacioso. Es una extraordinaria oportunidad de encontrar una bonita, espaciosa y renovada casa situada muy cerca del casco histórico con parking en la calle justo delante de la vivienda. Califación Energética: En Tramité/ pending la vivienda es perfecta para vivir en ella o para obtener ingresos extras utilizando la planta baja como oficina o para ofrecer alojamiento.

desc.en:
A beautifully renovated three bedroom village house located within the heart of the picturesque white village of Salares.
The property features a lounge with open fireplace, ground floor bedroom, fitted kitchen, two first floor bedrooms, fitted bathroom, a first floor terrace with views over the village and countryside plus a rear patio.
The property has been completely renovated and rebuilt throughout yet retains itacute;s original charm and character, boasting a rustic design including exposed beam work to ceilings and terracotta tiled floors.
The perfect village property to enjoy peace, tranquility and the beauty of the surrounding natural park.
This small village features three bars/restaurants a village shop, town hall, church and a small medical centre.
Approx 35 minutes from the beach and 1 hour 10 minutes from Malaga airport.

Build Size 74m2 Apartment. 2 Bedrooms. 1 Bathroom. Swimming Pool. Tennis Court. A well presented 3rd floor apartment featuring a spacious private balcony overlooking communal gardens and less than 100 metres to the beach This property features a fitted kitchen, a lounge/dining room with patio doors leading on to a private balcony, 2 double bedrooms with built in wardrobes and a shower room with low level w/c , wash hand basin with vanity unit and separate shower cubicle. The property benefits from a communal swimming pool and tennis court, and is ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport and is approximately 30 minutes from Malaga airport.

Build Size: 120m2. Plot size 130m2. A beautifully presented four bedroom modern townhouse located only 500 metres from the beach! The property benefits from a large lounge/dining room, separate office area, modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances, downstairs cloakroom with w.c, master bedroom with dressing room, en-suite bathroom and balcony overlooking the communal swimming pools and sea, three additional bedrooms plus a small 4 bedroom currently used as a store room as has been modified to create a dressing room with direct access from the master bedroom ( could easily be reverted back to a 4 double bedroom with balcony). First floor family shower room. Private parking space. The property also enjoys a front and rear garden plus a spacious roof terrace with pergola, barbecue and outdoor kitchen area with excellent sea views. Set within a private and peaceful urbanisation with three communal swimming pool areas, children play areas plus padel tennis courts. The urbanisation also features a gymnasium with sauna and jacuzzi. Perfectly located within walking distance to the beach, 10 minutes from Baviera and Añoreta golf course and 35 minutes from Malaga airport. An internal viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the size, presentation and location of this perfect property. 65 euros/ month community fees. Energy Performance Certificate: E
desc.es: Construidos: 120m2. Terreno: 130m2. Bonito adosado moderno de 4 dormitorios, ¡situado a tan solo 500 metros de la playa.! La vivienda tiene un gran salón comedor, una zona de office independiente, cocina moderna, completamente equipada, con muebles y electrodomésticos, aseo en planta baja, dormitorio principal con vestidor y cuarto de baño en suite y terraza con vistas a la piscina comunitaria y al mar, tres dormitorios más, y una cuarta habitación que actualmente se utiliza como trastero, pero que puede convertirse fácilmente en vestidor con acceso directo desde el dormitorio principal (se puede convertir fácilmente en un cuarto dormitorio doble) con terraza y cuarto de baño familiar con ducha en la primera planta. Aparcamiento privado. La vivienda disfruta de un jardín frontal y trasero, además de una espaciosa terraza solárium en el ático, con pérgola, barbacoa, y cocina al aire libre con unas excelentes vistas al mar. Situado en una urbanización privada muy tranquila con tres piscinas comunitarias, zona de juegos para niños, y pistas de paddle y tenis. La urbanización también tiene gimnasio con sauna y jacuzzi. Con una situación perfecta, se puede ir andando a la playa, y a 10 minutos de Baviera y Añoreta Golf, y a 35 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga.. Recomendamos visitarlo, para apreciar realmente su tamaño, presentación y situación de esta vivienda perfecta. Gastos de comunidad: 65 euros al mes. Una vivienda ideal para tener tu casa de vacaciones con excelentes posibilidades para explotación en alquiler. Calificación energética E

desc.en: Build Size: 117m2 + 55m2 Studio Townhouse. 3 Bedrooms. 2 Bathrooms. Independent Studio. A 3 bedroom townhouse featuring an independent studio situated only 2 minutes from the beach, shops, restaurants and bars. The main property features a modern fitted kitchen, a lounge/dining room, 3 bedrooms (1 with its own balcony), a fitted bathroom with wash hand basin and pedestal, low level w.c and bath with shower over. The independent studio features a spacious lounge / bedroom, a fitted kitchen, a shower room with wash basin and pedestal, low level w.c and walk in shower and sauna. The property benefits from a private garden/patio, a gated driveway with parking for 1 vehicle and is ideally located only 2 minutes from the beach and 30 minutes from Malaga airport. Energy Performance Certificate : D

Build Size: 118m2 Second floor apartment. 4 Bedrooms. 2 Bathrooms. Swimming Pool. Garage. This modern apartment is ideally located close to supermarkets, shops, bars and restaurants and only 500 metres from the beach. The accommodation features a fully fitted kitchen, hob with extractor fan above, washing machine and fridge freezer, a lounge/dining room with access to a balcony overlooking the complex and communal swimming pool, 1 single and 3 double bedroom (all double bedrooms fitted with built in wardrobes), 2 bathrooms with wash basin and pedestal, low level w.c and bath with shower unit. The Property benefits from a communal swimming pool and its own private garage space. Approximately 40 minutes from Malaga airport. Energy Performance Certificate: Pending

Build Size: 81m2 + 41m2 Terrace Ground floor apartment. 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Swimming pool. Garage. A beautifully presented ground floor apartment featuring a spacious private terrace overlooking communal gardens and less than 1km to the beach. The accommodation features a fully fitted kitchen with built in oven, hob with extractor fan, washing machine and fridge freezer, a lounge/dining room with access to a spacious patio area overlooking communal gardens, 3 double bedrooms, the master bedroom features a built in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom, family bathroom with shower The property benefits from a communal swimming pool, children play area and private garage space. Approximately 1 km from the beach and 40 minutes from Malaga airport.

under construction. 31 First Line Golf Town houses overlooking the 9 Hole on Baviera Golf Course and only 900 metres from the beach and Port at Caleta de Velez. These luxurious town houses have been designed by one of the most famous architects in Spain, Joaquin Torres, and boast light and spacious rooms with fantastic golf views. The accommodation features three bedrooms, a spacious lounge/dining room, kitchen, downstairs cloakroom, and two bathrooms ( en-suite from the master bedroom). All the properties enjoy a carport and a private garden with option for a swimming pool. Superb design built to an excellent standard. Extras: Swimming pool based on size. Only 35 minutes from Málaga airport and walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. Payment details: 3,000 euros to reserve the property. 5% payable upon signing reservation contract - 3,000€ paid = 9,450 euros. 25% payable over 2 years = 62,250 euros = 2,593.75€ per month. 70% payable upon completion/ signing escritura = 174,300 euros. desc.en: Build Size 228m2. 5 bedrooms. 2.5 bathrooms. Garage. An extremely spacious two Storey village house enjoying breathtaking panoramic views over the surrounding countryside and mountains. The property is located within the small hamlet of Venta Alta and walking distance to a bar/restaurant. The accommodation features a large lounge/dining room with fireplace and wood burner, downstairs toilet, additional reception room, well fitted kitchen, 5 bedrooms, two bathrooms and an attached garage. To the rear there is a small patio and stairs lead up to the roof terrace with fantastic country views. Approx 5 minute drive from Puente don Manuel, 25 minutes from the beach and 50 minutes from Malaga airport. A perfect property for an extended family or to create a bed and breakfast business. Calificación Energética: E
desc.es: Precio 179,000 euros. Superficie construido 228m2. 5 dormitorios, 2.5 baños, garaje. Un espacioso casa de pueblo de dos plantas con impresionantes vistas panorámicas al campo y a las montañas. La vivienda se encuentra dentro de la pequeña aldea de Venta Alta y a poca distancia de bares y restaurantes. El alojamiento cuenta con un amplio salón / comedor con chimenea y estufa de leña, aseo en la planta baja, sala de recepción adicional, cocina equipada, 5 dormitorios, dos baños y un garaje. En la parte trasera hay un patio pequeño que cuenta con escaleras que conducen hasta la terraza de la azotea que dispone de fantásticas vistas al campo. Aproximadamente 5 minutos en coche de Puente Don Manuel, a 25 minutos de la playa y a unos 50 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. Una vivienda ideal para una familia numerosa, o para crear un negocio de "Cama y Desayuno" Calificación Energética: E

desc.en: 4 Bedroom Villa, 2 Bathrooms, Swimming Pool. successful business. Price 199,950 euros. A beautifully presented 3/4 bedroom villa with swimming pool perfectly located within the heart of Puente don Manuel and easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants, weekly market and public transport. The property is used as a “home and income” and features a ladies´ fashion boutique and a beauty salon, established in 2004 and boasting an extensive client database. The property features a spacious open plan lounge/ dining room with a modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances and granite worktops. Doors from the lounge lead to the easy to maintain rear garden, swimming pool and attractive terracing with displays of mature flowers, trees and shrubs. To the side of the property there is off road parking for two vehicles. The front of the property enjoys a patio with direct access into the inner hallway and beauty salon offering an alternative option to create an independent annexe. A perfect opportunity to purchase a home with a ready made and lucrative business. (annual figures available) Interior viewing highly recommended to appreciate the standard and location of this superb property.
desc.es: Villa de 4 Dormitorios, 2 Baños y piscina. + Negocio de Éxito. Precio 199,950 euros. Villa con buen aspecto de 4/3 dormitorios con piscina, situado en el corazón de Puente de Don Manuel, cerca de tiendas, bares, restaurantes, supermercados y transporte público. Esta vivienda se utilica como "hogar e ingresos" y cuenta con un boutique de moda para mujeres y un salón de belleza, fué creada en 2004 y goza de una extensa base de datos de clientes. La vivienda cuenta con un espacioso salón/comedor con una cocina moderna y completamente equipada con encimeras de granito. Puertas desde el salón que conducen al jardín trasero, la piscina y a la terraza que cuenta con preciosos flores, árboles y arbustos. A un lado de la vivienda hay aparcamiento disponible para dos vehículos. La parte frontal de la vivienda goza de un patio con acceso directo al salón, al pasillo, y al salón de belleza, que ofrece la opción alternativa de crear un apartamento independiente. Una oportunidad perfecta para comprar una casa que dispone de un negocio ya hecho y lucrativo. (annual figures available) Recomendamos visitar, para apreciar el nivel y la ubicación de esta magnífica vivienda. A tan sólo 20 minutos de la playa y el Campo de Golf Baviera, 5 minutos de La Viñuela, y a 45 minutos de el aeropuerto de Málaga. Calificación energética E

desc.en: Build Size 225m2. Plot size 50,000m2. 6 bedrooms. 4.5 bathrooms. Swimming pool. A superb opportunity to acquire two detached properties situated within a beautiful 12,000 m2 plot. Both properties enjoy excellent country views and are perfectly positioned alongside a country road and only 3 minutes from the village, 10 minutes from Alhama de Granada, one hour from the beach and Malaga airport and only 20 minutes from Granada airport. These properties would be perfect for those looking to create a “home and income” or an ideal solution for two families to live together. The properties have been built to an exceptionally high standard and benefits from double glazing, solar panel water heating with gas boiler back up and under floor heating. main house: 150m² Built size. Ground Floor: Independent fully fitted oak kitchen with gas range cooker, granite worktop and all white goods. Doors leading to utility room and dining room. Spacious dining room with fantastic views and stairs to first floor landing. Downstairs cloakroom Living room with wood burner and french doors leading to the swimming pool. Ceiling beams and beautiful floor tiles Under floor heating and full double glazing throughout. Satellite TV system and phone line. Large wrap around covered terrace, laid out garden areas, paved terrace with pool, outside kitchen, barbeque and bar, pool shower, pool pump room, shower/cloakroom. First Floor: 3 Bedrooms with the option of a 4th (currently an open plan study area.) 29m²master bedroom, incorporating an en-suite luxury shower room with under floor heating. Fitted wardrobes and ceiling beams. 2nd bedroom also features an en-suite with fitted wardrobes and beam work to ceilings. Exterior: Swimming pool. Pool pump room. Water tank room with water filter and softener. Water pump and boiler room. Solar panels water heating with gas boiler back up. 5m x 3m workshop with light and power points.. Brick built dog kennels. Separate fenced area ideal for horses/dogs. Large wrap around covered terrace, laid out garden areas, paved terrace with pool, outside kitchen, barbeque and bar, pool shower, pool pump room, shower/cloakroom. Further Information. Fully double glazed throughout, with matching wooden shutters and cast iron grills. Built to a very high spec – Damp course membrane, cavity wall brick insulation, Foam wall insulation infill and under floor heating with 3 zones. Own well providing water. Second Detached Property.: Built size 75m² A detached single story villa with a covered terrace. 2 double bedrooms, both with en-suites. Fitted wardrobes in both bedrooms. Open plan living area with open fireplace. Independent access from the road. Positioned within almond trees enjoying excellent country views. Energy Performance Certificate: C

desc.en: 9 Bedrooms 4 bathrooms. A large town house property formerly used as a hostel comprising of 9 bedrooms, lounge/dining room, kitchen and three terraces. The property has access from two separate streets and offers numerous possibilities to create an internal garage, shop/office, two independent properties or as a bed and breakfast business. Ideally located within a prominent street in the centre of Velez Malaga. Only 3kms from the beach and 40 minutes from Malaga airport. Perfect home and income. Califación Energética: En Tramité/ pending.
desc.es: 9 Dormitorios 4 Cuartos de Baño. Una gran vivienda que se ha explotado como casa de huespedes. Se compone de 9 dormitorios, salón comedor, cocina 4 cuartos de baño y tres terrazas. La vivienda tiene acceso independiente por dos calles, lo que ofrece numerosas posibilidades de modificación y explotación, desde crear un garaje interior , una tienda, oficina o negocio, separarla en dos viviendas independientes, o bien para ofrecer alojamiento y desayuno. Tiene una situación ideal en una calle muy centrica de Velez Málaga. A tan solo 3 Km. de la playa ya 40 minutos del aeropuerto de Málaga. Es perfecta como hogar y para generar ingresos extra.
