desc.en: A two bedroom townhouse located within the historical town of Velez- Malaga. The property features a lounge, fitted kitchen, additional reception room, shower room, two bedrooms and a roof terrace with excellent views. Excellent vehicle access and on street parking. Ideally located within easy walking distance to bars, shops and restaurants and only 10 minutes from the beach and Baviera golf and 40 minutes to Malaga airport.

A two bedroom spacious end of terrace house located within a quiet cul de sac close to the historical fortress and Church. The property features an entrance hallway, two double bedrooms, lounge, kitchen, bathroom and a spacious rear patio with store room and steps up to a sun terrace. Walking distance to bars, shops and restaurants and only 10 minutes from the beach, golf course and Málaga airport. Califación Energética: pending

Build Size approx 50m2. A country house with small patio/garden area situated within beautiful countryside and only 5 minutes from Lake Viñuela. The property features a double bedroom, lounge, kitchen and bathroom and has possibilities to create a 2 bedroom. To the front of the property there is a small garden and patio area. The property enjoys excellent country and mountain views and is located only 25 minutes from the beach and Baviera golf course and 50 minutes from the airport. Good vehicle access in any car. Ideal holiday home.

A two bedroom village house featuring a lounge, kitchen, spacious shower room and a front terrace. Requires updating. Ideally located within this picturesque white village only 5 minutes from the beach and 20 minutes from Malaga. Energy Performance Certificate: Pending

Build Size: 57 m2 Apartment. 2 Bedrooms. 1 Bathroom. This Apartment is ideally located in the centre of Torre del Mar, only 2 minutes walk from the beach, bars, restaurants. This property features a fitted kitchen, a lounge/dining room , 2 double bedrooms with built in wardrobes and a bathroom with low level w/c , wash hand basin with vanity unit and bath with shower unit above. The property is ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport and is approximately 30 minutes from Malaga airport. Energy Performance Certificate

5 bedrooms. 4 baths. 351 m2 built. 1100 m2 plot size. 10m x 5m Pool A luxurious villa perfectly located within walking distance to the port, beach and Baviera golf course. The property was constructed in 2013 by a reputable British builder/owner with over 35 years experience within the construction industry. The property is accessed via an automated gated entrance leading to a private parking area for 4 vehicles and a 90m2 garage. The accommodation comprises of: Ground Floor. Master bedroom: 43m2 plus 7m2 walk in dressing room. En suite bathroom featuring a bath, shower, double sink, low level wc and heated towel rail. Bedroom 2. 9m2. Features an en-suite shower room and fitted wardrobes. Bedroom 3. 26m2 Includes fitted wardrobes and features an en-suite with bath, shower, vanity unit and low level wc. Bedroom 4. 18 m2. Includes fitted wardrobes and features an en suite with bath , shower, vanity unit and wc. All bedrooms enjoy patio doors leading onto the rear covered terrace and private garden. The First Floor Accommodation features: Kitchen A beautifully designed fitted kitchen with centre island boasting solid wooden doors in French Oak, granite work tops, purified water, NEFF appliances including a double oven microwave, induction hob, and fridge. Direct access onto the first floor terrace with superb sea views. A separate store room houses a 500 litre Solar panel hot water tank with back up supply and leads to a cloakroom with w.c. and wash hand basin. Lounge/Dining room 65m2 Lounge / Dining room featuring insulated Oak flooring, pre installed flue for wood burning stove and spectacular sea, coastal and countryside views. Patio doors leading onto the first floor sun terrace. Picture window with sensational coastal views. Study/ 5th bedroom. 9 m2. The plot measures 1,200m2 and is completely enclosed by a brick wall. The south facing garden boasts a 10m x 5 m swimming pool with pump house. Additional features include: Fully insulated porcelain flooring throughout. Italian Granite staircases. All windows UPC with toughened double glazing Cat Eight cabling to every bedroom and lounge. Pre Installed Air Con. This beautifully presented property has been designed and perfectly positioned to enjoy the spectacular sea and coastal views, with excellent attention to maximising light and space throughout. The neutral/natural tones combined with oak flooring and the French oak fitted kitchen, present a modern feel, oozing with understated luxury. Located within a highly sought after urbanisation. This picturesque urbanisation is predominantly Spanish but due to it´s fantastic location, views and close proximity to both golf and the sea, has attracted many nationalities to purchase. A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the location and standard of this fantastic property. Energy Performance Certificate: D

*price reduction* Build Size: 216m2. 4 bedrooms. 4 bathrooms. Garage. A recently built townhouse offering two independent properties + Garage. The ground floor property with inner court yard, is currently used as an architect’s office and is perfect for an independent apartment. The first and second floor offers an independent and luxurious three bedroom townhouse with roof terrace. This property has been constructed to the highest of standards by the current owner, a renowned local architect. Style and traditional features have been introduced throughout creating a truly stunning character property. Perfectly located within the heart of Velez Malaga within easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants, medical centres and excellent public tansport. The beach at Torre del Mar is only 3kms and Malaga airport 40 minutes. An internal viewing is highly recommended

Build Size 180m2. Plot size 1,800m2. 4 bedrooms. 4 bathrooms. Independent apartment. A beautifully presented “rustic style” country house with independent guest accommodation. The main property features a covered terrace, large rustic style kitchen with vaulted ceilings and beams, utility room, spacious lounge/dining room with log burner, beams and spectacular mountain and country views, three double bedrooms, two en-suite bathrooms plus a family bathroom. The independent studio apartment features a private terrace with pergola, a spacious lounge/bedroom, independent kitchen and en-suite shower room. The plot measures approx 1,800m2. The main garden is completely enclosed and full of mature flowers, trees and shrubs and an above ground swimming pool. There is a brick built gazebo/ outdoor entertainment area with bar and built in seating, creating the perfect area to relax, unwind and enjoy the superb views. The property has direct access from a quiet country road and is walking distance to bars and restaurants. The village of Comares is only a 5 minute drive and the beach is approx 35 minutes. A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the excellent location, views and attention to detail when building this “rustic style” property. The owner has captured the “essence” of a Spanish country house with shuttered windows, vaulted ceilings and exposed beams and improved by building spacious and light rooms with excellent height! Perfect Home with rental Income. Energy Performance Certificate: Pending

price reduction! 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. A completely renovated “rustic style” village house located within the picturesque white village of Iznate. The accommodation features a fitted kitchen/ dining room, lounge, modern fitted bathroom, two double bedrooms plus guest accommodation with direct access from the patio enjoying a double bedroom and en-suite. The property benefits from two rear patio areas and two first floor sun terraces. Should additional terraces be required the existing flat roof could easily be modified to create a roof terrace with fantastic views! Ideally situated within walking distance to bars, shops, restaurants and the village swimming pool. The beach is only a 10 minute drive and Malaga airport is only 30 minutes. Property has a small mortgage (if required) which is transferable subject to meeting bank´s lending criteria. Energy Performance Certificate: E

120m2 build size. Plot Size 426m2 Detached House. 3 bedrooms. Swimming pool. An ideal opportunity to acquire this spacious three bedroom detached house located within a private gated cul-de-sac, alongside beautiful olive groves. The ground floor accommodation features an entrance hallway with stairs to the first floor, a spacious and modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances and a walk in larder, downstairs cloakroom, large lounge/dining room with fireplace housing a wood burning stove, air conditioning unit, double aspect windows and patio doors. The first floor features three double bedrooms and a modern fitted family bathroom with separate shower cubicle. The gardens are completely enclosed and accessed via a gate, featuring displays of flowers, trees, shrubs, a pergola, a garden shed and a swimming pool. To the front and side aspect are two covered terraces perfect for al fresco dining! Ideally situated within a small urbanisation, within easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. Only 5 minutes from Lake Viñuela, 20 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. Energy Performance Certificate: G

Build Size 60m2. A two bedroom townhouse located in the centre of a picturesque white village. The property features two double bedrooms, a lounge/dining room, a fitted kitchen, fitted bathroom and a terrace. Walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and bank. Only 20 minutes from the beach and 50 minutes from Malaga airport.

Build Size:79m2 Plot Size: 10,000m2 A detached property set within 10,000 m2 plot enjoying spectacular coastal and lake views. The property requires finishing internally and could create a two bedroom country property. The plot has two wells and electricity. The majority of the fruit trees are olive trees. An ideal opportunity to create a home and income. Only 10 minutes from Velez Malaga. 20 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport. Energy Performance Certificate: Exempt

4 Bedrooms. 4 bathrooms. Swimming pool. Independent guest house. Build Size:243m2 plus independent villa 59m2 Plot Size:32,325m2 A spectacular country house with independent guest accommodation ideally located only 5 minutes from the white village of Colmenar, enjoying breathtaking panoramic views. The main house comprises of a covered terrace overlooking the front garden and swimming pool, entrance hallway, modern fitted shower room, bedroom 2 with en suite shower room, bedroom 3 featuring a private sun terrace and excellent country views, a spacious lounge with wood burner and French doors leading into the private rear garden, open plan kitchen/dining area enjoying a modern fitted kitchen with built in appliances plus a walk in larder and centre island, air conditioning and a separate utility room. The first floor features the master suite comprising of a spacious bedroom with balcony and separate sun terrace, walk in wardrobe and an en-site bathroom with separate shower. The independent guest villa features a large bedroom/ living room with wood burner, fitted kitchen and shower room. To the front of the property is a covered terrace and private garden. The gated driveway leads to the main property and garage. Alongside the swimming pool there is a separate guest suite comprising of a bedroom with en-suite shower room The gardens surrounding the guest villa and main residence are beautifully landscaped with displays of mature flowers, trees and shrubs, attractive seating areas and private walled gardens. The lower plot measuring approx 32,000m2, has over 600 trees including olive, fig and almond and could create an annual income. This idyllic country residence offers numerous possibilities to create a rural retreat, a home and income generated from holiday rentals, a bed and breakfast business or the perfect property to relax and enjoy as an extended family. A viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the individual style and superb location of this wonderful property. Approx 40 minutes from the beach and 45 minutes from Malaga airport.

A two bedroom house featuring a lounge, separate kitchen, fitted bathroom and possibility to build a staircase onto the spacious flat roof and create a roof terrace. Vehicle access to the property and walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. Located within the historical area of Velez Malaga and only 3kms from the beach and 35 minutes from Malaga airport. Energy performance certificate: Pending

Build Size 117m2 + 76m2 Terrace Penthouse. 3 Bedrooms. 2 Bathrooms. Swimming Pool. Tennis Court. Garage. A well presented penthouse featuring a spacious private terrace with stunning views and located within walking distance to the beach. The property features a spacious entrance hallway leading out onto a spectacular roof terrace with stunning views, modern fully fitted kitchen, a lounge/dining room with patio doors leading on to a private balcony with partial sea views, 3 bedrooms, modern fitted shower room and modern fitted family bathroom. The property benefits from a communal swimming pool, tennis court and is ideally located within walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport and is approximately 30 minutes from Malaga airport. All furniture included.

Build Size 125m2. Plot size 455m2 3 bedrooms. 2 bathrooms. Garage. Swimming pool. A beautifully presented house set within a large corner plot enjoying excellent country and mountain views. The property features an entrance hall way, spacious lounge/dining room with patio doors to the garden, a modern fitted kitchen, integral garage, two bathrooms and three double bedrooms. Set within beautifully landscaped gardens featuring well kept lawns, fruit trees, irrigation and privacy. Space to create additional parking area. Situated within a small urbanisation whilst enjoying the “feel” of a country property. Easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. Only 20 minutes from the beach, golf course and 50 minutes from Malaga airport. Furniture included. Energy Performance Certificate: F

93m2 Build Size. 3 bedrooms. A first floor apartment with private entrance featuring three double bedrooms, fitted kitchen, dining room, lounge, fitted bathroom and a terrace. Located within lower Velez Malaga on a quiet road with vehicle access. Easy level walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants and the bus station. Only 3kms from the beach and golf course and 45 minutes to Malaga airport.

Build Size: 518m2 Plot Size: 996m2 Luxurious Villa. 3 Bedrooms. 3 Bathrooms. Swimming Pool. Private Garage. Sauna. 1 Guest Apartment. Work Shop. This well presented villa features an independent guest apartment and is perfectly located only 500m from the beach, boasting excellent sea and mountain views. The main accommodation features a fully fitted kitchen, dining room, lounge with a wood fire/chimney and patio doors leading onto a private patio with views over the sea, mountains and private swimming pool, 3 double bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms, an office and a sauna with outside shower area. The guest apartment (currently being used as a gym) has two large bedrooms with the possibility of installing a shower/bathroom. This accommodation also benefits from sea and mountain views and is located close to the swimming pool. The property also features a private swimming pool, surrounding gardens separated on different levels of the property, various patio/terrace areas, a sauna, private garage and roof terrace with stunning views. The property is located 500m from the beach, 5 minutes from local bars, shop and restaurants, 10 minutes from Baviera golf and Añoreta golf courses and 25 minutes from Malaga Airport.

Build Size 100m2 A three bedroom detached country house set within a 10,000 m2 plot with excellent country and sea views. This detached property features: Ground Floor: Open plan lounge with kitchen area, 3 bedrooms and fitted bathroom. Second floor: Requires complete renovation and offers potential to create the same accommodation as floor below. Set within a plot measuring 10,000m2 with excellent views. Perfectly located only 5 minutes from the village, 15 minutes from the beach and golf course and 30 minutes from Malaga airport.

Build Size 166m2 Build size 166m2. 3 double bedrooms. 3 en-suite bathrooms. Fantastic sea and coastal views. A detached villa perfectly located close to Bentomiz Castle with superb sea and coastal views. This spacious property can be used as a main residence or divided into two semi detached properties to create a home and income. The accommodation features three double bedrooms with en-suites, lounge/dining room, modern fitted kitchen plus an additional guest room with lounge/American kitchen area leading onto a private porch. The property is situated within a plot measuring 5,000m2 and has it´s own well. Only 10 mintes from Algarobbo and Arenas villages and 15 minutes from the beach and Baviera golf course. Malaga airport is approx 45 minutes drive.

5 bedrooms. 5 bathrooms. Build size 206m2. Plot size 3,581m2. Swimming pool. A stunning country property, full of charm and character, located within the foothills of Sierra Tejeda, enjoying breathtaking country and mountain views. The main property features a large lounge/dining room with wood burner and pellet fire, fitted kitchen and 4 double bedrooms with en- suites. The first floor also has direct access into the house and enters directly into an independent studio apartment. The spacious first floor sun terrace is accessed via the landing and boasts beautiful views. Attached to the main house is a large garage with vaulted ceiling and storage areas above. The attractive covered terrace houses the outdoor kitchen, complete with barbecue and provides the perfect area for “al fresco” dining, The gardens feature a swimming pool, approx 100 fruit trees and a picturesque river flowing through the lower level. A detached wooden cabin features a lounge with kitchen area, dining room/terrace, en-suite shower room and creates an ideal area for guests. Additional features include solar panels and wooden windows with shutters. Located only 2.4 kms from Sedella and 1.9 kms from Salares and 20 minutes from Competa. The beach at Torre del Mar and Algarobbo is approx 40 minutes and Malaga airport is 1 hour 15 minutes. An excellent opportunity to create a home and income within rural tourism/bed and breakfast. The area attracts walkers, cyclists, twitchers and would be perfect as a yoga retreat. Anticipated income achievable for the en-suites with bed and breakfast is 60 - 80 euros per night. To rent the villa during high season, a rental income of between 1700-2000 euros per week is attainable. Energy Performance Certificate: G

Build Size 68m2 Village House. 1 Bedroom. 1 Bathroom. Patio A charming property located in a picturesque white village located only 2 km from the beach. This village house features a lounge, fitted kitchen, fitted bathroom, double bedroom and patio area. Ideally located close to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport. The beaches of Chilches and Benajarafe and Añoreta golf course are only a 5 minute drive and a 40 minute drive to Malaga airport. Good vehicle access and on street parking. Ideal holiday home.

Plot size 120m2. Build Size 138m2. Building Project. Fantastic opportunity to acquire an urban plot within the village of Almayate The foundations have already been constructed to build a three bedroom, two storey house. Ground Floor: 47m2. Entrance hallway with stairs to first floor, separate kitchen, lounge/dining room. First floor: 43m2. Three bedrooms, family bathroom and stair case to roof terrace. Roof terrace 40m2. Garage and storeroom 48m2. Perfect opportunity to construct a property tailored to your lifestyle and taste. Located only 2 kms from the beach and 35 minutes from Malaga airport.

An extremely spacious detached village house ideally situated on the edge of a picturesque village enjoying panoramic views over the surrounding countryside. Attractive covered veranda leads to:- A spacious entrance hallway with rustic style staircases. Doors from the entrance hallway lead to :- The lounge with double french doors onto a balcony with country views, air conditioning, and window to front aspect. Master bedroom features patio doors onto a balcony with country views, air conditioning, TV and wifi connection. Bedroom 2. Double bedroom . Window overlooking lemon groves. Kitchen. Fully fitted kitchen with good selection of base and wall units with work surfaces over and built in appliances including fitted ceramic hob, electric oven, refrigerator, freezer, washing machine and dishwasher. Shower room. Modern fitted shower room with double size shower. Stairs lead from the hallway down to another level-also ground floor as has independent access from side aspect. The accommodation is currently arranged as a large open plan living/dining/kitchen area. The kitchen area includes an oven with gas hob, sink and work surfaces plus a recently installed Butane gas hot water boiler. Patio doors lead onto a patio area which could also provide off street parking. An internal hallway leads to 3 double bedrooms and a shower room. Build Size:143m2 Plot Size: 7,254m2. 3 bedrooms. Two bathrooms. Gas central heating. Double glazing. Sea, countryside and Mountain views. Good vehicle access. A wrought iron gates leads to the villa and parking area. The main garden surrounding the villa is fenced and features attractive displays of mature flowers, trees and shrubs. Within the rear garden is a detached outbuilding divided into two rooms. The first room houses the gas boiler plus offers additional storage space, the second room houses the gas bottles for the central heating plus ample room for storage. The property has mains water from Sedella plus a water deposit. The lower level garden is full of grape vines, olive and almond trees. The panoramic views are breathtaking over the surrounding countryside, impressive Maroma mountain and distant sea views. Perfectly located only 150 metres along an excellent track accessible in any vehicle. Beautifully renovated cortijo plus guest house set alongside the national park enjoying spectacular sea, mountains and countryside views. now reduced for a quick sale! Detached Spanish farmhouse with swimming pool plus a detached ruin with orchard. Located on the edge of the village. Behind the ruin is an orchard filled with trees including oranges, pomegranate, pears, figs, olives and lemons. The main property has mains electric, mains water, telephone and internet connections and is perfectly situated on the edge of this pretty white village. Stairs lead down to three double bedrooms, two of which have fantastic sea views and a modern fitted bathroom. Staircase from bedroom three leads down to an independent apartment/guest suite featuring a lounge/kitchen, double bedroom and modern fitted shower room. Door from the apartment leads directly to the communal gardens and communal swimming pool. This beautifully presented town house is built over three levels however has two ground floors to the front and rear maintaining easy access either from the front or rear of the property. An ideal property for those seeking a low maintenence property close to the beach with excellent sea views and terraces.

1 bedroom. 1 bathroom. sun terrace. seaviews. A beautifully renovated village house featuring a spacious sun terrace with excellent sea, mountain and countryside views. The accommodation is distributed over various levels and features a new modern fitted kitchen with built in electric oven, hob and fridge freezer, a dining room, lounge with wood burning stove, a modern fitted shower room enjoying a walk in corner shower, a double bedroom and an en-suite toilet. Alongside the property there are three rooms which could easily be renovated and connected to the main house, or to create independent guest accommodation. The property also enjoys a small patio plus a large roof terrace with superb views. A charming village property located only 30 minutes from the beach and golf course and 55 minutes from Malaga airport. Viewing highly recommended to appreciate this beautiful village house and breath taking views.

A spacious detached country house enjoying excellent sea, mountain and, countryside views and ideally situated only 500 metres from bars and restaurants. The property features an entrance hallway, lounge/dining room with air conditioning and a fireplace housing a pellet fire and back boiler servicing the radiators/central heating throughout the house. Patio doors from the lounge lead onto the large covered terrace. Modern fitted ground floor bathroom, large fully fitted kitchen with good selection of base and eye level units with granite worktops and built in appliances and a separate dining room/ double bedroom. Stairs lead to the first floor landing with access to a spacious first floor terrace with superb countryside and sea views. The first floor accommodation features three double bedrooms, a modern fitted shower room plus a separate cloakroom. The surrounding land features a swimming pool, shower room/utility room, barbecue area and is full of mature plants, flowers, trees and shrubs complementing the natural beauty of the dramatic countryside. A gated driveway leads to a covered carport with ample parking. Additional features include fitted mosquito nets and air conditioning. Perfectly situated in an elevated position overlooking the picturesque hamlet of Los Venterros and walking distance to bars and restaurants. The white village of Comares is only a 5 minute drive and the beach is 35 minutes. Malaga airport is approx a 1 hour 10 minute drive. A perfect country residence with superb views, enjoying peace and tranquillity yet walking distance to bars and restaurants.

A fantastic top floor apartment enjoying spectacular views over the beach, sea and coastline to Malaga. This modern apartment features an entrance hallway, modern fitted kitchen, large lounge/dining room leading onto a west facing balcony with fantastic sea views. The apartment also features two double bedrooms, a modern fitted bathroom and underground garage space. Located within a quiet road only 200 metres from the beach and walking distance to shops, bars and restaurants. Only a 5 minute drive to Añoreta golf course and a 10 minute drive from Baviera golf course. Malaga airport is approx 30 minutes plus there is an excellent coastal bus service. An excellent property to provide a holiday home plus generate an income from rentals. Furniture negotiable.

A single story village house plus two independent properties, ideally located on the edge of the white village of Periana. The main property comprises of :- A spacious lounge/dining room with wood burning stove, fitted kitchen with built in appliances, three double bedrooms and a modern fitted shower room. 2nd Property features:- A large lounge/dining room with wood burner, independent fitted kitchen and modern fitted bathroom. Currently used as an office but would create an ideal studio apartment. 3rd Property includes:- Independent Street Access. An entrance hallway, lounge/dining room with wood burning stove, modern fitted kitchen, double bedroom with en-suite shower room and a large first floor roof terrace with sea and lake glimpses and fantastic country and mountain views. The enclosed garden is easy to maintain and features a pergola and attractive displays of flowers, trees and shrubs. To the side aspect of the main property there is a courtyard/patio with access to Property 2. This spacious property offers numerous possibilities including a home with income potential from rentals/ holiday lettings, creating an independent business unit or providing the perfect home for an extended family. Ideally located on the edge of this picturesque white village and easy walking distance to shops, bars, restaurants, banks and village swimming pool. A detached country property which has been completely renovated by the present owners. The accommodation features a spacious lounge with attractive arched windows, a well fitted kitchen with a good selection of base and eye level units with granite worktops and breakfast bar area leading into a dining room with exposed beam ceiling, three double bedrooms with exposed beams, two well fitted bathrooms complete with double sink units and baths with showers over. All rooms enjoy hot/cold air conditioning units. The main garden features a 10m x 5m swimming pool with excellent country, sea and mountain views, a barbecue area, attractive terracing, displays of mature flowers, trees and shrubs and a detached storeroom. A pergola covers the terrace leading from the lounge and overlooks the pool and excellent views. Direct access from the road leading onto the private driveway. This rustic style country property also enjoys a private well and two water deposits. The high vaulted ceilings and exposed beams add to the charm and character of this beautiful home. Located only 5 minutes below the White village of Comares and 10 minutes from Benamargosa. The beach and golf course are a 30 minute drive and Malaga airport approx 1 hour.

A one bedroom town house situated within the beautiful white village of Almachar. The ground floor accommodation features a lounge, kitchen, rear courtyard with wash hand basin and a shower room. A detached villa perfectly located on the edge of an urbanisation and only 2kms from the centre of Nerja and a 5 minute walk to the beach. XL1360 A beautifully presented country property built to a high specification and enjoying breathtaking panoramic views over the surrounding mountains and countryside. The main accommodation comprises of:- Open plan dining room, living room, additional reception and study room all featuring vaulted ceilings with beams. The kitchen features a good selection of base and eyelevel units with a built in dishwasher, electric oven, gas hob and integrated fridge freezer. French doors from the kitchen lead onto the interior courtyard with stairs onto a roof terrace with spectacular views. The property also benefits from UPVC double glazing,mosquito nets, oil fired central heating throughout via radiators and mains water.( plus a 24,000 litre water deposit ). The lower level (74m2) has a garage with store room housing the oil fired central heating boiler, utility room, additional store room with wash basin and several other rooms, which could easily be converted to create separate living accommodation. The attractive gardens boast a swimming pool plus numerous mature flowers, trees and shrubs with various terraces and patios. A prominent feature of the property, is the large veranda, perfect for “alfresco dining” or to create outdoor living space. Good vehicle access in any car from the main road. This stunning large private 5 bedroom villa sits in the sought after mountain pueblo urbanisation of Voltocado. Unconventional and ultramodern one-of-a-kind villa designed by the renowned architect Angela Taborna, who has incorporated a ship´s theme throughout this south-facing villa in Altos de la Quinta, overlooking the golf course, the surrounding terrain and the sea. Dramatic juxtaposition of contrasting materials such as highly polished marble and slate with authentic antique railroad sleepers plus oblique room configurations combine to create an elegant yet somehow comfortably casual ambience throughout all three levels. Extensive use of glass in unusual locations provides an abundance of natural lighting. Integrated into the main level is an indoor-outdoor heated pool surrounded on the inside by a spacious gymnasium with sauna and on the outside by one of seven sun terraces. The non-standard shape and somewhat open design of the house provides for several large living rooms, a home cinema and quiet and cosy conversation corners.

At the top of a sweeping driveway sits this Elegant Country residence in Monda which is a 12 minute drive from Marbella. The property enjoys fantastic view of rolling countryside filled with Olive trees. Offers 4 bedrooms all ensuite, fully fitted luxury dining kitchen. Open lounge / Dining room with big open fireplace. The Villa was designed and built by Argentinian designer famous for his Italian flair Burgos. Beautiful matured gardens with heated kidney shaped swimming pool. The whole estate sits in 14,000 m2 of land mostly olive tress which are farmed by local farmers in return for Olive oil. The Villa throughout has a charmed romantic homely rustic feel and really needs to be viewed to be appreciated as no photos can possibly reproduce the elegant feel off this Villa. Monda is a tiny town (or large village) in the mountains just inland from the Costa del Sol.
The charming Village of Monda is situated past Ojén on the A-355, it lies a mountain valley at 365m and has a population of less than 2,000. It is well-linked by road with Marbella, just 15km away, as well as Coin and Cartama (for Malaga). Thanks to development on the nearby coast over the last few decades, the town has enjoyed new prosperity. The village's dominant feature, which stands out for miles around, is the large stone building which stands atop the tree-covered hill above the village. Although this resembles a fortification, it is in fact a superbly-located and traditionally-styled modern hotel, Castillo de Monda, built on the site of the Moorish Castillo de Al-Mundat.

Beautiful And Spacious Townhouse In Santa María Golf, Marbella East
Beautiful and spacious townhouse located in a gated complex with only 10 houses in Santa María Golf, a few minutes from the golf course, shopping centre, banks, restaurants, etc. The urbanization has communal gardens and swimming pool. The house enjoys west orientation and communal parking space. The property is distributed as follows: Main floor with large living room with fireplace, access to the terrace and private garden and direct access to the communal area and swimming pool. On the same floor there is a guest toilet and wide kitchen. On the First floor we find three bedrooms and two bathrooms, the master bedroom with en suite bathroom.

Spectacular, south facing, 5 bed, 5 bath villa with great sea and mountain views located in the highly desirable urbanisation of El Rosario a few minutes drive from Marbella. The property is in an impeccable technical condition and the finishes and materials used are of the highest standards. The main living area is on two levels and comprises on the garden level of entrance courtyard, spacious hallway with skylight, a huge split level lounge/diner with ceiling high windows, fireplace, open plan fitted kitchen, two double guest bedrooms with en suite bathrooms and a guest cloakroom. On the exterior is a large covered terrace leading out on to tropical gardens with an infinity swimming pool which is heated,and has a wave machine and automatic cover. On the upper level there is the master bedroom suite which features a vaulted ceiling,a spacious bath and shower room and has its own covered terrace with panoramic views. There is also another double guest bedroom with en suite bathroom. On the entry level there is a self contained one bedroom apartment with kitchen, bathroom and lounge, with its own entrance, a garage for 3 cars, a fully equipped gym, store room, utility room and machine room. All levels are connected by a lift. Additional features include under floor heating through out, individual hot & cold A/C units through out, sensurround, WI-FI, Sat TV in every room all of which can be zoned individually, security system throughout with perimeter alarm, programmable external lighting, electric entry gates and finally a fish pond stocked with Koi Carp! Defiantly a property for the discerning buyer.

This wonderful four bedroom Mediterranean style detached villa, located in a great are on the ascending property market of our sunny coast, represents great value for money. The property is situated within one of the longest established residential Elviria’s areas of “Las Cumbres”, close to all local facilities on foot and a very short drive to any of the sandy beaches of Marbella East. Built in 1986 and refurbished by current owner 8 years ago, with proven high rental potential over the years, facing east, from the main living area on the upper floor and the ground level there are open panoramic views to enjoy towards the neighbourhood, greenery, the Mediterranean Sea, including Africa and Gibraltar on a clear day. Built on two levels, all the bedrooms are on the lower garden level, the new kitchen and a massive lounge with a wood-burning fireplace are on the upper floor as well as the access to the property. The plot hosts a big tiled patio to park several cars easy to convert into a covered carport or a garage on the main level, a great pool with BBQ and a shower corner, mature plants and lawn surrounding the whole house on the lower level; the simplicity is the way this house is manifesting its outstanding elegance.

1 Bed 1 Bath en Suite, Penthouse with 31 m2 terrace private pool and perfect view, front line beach.

This stunning townhouse situated in Guadalmina Alta front line golf is called “La Casa Azul”. La Casa Azul sits in a beautiful gated community of 18 Andalusian town houses all painted in gorgeous Mediterranean colours built around a calming swimming pool. Walking through the wrought iron gates you are welcomed by the unique pale blue house with pure white cornicing, parking for up to 2 cars and a selection of different seating areas to capture the evening sun. As you enter the property you look up to the unique dome reflected by large mirrors that houses an elegant crystal chandelier that alone oozes class. The double doors lead through to the open plan living area with a unique bio alcohol fire bowl placed in a cream marble fireplace built into a bay window. The second bay is home to the dining area – leading to the white lacquer kitchen with travertine work tops and built in appliances – all the very best including a built in coffee machine and American fridge freezer with plumbed in ice and water machine. Part of the kitchen is the orangery that can be used as a breakfast/ study area which pours in the fabulous day light. The downstairs also benefits a guest W.C all in marble and even soft close toilet seat, not forgetting the surround sound music system that follows you throughout the house in every room, even in the walk in wardrobe. All the floors throughout this unique home are warmed by under floor heating for those cosy winter nights! Walking through the living room double doors on to the garden is sensational! The travertine tiles are followed through for easy maintenance and this garden even has a bar/ kitchen with Gas BBQ, Sink, dishwasher and fridge freezer! This is why we call it the ‘barden’. Not stopping there, the corner has its own usable open fireplace with LCD plasma and speakers that can be enjoyed by a numerous seating areas or relaxing on the chill out bed! Even though the garden is private and secluded by banana trees, it is raised to the front line golf position with views to La Concha mountain. The House has 2 large bedrooms with their own marble bathrooms, the master being a splash room with walk in wardrobe fitted out with a champagne fridge. The bedrooms are fitted with perspective laminate flooring and have the luxury of AC for those hot summers nights. All have LCD plasmas even the master en-suite along with ceiling mounted speakers. This Villa is one of the largest and oldest residences on the island of Ibiza, perched on the side of a hill overlooking the quiet countryside of the pla de Portmany with its beautiful seaviews. This magnificent property on 36.320m2 land, consists of 1560m2 living space, some outbuildings, a beautiful wine cellar (former oil mill) and a caretakers house, all set in a mature garden with century old trees and orange orchards alongside fragrant lemon and cherry trees and its ecological vegetables plantation.The front doorsteps lead up through the outside porch into the impressive entrance hall with its’ minstrel gallery and large stone fireplace. To the left of the entrance on the ground floor, there is a large living room with an antique fireplace and a library. The library leads to the walled-in romantic garden courtyard with its fresh water fountain with the trickling water and coolness, how wouldn’t want to breakfast here?. The living room leads out onto a terrace, the formal gardens and then onto the vast original swimming pool (deep enough to dive!), which has a purpose built bar and barbecue area and a separate shower, bathroom and changing area. To the right of the entrance on the ground floor there is a large dining room (with an intimate separate cigar room with fireplace) and (semi-professional) spacious ‘en-suite’ kitchen. There is an antique wooden staircase on each side of the entrance hall leading up to the butler’s office and self-contained suite on the mezzanine and onto the first floor, where two of the suites (with walk-in closets) and one extra bedroom are to be found, all with en-suite bathrooms. This staircase also leads you on to the large covered verandah on the first floor. The entrance hall has a passage (with another three bedrooms, all with bathrooms), connecting the main building to the guest area The guest area has its own lounge which gives access to another three beautiful bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms. This area can also be reached by a separate access road. All guestrooms have private access to the pool area. The front of the property faces south, providing throughout the day a continuously good light from when the sun rises in the east to it setting in the west. There is quick access to town, with its nautical club, moorings up to modern standards, schools, medical center, restaurants and its world famous sunset.The airport, international hospital and the capital of Ibiza is only 15-20 minutes away.

Villa L´Africaine, a modern interpretation of Moresque architecture, is located in the upper section of Sotogrande, and has its totally private South facing gardens bordered by a stream (arroyo) and the protected green zone at the foothills of San Roque golf course. The house has direct access to the green zone with its dominating array of mature Eucalyptus, Pine and Cork trees, giving the residents a sense of country living whilst having all the conveniences of Sotogrande life. The villa is designed in an L shape, with a corner tower which has 8 meter high ceilings. The decoration of the tower ceilings, most of the interior doors and the zellige mosaic surrounding the pool were done by hand, by a team of Moroccan artisans brought to Spain to complete the project. The villa also features antique African pillars on the upstairs landing, 2 sets of 19th century Spanish doors, Indonesian pillars into the study, and hydraulic tiles in the bathrooms. The floors are of hand made, Roman style terracotta, each tile being individually triple waxed to give an aged appearance. All of the doors are double glazed and made of wood. The house has gas central heating with concealed radiators and 2 individual electric air-conditioning/heating units. One wing the house offers a large reception area with a wood burning fireplace and a domed ceiling cupola room followed by a large utility/bonus room which could be easily transformed to serve a different purpose; and a large master suite with walk in closet. The other wing comprises a small hall, dining area and kitchen, a family sitting area with a second wood burning fireplace, a study and a second master suite. The upstairs has 2 further bedrooms with shower rooms en-suite. The terraces all face onto the pool which is heated by 6 solar panels. The garden features a circular wrought iron dining pergola, and a separate barbecue area which is next to the garden room, built to house garden machinery. The house also has automatic sprinklers and a large semi-basement area with 2 large windows which is currently being used as a gym.

Country finca situated in the area known as Velerin in a hidden valley east of Estepona, in an area of exceptional beauty and tranquillity, on a large plot of 240,000 square metres which has a garden, an orchard, vegetable garden, and a plantation of mango, fig, olive and avocado trees.
