Upstairs Master Bedroom with full en- suite facilites and 2 further guest bedrooms and a family bathroom. To the next floor with a lovely sunny Day Lounge with access to the Roof Terrace with Jacuzzi and lovely views out to sea. The basement currently consists of 2 bedrooms with a complete bathroom a lagre storeage /office room and entrance to the Garage.

ABSOLUTELY STUNNING Brand New South Facing 5 Bedroom Villa each with full en-suite facilities. Amazing panoramic views along the coast and over to Africa. Built to the highest standards with many features including Underfloor Heating throughout the villa and luxury fittings in abundance. Decorative ceilings with hidden lighting, Hydro Massage showers in all bathrooms. The Italien fitted kitchen come complete with all quality appliances as well as a central Island unit. Full inteligence home and individually controlled Air Conditioning. Ouside there is an infinity swimming pool with internal LCD lighting, tropical gardens, numerous covered and open terraces as well as a double garage. A substantially built modern villa with an exclusive design which we would highly recommend an internal inspection.

South Facing 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Townhouse in Colina del las Joyas, Estepona. Established gated community ideally situated for Golf and only a 5 minutes drive from Estepona with its wide selection of Shops, Bars, and Restaurants. The accomodation consists of on the ground floor Kitchen, Lounge, Dining Room and Guest WC, access to the private garden area. Upstairs 2 bedrooms both with full en-suite the master having a balcony. To the next level there is a large solarium with a BBQ/Kitchenette room which could easily be converted into an additional Bedroom/Office. The property has lovely views from all floors over La Resina Golf Club and out to sea. The urbanisation has well kept gardens and a large community pool.

PUERTA LOS REALES | ESTEPONA
A beautiful rustic style villa nicely settled on a big plot. Just a few minutes from Estepona (road to Jubrique). Spectacular 180' panoramic views over the coast and the Mediterranean. The property offers a lot of privacy and tranquility. South facing, built in 1999.
Distribution Main floor: Cosy living room with fireplace and direct access to covered terraces and the pool area, fully fitted kitchen with an American fridge freezer and Siemens appliances, two guest bedrooms sharing one bathroom.
Upper floor: Master bedroom en suite.
Lower floor, garden level: Big entertainment area (second living area), could also be third guest bedroom and bathroom. Possible to create more bedrooms. Garage for 2 cars.
Mature garden with BBQ and lounge area at the private swimming pool.
Electric heaters, pre-installation for central heating, fireplace, sat.tv, alarm, rustic floors.
Furniture not included.
Only a few minutes drive from Estepona centre and to the beach (3 km).

ABSOLUTELY LOVELY Spaciuus South Facing 2 bedroom 2 bathroom garden apartment in the popular Andalucia Garden Club. Within walking distance of Centro Plaza and Puerto Banus. On entering the urbanisation via large electric gates the properties are only 2 stories high offering a lovely peacefull yet convenient location. The accomodation is accessed via a lovely terrace to the front door and once inside, you realise that this is one of the larger style apartments in the complex with a huge 45m2 lounge and dining room with natural fireplace. Recently refurbished with new windows, doors and rewiring throughout, it also benefits from a brand new kitchen with granite worktops. The bathrooms have been fitted out with cream marble with the guest bathroom having a shower. The main living area is impressive and leads out onto covered and uncovered terraces which in turn lead onto the lawned communal gardens giving you more space to relax and unwind. There are two large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a further bathroom. With the added bonus of air conditioning and electric shutter blinds. The community offers a large Swimming Pool with separate Childrens pool suberbly maintained Gardens and a flood lit tennis court.
A property in a great location that is well worth an internal inspection.

VERY LARGE DUPLEX APARTMENT This South Facing 4 bedrooms 5 Bathrooms ground floor duplex has some 221m2 of living space and 200m2 of both covered and open terrace as well as a small private garden area. The Urbanisation Lunymar Golf is a small developemnt of only 54 units and offers 24hr security. Situated next to La Resina Golf and Country Club. With spectacular views to the African coast and very close to the Natural Park Selwo. An enclave of peace and tranquility where one can enjoy the Mediterranean climate, soft temperatures, sunshine and a unique luminosity all year round. With central heating, air conditioning, marble flooors, double glazing, kitchen, ample wardrobes, storage room and under ground car parking for 3 cars. Communal gymnasium, pool sand garden.

This one of a kind plot of 5,842 M2, with an older, rustic-style country villa, is located in Los Almendros, off the Ronda road and just 2 km behind San Pedro de Alcántara. It is as close to peace, quiet and nature as you can get, yet only minutes from beaches, Puerto Banús, Marbella, and all that the Costa del Sol has to offer. It is completely private and also great for relaxed family living.The uniquely large plot of 5,842 m2 is flat and 100% usable, on two levels. The plot has been granted permission to build up to 1,166 m2 of residential construction, with plenty of room left for whatever your heart desires. The top level, for the principal residence and gardens, has direct access from the road. The lower level has an additional separate access and can be used for tennis court, animals, kitchen garden, orchard or more construction.
With all day sun and valley views, this south-facing property has a year-round freshwater stream and borders on a permanent green zone and nature preserve.
The existing villa was built in 1974, and requires refurbishment or enlargement. Also can build new to your own taste and specification, up to 1,166m2.

Rustic-style south facing villa located in Los Almendros, off the Ronda Road and just 2 km behind San Pedro. A one off property offering peace & quiet. In a natural setting, yet only minutes from beaches, Puerto Banús, Marbella, and all that the Coast has to offer. If privacy and relaxed family living is what you cherish, you must see to appreciate! The uniquely large plot of 5,842 m2 is flat and 100% usable, on two levels. The plot size allows up to 1,166 m2 of residential construction, with plenty of room left for whatever your heart desires. The top level, for the principal residence and gardens, has direct access from the main road. The lower level also has main road access and can be used for tennis court, animals, kitchen garden, orchard or more construction. With all day sun and valley views, the property has a year-round freshwater stream and borders onto a nature preserve.
The country villa is 184 m2 built, 2 bedrooms en suite, fitted kitchen, dining room and lounge with fireplace. Built in 1974, it requires refurbishment. Or enlarge or build new to your own taste and specification, up to 1,166m2. Located in a high-end community, your value is well protected. A certified Appraisal (pretasación) was made in September of 2010, with a price given of 1,150,000 Euros.

CHARMING 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom Private Villa situated in Valle Romano. The Golf course of Valle Romano is only a short distance away as well as the town and port of Estepona. This beautifully presented property has been loving renovated and offers many unique features including a quality fully fitted kitchen, log burner, vaulted ceilings and a fabulous Master Suite. The accommodation comprises of Lounge with Dining Area, fully fitted Kitchen, and Large Master Suite complete with a dressing room and en suite. Guest Bedroom with en suite with access to the private pool and Gardens a further Bedroom and a family Bathroom. Outside there is a 2 car garage, Roof Terrace, Alfresco Dining Terraces and lovely mature gardens.

URB. PUERTO DEL CAPITAN
Beautiful 6-bedroom villa in Puerto del Capitan. Southwest facing with spectacular views to the coast and the Mediterranean.
Built on two floors.
Living room with fireplace, fully fitted kitchen with dining area, laundry area, guest toilet, two guest bedrooms and a bathroom, garage for one car, covered terrace, private garden and heated pool, chill out area.
Big master bedroom suite with terrace, two guest bedroom and two bathrooms and a study (the study could be a 6th bedroom).
Under floor heating in bathrooms, kitchen and living room, A/C with heating, alarm, gated community with cameras, security at night.
Nearby all amenities, a few minutes to the beach, shopping, golf and Puerto Banus/Marbella
A great property, value for money !

FANTASTIC OPPORTUNITY to buy one of the nicest Penthouse apartments in Alcazaba Beach! This totally refurbished and modernized 2 bedroom penthouse could also be converted into a 3 bedroom. The 5 different seating areas on the many spacious terraces offer beautiful sea -and mountain views, both downstairs (30 m2) and upstairs on the roof terrace (100 m2). The South and West facing terraces are partly covered with new wood pergolas. This penthouse has been very well maintained with new air conditioning hot/cold, new kitchen with built in appliances, new sliding doors with double glazing and wood floors throughout, new terracing, pergolas and tiling. Alcazaba Beach is undoubtedly one of the nicest beachfront urbanizations on the Costa del Sol, and with the most beautiful prizewinning tropical gardens also referred to as "the Caribbean of Europe". 7 pools with 1 heated outdoor pool, 24 hour security with cameras and guards, restaurant by the sea, 5 tennis courts, 2 paddle tennis courts, fitness and sauna´s, children playground with football and basketball, etc. All at walking distance from the town, restaurants and shops. This Penthouse is highly recommended for viewing. A unique opportunity!

Immaculate South facing, two bedroom, 2 bathroom first floor apartment in the 24hr gated community of 72 luxury apartments known as Albatross Hill Club. Situated in the Golf Valley and within easy reach of Puerto Banus. This well maintained community has excellent facilities including lush tropical gardens, two swimming pools, sauna, fully equipped gym, tennis court and a clubhouse. The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully equipped kitchen with utility room; bright and spacious lounge with fireplace and access to a large, partially covered terrace with impressive sea, and mountain views, master suite and ensuite guest bedroom. Features include hot and cold A/C, electric blinds, under floor heating throughout and video door entry. There is underground parking for one car and a storage room included in the price.
Features 24 hrs Security System, 3 Community Pools, 5-10 minutes to shops, Alarm System, Built to High Standards, Children´s Pool, Clubhouse, Community Garden, Conveniently Situated for Golf, Covered Terrace, Electric Blinds, Exclusive Development, Featured Property, Fireplace, Fitted Wardrobes, Gated Complex, Gym, Heated Indoor Pool, Immaculate Condition, Landscaped Gardens, Laundry room, One Level, Open Fireplace, Pre-installed Air-Conditioning, Prestige Fitted Kitchen, Underfloor Heating, Underground parking, Utility Room, Video entry system, Well maintained community.

An excellent south facing, first floor three bedroom apartment located in arguably the most exclusive urbanisation in Aloha Park in the heart of the Golf Valley, a five minute drive to Puerto Banus and within easy reach of a whole host of leisure facilities. Surrounded by a pine forest, this luxurious 24 hour gated and secure community has exotic tropical gardens, gymnasium and two swimming pools, one of which is indoors and heated. The accommodation consists of :- large entrance hall; guest cloakroom; very spacious lounge and dining room with French windows leading out to a covered terrace with Jacuzzi. Fully equipped and fitted kitchen; utility room; two guest bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and ample walk in wardrobes; master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom and direct access to the sunny terrace. A truly fantastic example of a stunning 3 bedroomed apartment.
High quality finishes and design with under floor heating throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, video entry system, underground parking for two and a large storeroom

Incredible six bedroom family Villa situated in a privileged location close to Alhaurin el Grande within beautiful natural surroundings providing peace, privacy and tranquillity. This immaculate villa consists of a main house with a separate guest house, outdoor kitchen/ BBQ, huge heated covered swimming pool and magnificent automatically irrigated and illuminated landscaped gardens. In addition the property offers a flood lit tennis court. The villa boasts uninterrupted panoramic views to the surrounding mountains. The property is located 35 minutes drive from Marbella and with easy access to Malaga Airport, situated only 15 minutes away.
The main villa offers a spacious master suite with separate walk in wardrobe and en-suite featuring a Jacuzzi bath and separate shower and access onto a private terrace. On the main floor of the property there is a prestige fully fitted dining kitchen with separate utility room, guest toilet, formal lounge with working fireplace and access to a large terrace and a family suite consisting of 2 bedrooms with en-suite leading to a conservatory lounge. Downstairs there is a guest en-suite bedroom, home cinema room with feature bar, additional kitchen, storeroom and shower room.
Outside there is a separate guest house comprising of 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms and a living room with open plan fully fitted kitchen. Finally for perfect entertainment the property enjoys a barbecue house with Pizza Oven and an al fresco dining area all situated within the stunning landscaped gardens next to the large swimming pool. The Villa is fitted with a central music system, individual A/C hot & cold units, central heating, alarm system and satellite television.
Finally the property enjoys a water well with three storage tanks, a well stocked vegetable garden and ample parking for many vehicles all set within a stunning gated oasis.

Unique three bedroom semi-detached south facing villa situated in a private gated community of only three properties situated within walking distance of Aloha College and Puerto Banús. There are a variety of restaurants and shops in the area and Aloha Golf Club is also situated within close proximity. Recently refurbished to a high standard, the property boasts a brand new kitchen, spacious lounge with fireplace, master bedroom with brand new en-suite bathroom, two guest bedrooms and additional new family bathroom. The property offers well maintained mature gardens with a large selection of fruit trees, barbeque area, large terrace and private swimming pool. There is also a carport and additional parking for up to three vehicles. The house benefits from no community fees which is a major advantage for such a prestigious area. Further features include marble floors, air conditioning, sun shades and security gates. A great family home in an excellent location!

Immaculate four bedroom family villa situated in the prestigious Urbanisation of Las Chapas, only 50 metres from the beach. Marbella town centre is only a five minute car journey away and there are various golf courses within the area. Accomodation comprises of main entrance which opens onto a spacious lounge / dining area with drect access to a large terrace overlooking the beautiful gardens and swimming pool area, fully fitted kitchen, guest toilet and double bedroom with ensuite bathroom. Upstairs there are two large bedrooms both with ensuite bathrooms and access to a large terrace with superb views to the sea. Downstairs in the basement there is also staff accomodation and a garage. The property is surrounded by beatifully maintained gardens with a large orivate swimming pool. Further features include marble floors, air conditioning and blinds. A fantastic family home in an excellent beachside location!

DUPLEX PENTHOUSE IN URB. ALCAZABA BEACH NEW GOLDEN MILE | ESTEPONA
Spacious and beautifull quality penthouse, south facing, seaviews from the upper terrace.
Mainfloor: Living/dining area with direct access to the terrace, fully fitted kitchen with laundry area, one guest bedroom suite and another guest bedroom with separate bathroom.
Upper floor: Master bedroom suite with dressing area, big terrace with bbq and seaviews.
Two parking spaces and a storage room.
Marble floors, A/C with heating, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, sat.tv. Furniture negotiable.
Upmarket gated beachfront complex with 24hrs security.
Several outdoor pools, fitness, social club in summer, beautiful community gardens.
Very close to all amenites and the town centre of Estepona. Walking distance.

One of the best plots of land situated in a privileged position in the prestigious development of Los Flamingos golf. The plot benefits from breathtaking panoramic views across the golf course to the sea and is located within close proximity of the exclusive five star Villa Padierna Hotel. There is a project in place to construct a superb south facing villa and the neighbouring plot is also for sale. A fantastic opportunity to purchase a large piece of land in a prime location.

Incredible brand new seven bedroom south facing family villa situated in a privileged position in the exclusive area of Los Flamingos Golf offering breathtaking panoramic views along the entire coast line. The property has been built to an extremely high standard and is situated within close proximity of the exclusive five star Villa Padierna Hotel. The property is accessed via a grand entrance leading into the main open plan living area which features a spectacular large spiral staircase leading to upper levels. The spacious lounge opens out onto an enormous south facing terrace with direct access down to the garden and swimming pool area. On this level there is a large kitchen, cloakroom, ensuite guest bedroom and an additional room which could be used as an office. Upstairs there is an impressive master bedroom with his and hers ensuite bathrooms and dressing rooms and two further ensuite double bedrooms.
The upper level is dedicated entirely to a large roof terrace with a separate changing room with shower facilities. The basement comprises of home cinema room, two large rooms which could be used as a gymnasium and games room and staff quarters with ensuite bedroom, lounge and kitchen facilities. The staff quarters can be accessed separately via the large three car garage. In addition the property offers a large American style swimming pool with Jacuzzi. Further features include under floor heating throughout, solar panels, air conditioning and a lift which services all floors. A truly exceptional property in a prestigious location!

Traditional five bedroom family villa situated in the tranquil community of Sun Beach only a few minutes walking distance from the beach. The Villa has been constructed over two floors with two separate living areas. The property is entered via the upstairs floor which comprises of a small entrance hall, fully fitted kitchen, lounge with access to a private south facing terrace, three bedrooms and two bathrooms. A staircase leads down to the lower level which offers completely independent living accommodation with its own fully fitted kitchen, two bedrooms, one of which has a separate dressing area, bathroom, garage and lounge with direct access to the mature gardens and large oasis shaped swimming pool. The property would benefit from some refurbishment but is a great opportunity to buy a beachside villa in an excellent location!

Fabulous duplex penthouse apartment situated in the exclusive frontline beach urbanisation of Alcazaba Beach in Estepona within walking distance of the town centre and close to all amenities. This luxury community offers residents seven swimming pools, one of which is heated, five tennis courts, four paddle tennis courts, 24 hour security, a children´s play area, communal gymnasium with sauna and a restaurant on site. The apartment has been beautifully furnished throughout to a high standard. Accommodation comprises of two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, prestige fully equipped kitchen with separate utility room and spacious lounge/ dining room. Upstairs there is a master bedroom suite with a large terrace. Further features include under floor heating in all of the bathrooms, air conditioning and satellite TV. Included in the price are two underground parking spaces and a storage room.

Immaculate two bedroom south facing apartment situated within the exclusive gated community of Los Altos de La Quinta. This secure development is located in an elevated position within La Quinta Golf and country Club only a five minute car journey from Puerto Banus and offers residents beautiful well maintained communal gardens with a large swimming pool. Accommodation comprises of entrance lobby; spacious lounge/dining area with direct access to a private covered terrace with stunning panoramic golf and sea views; fully fitted kitchen with separate utility room, master bedroom with access to the terrace, further bedroom and two modern bathrooms. Further features include marble floors, air conditioning and fitted wardrobes.

Immaculate two bedroom penthouse apartment situated in the exclusive community of Toscana Hills in Estepona, only a ten minute drive from Puerto Banus. This secure gated community offers twenty four hour security, beautiful landscaped gardens and a large swimming pool. Accommodation consists of two double bedrooms, fully fitted prestige kitchen, spacious lounge/ dining area, two modern bathrooms and a very large roof terrace providing spectacular views across the coast. Further features include air conditioning, a fully installed alarm system and a built in barbeque on the roof terrace. The apartment is sold fully furnished and there is a large underground parking space and storeroom included in the price.

Fantastic ground floor two bedroom apartment situated in the exclusive gated community of Le Village in the heart of the Golf Valley within close proximity of several golf courses and only a five minute car journey from Puerto Banús. This luxurious development offers a large exterior swimming pool, indoor heated pool, clubhouse, paddle tennis court and gymnasium. Accommodation comprises of entrance hall, brand new fully fitted kitchen, spacious lounge with direct access to the terrace, master en-suite bedroom, guest bedroom and guest cloakroom with shower. The property has been recently renovated to a very high standard and is sold unfurnished.

Fantastic three bedroom townhouse situated in the popular community of Los Naranjos de Marbella within walking distance of a selection of amenities including cafes, schools and a large supermarket. Both Aloha Golf Club and Puerto Banus are also within walking distance. The house has been fully refurbished and is presented in immaculate condition. The property can be accessed directly via the garage or the front entrance leading to a spacious lounge and dining room, guest toilet and fully fitted kitchen with separate laundry room and large patio area with wooden decking and private garden. On the first floor there is the master bedroom suite with private terrace, ensuite bathroom and dressing area, further ensuite bedroom and library. The second floor comprises of a third bedroom, family bathroom and office. Further features include a fully installed alarm system, air conditioning, mosquito screens and security blinds. An ideal family home in a fantastic central location!

Fantastic two bedroom ground floor apartment situated in the central, gated community of Jardines de Andalucía, a secure development in the heart of Nueva Andalucía within walking distance of Centro Plaza, Puerto Banus, Shops, Bars and Restaurants and only a few minutes drive to Marbella town centre. Accommodation consists of spacious lounge with dining area, two double bedrooms, two family bathrooms, fully fitted kitchen, terrace and private garden area. Furthermore the development offers well maintained communal gardens and a large swimming pool. Additional features include fitted wardrobes, marble floors and air conditioning. This is a fantastic apartment in an ideal location with great rental potential!

This spectacular hill top mansion in La Zagaleta enjoys breath-taking 360 degree panoramic views of the Mountain ranges, and full, clear Spanish coastline views of the Mediterranean Sea across to coast of Africa. La Zagaleta Country Club is one of the most prestigious and exclusive residential area in Europe offering first Class private facilities which include tennis Club, equestrian Club, 2 private Golf courses, heliport and two clubhouses. Accommodation comprises of five spacious bedroom suites, large fully equipped kitchen with walk-in fridge and breakfast dining area, separate dining room, three additional reception rooms, office, snooker Room, gym, sauna, steam room, cinema Room and a temperature controlled wine cellar. The property also features a very large integral Cortijo style courtyard, vast landscaped gardens and a garage for fifteen vehicles.

A truly exceptional south facing large eight bedroom villa built to the highest standards with exceptional qualities in a secure and gated community in one of the best locations in El Madroñal just outside of Marbella. This villa is built on one level around a central Andalucían patio and is accessed through an elegant automatic gate driveway. The property offers eight bedroom suites including a separate self contained one bedroom guest apartment; a large spacious lounge, dining room, fully fitted Clive Christian kitchen with storage room, laundry room. Surrounded by a beautiful mature garden, large swimming pool with Jacuzzi and BBQ area allow for refreshing entertainment for almost all year round. This spectacular villa is the ultimate luxury villa in Spain.

Fantastic four bedroom south facing family villa situated within the secure gated community of Aldea Dorada in Nueva Andalucia, only a five minute car journey from Puerto Banus and minutes from Los Naranjos golf course. This private community consists of twenty five luxury villas and offers residents well maintained gardens with a large communal swimming pool. Accommodation consists of four bedrooms, five bathrooms, family kitchen and additional smaller kitchen, formal and informal lounges. Upstairs there is a large terrace with private plunge pool and the property also features a two car garage. This villa is ideal for families with teenage children looking for independence as it offers separate living areas on different levels with separate entrances. A superb family home situated on an elevated plot offering beautiful views across the golf course to the sea.

Fantastic 1000m2 plot situated in the prestigious area of Haza Del Conde with spectacular views across the golf course to the sea and only a few minutes drive to Puerto Banus. There is a project to construct a villa included in the price. A great opportunity to buy a plot in an exclusive area.

MASSIVELY REDUCED FROM 3,750,000€ Exquisite five bedroom front line golf villa situated in the prestigious residential area of La Alqueria with spectacular views across the golf course to the sea. Puerto Banus is only a ten minute car journey away and there is a supermarket within close proximity. Accommodation comprises of four double bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms featuring Portuguese mosaic marble, guest apartment with ensuite bedroom, separate guest apartment with double ensuite bedroom, fully equipped Italian kitchen, large lounge with fireplace and grand separate dining room. The property also features large terraces with impressive views, landscaped gardens, infinity swimming pool, and a garage with parking for four vehicles. Further features include under floor heating, air conditioning, oak doors and an impressive Tiffany crystal cupola.

Spacious three bedroom groundfloor duplex apartment situated in the exclusive gated community of King´s Hill on the Golden Mile, within walking distance of the prestigious Puente Romano Hotel and the beach. Both Marbella town centre and Puerto Banus are only a five minute car journey away. King´s Hill is a well maintained private development offering beautiful communal gardens, 24 hour security, 3 pools & an exquisite Italian restaurant on-site that is open for non-residents. Accommodation consists of entrance hall, guest toilet, fully fitted kitchen and spacious lounge/ dining area with access to a large open terrace. Upstairs there are three double ensuite bedrooms, two of which have access to a second large private terrace. There is a parking space and storage room included in the price.

Excellent south facing ground floor apartment situated in the quiet beachfront complex of Las Adelfas on the Paseo Maritimo of San Pedro de Alcántara and only a short drive to Puerto Banus.This exclusive gated community offers two large swimming pools and vast beautifully maintained gardens. The property has large living and dining areas, a fully fitted open kitchen with separate laundry room and outside utility area, guest toilet, an ensuite master bedroom with dressing area and two further bedrooms sharing a large family bathroom. There is a large south facing terrace with direct access to the lush communal gardens. Further features include marble floors, hot and cold air conditioning and a fully installed alarm system. There are also two underground parking spaces and a storage room included in the price.

REDUCED FROM 1,200,000 Immaculate Four bedroom frontline golf villa situated in Guadalmina Alta in close proximity of all amenities. San Pedro Alcantara is only a short car journey away as is Puerto Banús and Marbella. Built over three floors, accommodation consists of prestige fully fitted kitchen with separate utility room, ensuite bedroom, guest toilet and spacious lounge with direct access to the garden and private swimming pool and direct golf buggy access. Upstairs there is a master suite with ensuite bathroom, walk in wardrobe and large private terrace with beautiful golf views and two further ensuite bedrooms. On the bottom floor there is a large garage accessed via a private driveway, two storage rooms, guest toilet and two further rooms one of which has a shower and which could easily be used as an additional bedroom or gym/ games area.
Further features include diesel under floor heating throughout, fully installed alarm system and domotic installation.

CHARMING South West facing townhouse situated in the gated community of Monte Piedras in the highly sort after location of Nagueles. Having only 42 properties in total the urbanisation is arranged in two Horseshoes each housing 21 properties. Each horseshoe has 2 swimming pools and beautifully landscaped gardens. The property is full of character with vaulted ceilings which create a lovely ambiance. The accommodation is distributed over 4 floors offering great family living. On entering the property into a lobby with the guest WC. Continuing the house offers a Kitchen which has been totally reformed with lovely Cherry Wood units and Granite work surfaces, gas hob and all modern appliances. The lounge is very spacious which leads to a lower level Dining area with views onto the gardens and swimming pool. Access to the private garden which in turn has gated access to the communal gardens.
One level down takes you to the basement which currently has a guest Bedroom with shower room, and a huge Party/Games/Entertainment room great for families. On the first floor there is the Master Bedroom with en-suite this has a lovely sized terrace with sea views. A further large double bedroom with en-suite and fitted wardrobes. The upper floor has a further large double bedroom again with en-suite and fitted wardrobes.

Charming first floor one bedroom apartment situated front line in Puerto Banús offering spectacular sea views across the harbour. The property is located within the heart of this notorious port, offering a wide variety of designer clothing boutiques and exclusive restaurants, bars and beach clubs. Marbella town centre is only a five minute car journey away. Accommodation comprises of lounge with traditional fireplace leading onto two Juliet balconies with spectacular sea views across the harbour, kitchen, large bedroom with fireplace and ensuite bathroom with bath/shower. Further features include air conditioning, fully installed entry intercom system and traditional Spanish tiled floors. The property would benefit from minor refurbishment s as it remains all original fixtures and fittings.

Spacious first floor two bedroom apartment situated front line in Puerto Banus with spectacular sea views across the harbour. The property is located within the heart of this notorious port, offering a wide variety of designer clothing boutiques and exclusive restaurants, bars and beach clubs. Marbella town centre is only a five minute car journey away. Decorated by one of Marbella´s leading architects, accommodation comprises of a large (45m2) lounge with mahogany polished flooring and feature lighting, two large double bedrooms, two bathrooms with walk in showers and travertine finishes, a fully fitted prestige kitchen with stainless steel BOSCH appliances and a covered terrace with fantastic views across the port. The apartment has been totally renovated to a very high standard and features double glazed windows, air conditioning, heating, halogen lighting and soundproofing throughout.

Stylish two bedroom southwest facing first floor apartment situated within the beachfront development of Mar Azul on the New Golden Mile, minutes from Estepona town Centre. This exclusive community offers subtropical communal gardens with enormous feature swimming pool, communal gym, indoor heated swimming pool, spa area, twenty four hour security and concierge service. Accommodation consists of two double bedrooms, two bathrooms, prestige fitted kitchen, spacious lounge and dining area and private southwest facing terrace with partial sea views. There are an underground parking space and storage room included in the price. Further features include a fully installed music surround system, under floor heating, air conditioning and electric sun blinds.

Immaculate two bedroom ground floor apartment situated in the fabulous beachside community of Park Beach located midway between Estepona and Puerto Banús on the New Golden Mile. The property is seconds away from the beach and within walking distance of Heaven beach club. Park Beach offers well maintained subtropical gardens with two communal swimming pools. Accommodation consists of a spacious lounge/ dining area leading onto a covered terrace with private enclosed garden, large fully fitted kitchen with Balay appliances, bathroom, bedroom and master suite. Downstairs there is also a separate 72m2 basement which could be converted into a gym/ cinema room. Further features include air conditioning, under floor heating in the bathrooms, marble floors and a fully installed alarm system.

Spacious south facing second floor two bedroom apartment situated in the beautiful gated beachside community of White Pearl Beach in Elviria, within seconds walking distance to the beach and within minutes of a whole host of amenities including restaurants, bars, shops and numerous golf courses. Marbella town centre is only a ten minute car journey away. This exclusive complex offers twenty four hour security, exuberant tropical gardens and three large communal swimming pools. Accommodation consists of two large double bedrooms, two ensuite bathrooms, a fully fitted kitchen with separate utility room, very large lounge with built in fireplace and separate dining area and a south facing terrace with partial sea views. Further features include air conditioning, marble floors and security gates.

Luxurious three bedroom penthouse situated in the exclusive development of Cabo Bermejo on the new Golden Mile only five minutes from Estepona town centre and within minutes drive of a whole host of amenities including beach clubs, an African Safari Park and numerous cafes and restaurants. This prestigious frontline beach complex offers subtropical gardens with cascades and waterfalls, two large swimming pools, direct beach access and two well-equipped gymnasiums overlooking the pools and gardens. Accommodation consists of prestige fully fitted kitchen, spacious lounge and dining area, three bedrooms, two of which are ensuite, family bathroom and three large sunny terraces with barbeque area. Further features include underfloor heating, air conditioning and marble floors. There is an underground parking space and storage room included in the price.

Excellent three bedroom north facing family villa situated in a quaint residential area, walking distance from Marbella Town Centre. The property is situated minutes from the main Marbella bus station which provides transport to all locations along the Costa del Sol including a direct bus to and from Malaga airport. Accommodation consists of large lounge separated into formal and informal areas, guest toilet, separate dining room and fully fitted kitchen with sea views, breakfast area and separate pantry. Upstairs there are three bedrooms, one of which is ensuite and a large bathroom. Outside there is a separate laundry room, storage room and a carport for two vehicles. The property is surrounded by a neat private garden with views to La Concha mountain, a swimming pool and barbeque area. There is a separate "chiringuito" building next to the pool area with a guest toilet and large games room with fully installed bar area ideal for entertaining. Further features include air conditioning, fully installed alarm system and security blinds. This is an ideal family home in a very central location!

Immaculate two bedroom ground floor apartment situated within the exclusive beachside community of Alhambra del Golf in Guadalmina Baja, minutes from San Pedro Alcantara and only a five minute drive to Puerto Banus. The beach is approximately 700 metres away and there are various leisure facilities within the area including several Golf courses and a Paddle/ tennis club. The community offers beautiful well maintained gardens, a large swimming pool, children´s pool and playground. Accommodation consists of two double bedrooms, spacious lounge/ dining room, fully fitted kitchen, two bathrooms and a large covered terrace. There are an underground parking space and storage room included in the price. Further features include marble floors, air conditioning and under floor heating.

Luxury two bedroom duplex penthouse situated in the exclusive beachfront development of Torre Bermeja on the New Golden Mile. This spectacular community offers award winning floodlit gardens with water features, bridges and direct beach access, two large outdoor swimming pools, an indoor heated pool and two fully equipped gymnasiums with saunas and steam rooms. Originally a three bedroom penthouse the property has been converted into two bedrooms in order to fully utilise the lower floor and maximise terrace access, however it could easily be reconverted with ease. Accommodation consists of two large double bedrooms, two bathrooms, spacious lounge and dining area, prestige fitted kitchen, laundry room and enormous north and south facing terraces both with splendid unobstructed views. There are two underground parking spaces and two storage rooms included in the price. Further features include under floor heating throughout, 6 seater Jacuzzi, and Bang and Oluffsen installed sound system.

Brand new five bedroom southeast facing family Villa situated in Rio Real, only a short car journey from Rio Real Playa and Los Monteros playa. This prestigious area is situated within a five minute car journey of Marbella town Centre and within easy reach of shopping and leisure facilities, five golf courses and numerous bars and restaurants. Accommodation consists of three guest bedrooms, two of which are ensuite, fully fitted kitchen, utility room, spacious lounge with fireplace and access to a large terrace, guest toilet, separate dining room and informal lounge area. The entire upper floor is dedicated to the master suite which features a large ensuite bathroom, private terrace with sea and mountain views and walk in wardrobe. Downstairs there is a large basement with an ensuite staff bedroom, two car garage and gym/ games room.The property offers well maintained gardens with a private oasis swimming pool and driveway with additional parking for numerous vehicles.
Further features include under floor heating in the bathrooms, air conditioning and marble floors.

A superbly located southeast facing family villa in the heart of central Nueva Andalucia within a two minute walk of shops, restaurants and bars and within extremely easy reach of all leisure amenities and Puerto Banus. Marbella Town Centre is only a five minute car journey away and the property is situated within seconds of Las Brisas Golf Course on one of the best roads in the Golf Valley. Accommodation consists of five bedrooms, seven bathrooms, fully fitted kitchen, lounge with fireplace, separate dining room and a large garage providing parking for four vehicles. The Property is surrounded by well maintained gardens with a large oasis swimming pool. This is a substantial and well constructed family home on a large plot with superb views to la Concha Mountain. Further features include marble floors, fitted wardrobes air conditioning throughout and a fully installed alarm system.

Luxury four bedroom villa situated in the frontline beach development of Lorea Playa, within walking distance of Puerto Banús and a variety of exclusive beach clubs. Marbella town centre is only a five minute car journey away and the property is located at a stones throw from the beach. Built on four floors, accommodation consists of four bedrooms, three bathrooms, a prestige fitted kitchen with separate utility room, large spacious lounge with access to a private covered terrace and access to the garden. Downstairs there is an enormous basement which is currently used as a games room but which could easily be converted to create additional rooms. Upstairs there is a large roof terrace with beautiful views of the beach and sea. The property has been built to a very high standard and is surrounded by well maintained gardens with a carport for two vehicles, barbeque area and a private swimming pool. An ideal family home in a superb location!

Brand new exclusive five bedroom villa uniquely perched on 3500m2 of land which is situated front line to the Monte Mayor Golf course offering quiet and peaceful countryside surroundings and stunning views of the golf course. Both the Monte Mayor Golf club and Marbella club Golf houses are only a short drive way and Marbella is only twenty minutes by car. Accommodation consists of spacious lounge and dining area with an enormous terrace offering spectacular views, study with private terrace, guest toilet and large modern kitchen with private patio area. The entire upper level is occupied by the master bedroom suite with double Jacuzzi, shower and private terrace. Downstairs there are four ensuite bedrooms and a gymnasium with access to the beautiful landscaped gardens and private swimming pool. Additional features include a three car garage plus a two vehicle carport, a water deposit, under floor heating throughout, oak double glazed windows and cream marble floors.

Stylish three bedroom ground floor apartment situated in the exclusive community of Menara Beach on the New Golden Mile. This luxurious development offers 24 hour security, direct access to the beach, two large outdoor swimming pools, an indoor heated pool and a fully equipped gymnasium. Accommodation consists of a large spacious lounge with open plan kitchen and access to the terrace and private garden area, laundry room, large master suite and two further bedrooms sharing a bathroom. There is an underground parking space and storage room included in the price and further features include under floor heating throughout, hot and cold air conditioning and marble floors.

Fabulous two bedroom west facing townhouse situated in the tranquil Las Encinas community in La Quinta Golf and Country Club in the heart of the Golf Valley and only a five minute drive to both Puerto Banús and Marbella. Built on three levels, the accommodation consists of; entrance hall, fully fitted kitchen with separate utility room, and lounge with French windows leading out to a private terrace with spectacular golf views. The upper floor consists entirely of the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and sunny uncovered terrace and the lower floor consists of a double ensuite bedroom with dressing area and private terrace. Outside there is a carport for one vehicle.

Fantastic 1000 m2 plot situated in Elviria only 1km away from the main commercial area which offers a whole host of amenities. The land is accompanied by plans for a family villa which can be constructed, providing beautiful golf and sea views.

Exclusive four bedroom south facing townhouse situated in the gated community of La Quinta Hills, only a five minute car journey from Puerto Banus and within close proximity of La Quinta Golf Club. The property offers spectacular sea and mountain views across the golf valley. On the ground floor the property comprises of a spacious lounge/ dining area with fireplace, fully fitted kitchen, laundry room, guest toilet and access to the private garden and swimming pool. On the first floor there is a master bedroom suite, three guest bedrooms and two bathrooms. The second floor consists of an enormous sunny roof terrace. Further features include marble floors, A/C with heating, fully fitted alarm system and satellite TV. There is also a carport with parking for one vehicle included in the price.

Delightful villa totally refurbished and ready for immediate occupation situated in a quiet small gated urbanisation only a couple of minutes walking distance to the beach and Puerto Banus. A grand entrance hall gives access to all rooms on the ground floor and a sweeping staircase leads to the three first floor double bedrooms of which one is the bright master bedroom with bathroom ensuite and doors to a large private southfacing terrace. Double doors from the marble hall opens into the spacious L-shaped reception room with a seperate dining area for 10 people and two separate sitting areas, one with an impressive working fireplace and two sets of patio doors opening onto a large southfacing terrace fronting the kidney shaped swimming pool. A large kitchen with extensive work surfaces and formal dining area has sets of glass doors leading to a thatched Gazebo featuring a BBQ area. There is also a utility room housing washing and drying machines. Off to the left of the hall is an inner hall leading to two elegant double bedrooms sharing a bathroom and access to the garden.
From the rear of the garden steps lead to a completely independent guest villa boasting a vaulted ceiling sitting room, two double bedroom suites, kitchen, utility room and guest cloak room. The property can be accessed from the road below and has its own parking facilities.

Beautifully presented 6 Bedroom Villa. Distributed over two levels. Situated in a highly desirable area. Lovely mature gardens with feature swimming pool and plenty of outside terrace´s. The villa´s interior has been carefully designed to give outstanding features including a covered "Courtyard" currently used as a Dining Room. The property offers Lounge, Large fully equiped kitchen, Dining Room, Family Room and a Cinema Room. Entering the property by the electric entry gates a large entrance driveway which offers parking for several cars along with a double garage. The current owners have created a stunning family home with all modern day features.
.

Charming rustic Villa situated in a quiet residential area only a five minute car journey from San Pedro town centre and ten minutes from Puerto Banús. Situated in a private cul-de-sac, the property offers peace and tranquillity with beautiful views to La Concha Mountain. The property is accessed via a gated courtyard with private parking for up to seven vehicles. Built on one level, accommodation comprises of entrance hall, spacious living room with fireplace and direct access to the garden, separate dining room with fully equipped kitchen, outside laundry area, office with en-suite bedroom opening onto the entrance courtyard and three further ensuite double bedrooms. Outside there is a separate guest house with ensuite bedroom and private roof terrace. The property is surrounded by picturesque well maintained gardens with two water features and a large heated salt water swimming pool. Further features include solar panels, automatic garden irrigation and terracotta floors.

Immaculate South East facing, two bedroom first floor apartment in the 24hr gated community of Albatross Hill Club at the top of the Golf Valley and within easy reach of Puerto Banus. This well maintained community has excellent facilities including lush tropical gardens, two swimming pools, sauna, fully equipped gym, tennis court and a clubhouse. The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully equipped kitchen with utility room; bright and spacious lounge with fireplace and access to a large, partially covered terrace with impressive sea, and mountain views, master suite and ensuite guest bedroom. Features include hot and cold A/C, electric blinds, under floor heating throughout and video door entry. There is underground parking for one car and a storage room included in the price.

Modern southeast facing five bedroom Villa situated frontline to Las Brisas Golf course. This exclusive property is only a five minute drive to Puerto Banus and within very easy reach of all the best golf courses. Accommodation comprises on the first level of three ensuite bedrooms, grand entrance hall leading onto a bright and spacious lounge/dining room, guest toilet and a fully fitted Clive Christian kitchen with breakfast area. On the lower level there are two further ensuite bedrooms, a second living room/cinema room, kitchen, utility room and a completely independent entrance, ideal for staff or guests. The property is surrounded by well maintained gardens with ample terraces and a heated swimming pool. Immaculate three bedroom southwest facing ground floor apartment situated in the beachside gated community of Residencial Noray, just a short stroll from San Pedro promenade and close to all amenities. Puerto Banús is only a five minute car journey away. This exclusive complex offers beautiful landscaped and a large communal swimming pool and separate children´s pool. Accommodation consists of three double bedrooms, two bathrooms, large lounge/ dining area, fully fitted kitchen, utility room and large terrace with direct access to the swimming pool. There is a garage and storage room included in the price.

Luxury five bedroom east facing villa situated in the frontline beach development of Lorea Playa, within walking distance of Puerto Banús and a variety of exclusive beach clubs. Marbella town centre is only a five minute car journey away and the property is located thirty metres from the beach. Built on four floors, accommodation consists of five bedrooms, one of which is currently used as an additional TV room, four bathrooms, a prestige fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances, utility room, large lounge with access to a large east facing terrace. Downstairs there is an enormous 130m² basement with three very versatile separate rooms which are currently used as a storage room, an office and a gym but which could also be used as bedrooms. The property has been built to a very high standard and is surrounded by well maintained gardens with a carport for one vehicle and a large private swimming pool. An ideal family home in an excellent location!

South facing 2nd line beach three bedroom first floor apartment situated in the gated beachside community of White Pearl Beach in Elviria, within seconds walking distance to the beach and within minutes of a whole host of amenities including restaurants, bars, shops and numerous golf courses. Marbella town centre is only a ten minute car journey away. This exclusive complex offers exuberant tropical gardens and three large communal swimming pools. Accommodation consists of three double bedrooms, three bathrooms, a fully fitted kitchen, guest toilet, lounge with built-in fireplace, dining room and large partially covered terrace. Further features include air conditioning, fitted wardrobes, marble floors and security gates. The property would benefit from redocoration / renovation.

Exclusive six bedroom, six bathroom south facing "Frontline Beach Villa" in a very priviledged location. Well kept gardens with swimming pool and direct access to the beach. Offering accomodation over two levels with seperate self contained staff accomodation with private entrance. On ground floor the property offers a very large spacious lounge area with working feature fireplace. Large formal dining area, kitchen, day lounge, dining area, three en-suite bedrooms, guest WC and the staff accomodation. Upstairs the master suite, en-suite and private terrace, a further guest bedroom with en-suite and terrace. In addition to this the property has a self contained guest apartment. The property is in need of total refurbishment to bring it upto to today´s modern day requirements.

Beautiful five bedroom southeast facing family villa situated in the exclusive urbanisation of Rocio de Nagueles, only a five minute car journey from Marbella town centre and ten minutes to Puerto Banus. This fabulous family home is set back from the road by a long drive way and is surrounded by mature gardens with a large swimming pool and a variety of fruit trees. The property consists of five stunning double bedrooms, four bathrooms, two of which are ensuite, large open plan lounge with fireplace and dining area, superb designer kitchen, upper terrace with both sea and mountain views and a garage. Exclusive four bedroom southwest facing villa situated in central Nueva Andalucia, within walking distance of a whole host of amenities and only minutes drive from Puerto Banus. Built to exceptionally high standards this property offers complete luxury over three floors with many unique features. Surrounded by a well maintained private garden with swimming pool and alfresco dining area, the property consists of three large bedroom suites each with hidromassage showers and fitted wardrobes, one of which is currently used as a gym, master suite with walk in wardrobe and private terrace, prestigious fully fitted kitchen, separate dining room, lounge with impressive fireplace, spa area with Turkish baths and Jacuzzi, two car garage, guest toilet, wine cellar and enormous roof terrace with sea views. Further features include designer Roberto Verino floors, an original water feature, CCTV security cameras and many other spectacular extras.

Spacious southwest facing one bedroom apartment situated in the private wing of the exclusive five star Kempinski Hotel. Situated on the seventh floor, the apartment offers spectacular uninterrupted sea views across the Mediterranean to Gibraltar and North Africa. The property benefits from all of the amenities and services of the hotel including 45,000m2 of beautifully manicured gardens with four swimming pools one of which is a heated indoor pool, direct access to the beach, various on-site sports facilities including large gymnasium and tennis courts, Spa, restaurants and bars offering a private wing room service at a discount of twenty percent. The property consists of lounge/ dining area, master bedroom suite with walk-in wardrobe, guest toilet, fully fitted kitchen and private covered terrace with beautiful sea views. Owners also have the option to allow the hotel to manage their apartment and see very high returns or keep the property exclusively for their own use. Highly recommended investment property!

Elevated plot with project in Marbella Hill Club II with fantastic uninterrupted views of the whole coastline and to Africa. 3,182 square metres located in one of the most exclusive areas of Marbella with spectacular mountain and sea views and only a few minutes drive to Puerto Banus and Marbella centre. The plot has been prepared by the current owner for construction and the land has been levelled with retaining walls constructed. This represents a considerable cost saving for any purchaser. A great opportunity to buy a plot in an exclusive area.

Fabulous newly built south facing five bedroom villa situated in the exclusive Urbanisation of La Alqueria with breathtaking sea, mountain and golf views and only a five minute drive from the beautiful Spanish village of Benahavís. Built to the highest standards, the property comprises of five bedrooms and five bathrooms spread over two floors, a fully fitted Nolte Kitchen and a large lounge and dining area which leads onto a large enclosed terrace. Downstairs there is a large guest apartment complete with its own lounge, kitchen area and direct access onto the garden and private heated swimming pool, double garage with electric door, sauna room, and utility room. Upstairs there is an enormous sunny roof terrace with spectacular views, ideal for outside entertaining. Further features include double glazed windows, under floor heating, air conditioning and a fully installed irrigation system.

An enormous top quality south facing three bedroom apartment on the first floor of the exclusive development of Los Arrayanes, located at the top of the Golf Valley with spectacular views across three golf courses to the coast and within easy reach of Marbella´s best golf courses, shops and restaurants and only a five minute drive from Puerto Banus. The community boasts two fabulous outdoor pools, lush tropical gardens and the possibility of expansion to include an indoor spa and gym area. The property consists of a large stylish entrance hall, three ensuite double bedrooms, modern fully fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances, spacious lounge/ dining area and a huge terrace with shower. Features include underfloor heating in the bathrooms, air conditioning hot/cold, installed home intelligence system and the price includes two underground parking spaces and a storage room.

A modern and stylish top quality south facing two bedroom apartment on the third floor of the exclusive development of Los Arrayanes, located at the top of the Golf Valley with spectacular views across three golf courses to the coast and within easy reach of Marbella´s best golf courses, shops and restaurants and only a five minute drive from Puerto Banus. The community boasts two fabulous outdoor pools, lush tropical gardens and the possibility of expansion to include an indoor spa and gym area. The property consists of two ensuite double bedrooms, fully fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances, lounge/ dining area and an enormous terrace with shower. Features include underfloor heating in the bathrooms, air conditioning hot/cold, installed home intelligence system and the price includes an underground parking space and storage room.

Immaculate three bedroom west facing corner penthouse with stunning views of the coast all the way to Gibraltar and the African coast. This fully gated and secure community is within a five minute drive of both Marbella Town and Puerto Banús and close to shops, restaurants and leisure amenities. The community has lush tropical gardens, 24 hour security, an indoor pool, gymnasium with Sauna and Jacuzzi, and a large split level outdoor pool. Accommodation consists of spacious double aspect salon with separate dining area and a private terrace, two large bedrooms suites, a further bedroom with bathroom and a well appointed kitchen. The property has under-floor heating throughout, secure underground parking and is sold fully furnished to a very high standard.

Incredible seven bedroom south facing elegant villa built by the owner to the highest standards and set in the prestigious, gated and 24 hour secure, front line golf community of El Herrojo Alto within easy reach of the La Quinta clubhouse, a whole host of other golf courses and leisure facilities and within a ten minute drive of San Pedro and Puerto Banus. The accommodation consists of: an antique entrance door leading to a grand entrance hall, guest cloakroom and a hallway leading to an office and two bedroom suites one of which has a private terrace and open breathtaking views. Off the entrance hall is a large fully fitted NASA kitchen, a modern informal lounge and an enormous formal lounge and dining area with high ceilings and french doors to a covered terrace and private mature landscaped gardens with pool.
Upstairs there is a master bedroom suite with separate dressing area and large private terrace and one bedroom guest suite. Downstairs there are two further bedroom suites, staff accommodation, a sauna, gym, home cinema room, laundry room, storeroom and a 5 car garage.

A charming three bedroom south facing villa with a separate two bedroom casita in the tranquil area of Valle Del Sol, Guadalmina Alta and within easy reach of San Pedro, Puerto Banus and all amenities. The property boasts spectacular sea and mountain views and is surrounded by mature landscaped gardens with a swimming pool and orchard. Built on three levels, the lower is a separate guest apartment/staff accomodation with its own access. The main villa has two en-suite double bedrooms, one of which features a walk-in wardrobe and a large sunny private terrace. There is also an open plan lounge, with a built in fireplace and independant study area leading onto a large covered terrace, a separate dining room (which was previously a bedroom) and a good sized fully fitted kitchen. There are various outbuildings, and also a self-contained two bedroom cottage with seperate road access that provides complete privacy. A fabulous family home, substanially reduced in price, from which to sit back and admire the beautiful coastline!

Selection of six remaining brand new and exclusive five bedroom townhouses in a highly prestigious development of Sierra Blanca Del Mar offering spectacular sea and mountain views and only five minutes by car from the centre of Marbella. Built to the highest standards, these modern and classy properties offer a variety of extra special unique features such as fingerprint access, fully soundproofed walls and home automation systems. Each property consists of five bedroom suites spread accross four floors and accessed by a four person private lift, a fully fitted kitchen with Siematic appliances, lounge/ dining area, gym, sauna, guest toilet and a private pool on the roof terrace. There is also private parking for three large vehicles. A truly exquisite home with full attention to all detail!

Frontline position in the exclusive Los Flamingos Golf Resort, and boasting amazing front line golf and lake views.
Distributed over four floors, furnished to a high standard and offering many features including an idyllic private pool and relaxing gardens, 50' plasma tv, piped music,and roof top terrace boasting a spa pool, and small games room with TV and PS2.
The gorgeous open plan dining kitchen will certainly impress, with a contemporary feel and all modern appliances and fittings.
Well kept garden areas with terraces, lounges and relaxer beds and a fabulous private pool.
This villa has been priced to sell.
Viewings by appointment.

Enormous east facing five bedroom ground floor apartment in the luxurious gated community of Monte Paraiso, above the Golden Mile, within a five minute drive to Marbella centre or Puerto Banus and two minutes from some of the best beaches in Marbella. This fabulous community has twenty-four hour security, lush tropical gardens, four communal pools, one of which is heated and a fully equipped fitness centre including a squash court and indoor pool. The apartment itself is one of the largest in the community with a spacious lounge and dining room, fully equipped kitchen with separate utility room, study, master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi, dressing area and private terrrace, and four further bedrooms with two bathrooms. The living room has French windows that lead to a large covered terrace. The property comes with four parking spaces and ample storage.

This west facing ground floor apartment in the exclusive urbanisation of Las Lomas de Sierra Blanca only five minutes from Puerto Banus, has large open living areas and a private garden. The property has a closed section of the terrace using glass curtains to create a sun room which complements nicely the large, spacious lounge and lets light flood into the property. The community boasts lush landscaped gardens with a large adult swimming pool and a separate pool for children; it also provides 24hr security and is gated. The property consists of; entrance hall leading through to the fully fitted kitchen and the lounge, sun room, large terrace area, master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, two further guest bedroom also with en-suite bathrooms and guest toilet. Further features include: intelligence System, under floor heating throughout, glazed terrace, covered terrace, and video surveillance

Fantastic west facing three bedroom townhouse with stunning views of the Guadalmina golf course. The property consists of: a small entrance area with access to the fully fitted kitchen with separate utility terrace. There is a spacious living room with separate dining area and access through French doors to the large terrace. Upstairs the property has a master bedroom with en suite facilities and there are two further bedrooms en suite. On the lower level there is a storage room and access to the private underground garage. The property has a large garden to the front, side and rear. Guadalmina Hoyo 5 is a small gated and secure urbanisation front line to the golf and very close to the beach. It has three paddle courts, beautiful gardens, and a large communal pool and is a short drive to both San Pedro de Alcantára and Puerto Banús.

Very spacious four bedroom southeast facing first floor apartment in Royal Garden, a very central gated complex in Nueva Andalucía, being at walking distance to Centro Plaza, Puerto Banús and the beach, and only a couple of minutes by car to Marbella and some of the best golf courses in the Golf Valley. This apartment was originally two separate properties but was joined together by a previous owner to make a large and spacious home. The accommodation consists of: Huge entrance hall with moorish style arches that lead to the living area with working fireplace and the dining area with access to the covered but sunny terrace with vies to the community gardens and partial sea views; kitchen, four bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, two of them having access to a further terrace; cloakroom. Features include hot and cold air conditioning, alarm system, two parking spaces.

Andalusian style four bedroom west facing townhouse set in a gated and very tranquil community in Guadalmina Alta, offering two community pools, paddle tennis, and childrens playground. The accommodation consists of: entrance hall, fully fitted kitchen, guest bedroom or office, guest shower room, Living areawith working fireplace and french windows leading onto the terrace and private garden; on the upper floor there is the master bedroom ensuite with a private terrace and two further bedrooms sharing a bathroom. It has an underground parking space with direct access to the property and a storage.

An elegant southeast facing three bedroom villa in Ancon Sierra, a gated and secure development in the heart of the Golden Mile. The community offers 24 hour security and is set around sub-tropical lush gardens ideal for relaxation and evening strolls. The property has been totally reformed to an extremely high standard. Accommodation consists of: entrance hall; guest cloakroom; en-suite guest bedroom; independent staff accommodation; lounge with open fireplace and french windows leading onto the terrace with a large plunge pool, jacuzzi and sitting area; dining area, huge kitchen with breakfast area. Upstairs: master bedroom suite with walk through wardrobes, Jacuzzi bathroom and private terrace with marvellous views to the sea and la Concha, guest en-suite bedroom with access to the upstairs terrace as well. This beautiful southwest facing rustic style villa situated in the gated urbanisation of El Madroñal on the Ronda Road, with both tennis and golf nearby, is only a five minute drive to San Pedro de Alcántara and ten minutes to Puerto Banús. The property also boast a self contained guest apartment with bedroom, bathroom, living area and kitchen and a separate a guest house situated in the garden also with a bedroom suite, living area and kitchen.

RES. BALCONES DE LA QUINTA | LA QUINTA GOLF | BENAHAVIS
2 to 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom apartment with potential. Southwest facing, gated community, nice views, first floor.
Living and dining area, covered terrace, fitted kitchen, 2 bedrooms/2 bathrooms, extra 3rd room (could be a 3rd bedroom, second living area, entertainment, office), back terrace. Free parking inside the complex.

Exceptional three bedroom east facing penthouse in Magna Marbella, in the heart of the Golf Valley, within easy reach of seven local golf courses, shops, restaurants and other amenities.This gated and secure development offers a host of facilities including 24-hour security, large communal swimming pool, a restaurant, nine hole golf course and beautifully maintained landscaped gardens that give the whole community a sense of spaciousness and tranquillity.The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully fitted and equipped kitchen; bright and spacious lounge/dining area with French windows leading out to the covered terrace with breathtaking views to La Concha and the coast; master en-suite bedroom with direct access to the terrace; two guest bedrooms sharing a bathroom, one of the bedrooms with access to the terrace. A three bedroom west facing ground floor apartment in a highly sought after community situated in an elevated mountainside position within very easy reach of both Puerto Banus and Marbella. A stylish and spacious southwest facing, three bedroom ground floor apartment in the gated community of El Lago. This wonderful southeast facing ground floor apartment is situated in the quiet complex of Las Adelfas on the Paseo Maritimo of San Pedro de Alcántara and only a short drive to Puerto Banus. A brand new, very large south facing second floor two bedroom apartment in a new development of fourteen luxurious apartments and penthouses on the top of the Golden Mile and only a few minutes from the five star Puente Romano Hotel and the beach. An exceptional and very large south facing ground floor four bedroom apartment in a new development of fourteen luxurious apartments and penthouses on the top of the Golden Mile and only a few minutes from the five star Puente Romano Hotel and the beach. Brand new three bedroom south facing duplex penthouse in Mirador del Príncipe, a new development of fourteen luxurious apartments and penthouses on the top of the Golden Mile and only a few minutes from the five star Puente Romano Hotel and the beach.
