Brand new two bedroom south facing duplex penthouse in Mirador del Príncipe, a new development of fourteen luxurious apartments and penthouses on the top of the Golden Mile and only a few minutes from the five star Puente Romano Hotel and the beach. The property is within five minutes drive of both Puerto Banus and Marbella. Accommodation consists of:- Entrnce hall with guest cloakroom; ample lounge and dining room with fireplace and direct access to a spacious terrace with panoramic sea views; a fully fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances with access to the large and sunny terrace. Upstairs is the master bedroom with ensuite facilities including a jacuzzi and shower; and the second bedroom, also with ensuite facilities. Features include automatic blinds; video entry system; alarm; hot and cold air conditioning and under floor heating throughout. The property is offered with parking for two cars and storage facilities.

Brand new three bedroom south facing duplex penthouse in Mirador del Príncipe, a new development of fourteen luxurious apartments and penthouses on the top of the Golden Mile and only a few minutes from the five star Puente Romano Hotel and the beach. The property is within five minutes drive of both Puerto Banus and Marbella. Accommodation consists of:- Entrnce hall with guest cloakroom; ample lounge and dining room with fireplace and direct access to a spacious terrace with panoramic sea views; a fully fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances with independent utility room, two guest bedrooms with enuite facilieties, and one of them with direct access to the large and sunny terrace. The master bedroom comprises the entire second floor and has a dressing area and ensuite bathroom with jacuzzi and shower. Features include automatic blinds; video entry system; alarm; hot and cold air conditioning and under floor heating throughout. The property is offered with parking for two cars and storage facilities.

This plot is situated in the exclusive area of Marbella Hill Club, it is roughly 2 km from the beach, and is only a couple of minutes drive from the centre of Marbella and Puerto Banus as well as many amenities including, some of Marbella´s first-class golf courses. The plot offers unobstructed sea views and weather permiting, increadible views of Africa.
It is a plot with a buildability of 30% according to the Plan 1986 and a size of 2.762 m² for the construction of one villa.
Basements and terraces can be constructed in addition to the above-mentioned buildability.

Fantastic south east facing three-bedroom, ground floor apartment in the luxurious gated community of Monte Paraiso, above the Golden Mile, within a five minute drive to Marbella centre or Puerto Banus. This fabulous community has twenty-four-hour security, lush tropical gardens, four communal pools, and a fully equipped fitness centre. The apartment includes spacious lounge and dining room, a fully equipped kitchen with separate utility room, master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi, plus a guest toilet and two guest bedrooms sharing a fully tiled bathroom. Living room and master bedroom have French windows that lead to a covered but sunny terrace with views to the garden and sea. Further features include marble floors, hot and cond A/C, underground parking and storeroom.

Stylish 2-bedroom southwest facing apartment in the prestigious and luxurious gated community of Monte Paraiso, above the Golden Mile, within a five minute drive to Marbella centre or to Puerto Banus. The community has twenty-four-hour security, lush tropical gardens, four communal pools and a fully equipped fitness centre. The accomodation consists of: large lounge and dining area with french windows leading to the terrace, fully equippied kitchen with a separate laundry room, master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and a second bedroom with ensuite facilities and direct access to the terrace. Further features include hot and cold A/C, alarm system,

In a prime frontline golf location, this stunning property, facing south to southwest, takes in extensive views over Guadalmina Golf course and some sea views. Very private and close to all amenities. The apartment comprises of a living/dining area with fireplace, fully fitted kitchen, laundry area, guest toilet, main bedroom with open plan bathroom and dressing area, 2 guest bedrooms and 2 further bathrooms.Large covered and uncovered terraces, outdoor plunge pool, and large roof terrace with bar. Lovely landscaped communal gardens with pool. Separate and private garage, with parking for 4 cars.Marble floors, A/C (hot/cold), under-floor heating in bathrooms, full alarm system (with cameras), satellite TV, private elevator with key

Fabulous south facing first line beach apartment situated in one of the most exclusive complexes on the Golden Mile. The 24 hr secure and gated community offers direct access to the promenade and is within easy walking distance to Puerto Banus and Marbella centre. This wonderful apartment boasts stunning panoramic views of both the mountains and over the Mediterranean to Gibraltar and the African coast. This stylish and modern apartment has a luxurious living and dining room as well as three bedrooms plus office. The kitchen is superbly equipped and has all the amenities one would require. Direct beach access is from the gardens in front which have a lovely private swimming pool. This sought after property offers total tranquillity and privacy.

Modern triple aspect south facing duplex penthouse apartment in the best block of this highly sought after community with magnificent panoramic sea and mountain views in an elevated mountainside position within very easy reach of both Puerto Banus and Marbella. The gated community provides 24hour security, large well maintained landscaped gardens and excellent community pools. The accommodation consists of hall; panelled guest cloakroom; large modern kitchen with breakfast area, kitchen terrace and laundry room; open plan salon and dining area; downstairs terrace with pergola. There are two large double bedrooms with domed ceilings and fully marbled Jacuzzi bathrooms on the lower level. Upstairs there is a further bedroom and bathroom and a vast terrace area with mountain and sea views with a hot tub, BBQ and seating area. The property has under-floor heating, full demotics and split A/C .

Spectacular southeast facing three bedroom duplex penthouse in the gated community of Albatross Hills, offering 24 hours security with cameras and concierge service, beautiful landscaped community gardens, four pools, one heated indoor pool, tennis court, fitness area and sauna. the accommodation consists of: On the main floor, living room and dining area, fully fitted kitchen, guest cloakroom, guest bedroom suite, covered and uncovered terrace with superb views to the coast. On the upper floor, there is the master bedroom suite, guest en-suite bedroom, two terraces Features include marble floors, hot and cold air conditioning, underfloor heating, alarm system, sat TV, two parking spaces and two storerooms.

A contemporary three bedroom duplex penthouse in a gated and secure development in Imara, Sierra Blanca. This exclusive development comprises of only sixty one luxury apartments, divided into twelve individual blocks which follow the natural south-west slope of the land. With close attention to detail, each apartment offer generous living accommodation and extensive terraces encouraging a harmonious transition between outdoor and indoor living. A specially commissioned landscape architect has created an elegant and aesthetical garden complementing both the architecture and the naturally beautiful environment which surrounds it.This duplex penthouse offers a modern fully fitted kitchen, laundry room; spacious lounge and dining area; two guest bedrooms with en-suite facilities; guest cloakroom; en-suite master bedroom with a cathedral wooden ceiling and panoramic sea and mountain view. A truly exceptional property!
Further features include independent hot & cold air conditioning, under floor heating in the bathrooms, Bang & Olufsen sound system, alarm system, safe, smoke detectors, gunderground parking for two cars & a store room.

La Alzambra Hill Club features a private 9-hole golf course for the exclusive use of the owners of the luxurious apartments and penthouses. The clubhouse hosts fantastic facilities such as a gym, jacuzzi and sauna as well as a restaurant and cocktail bar. Fantastic tropical gardens contain 10 different swimming pools, children play areas as well as tennis and paddle courts. Apartments range from 2 to 4 bedrooms and duplex penthouses. Luxuriously appointed throughout the kitchens are fitted with stainless steel Siemens or Bosch appliances and granite worktops. Bedrooms have electric rollerblinds and the bathrooms have hydro-massage baths. A key feature of all the apartments and penthouses at La Alzambra Hill Club is the terraces, all apartments have been carefully designed to ensure superb views of the sea, mountains and golf course. Automated home systems allow you to control key electrical items throughout the apartments as well as monitoring for smoke and leaks. 24 hour security and secure private parking provides the safest of environments

Unique, classical style villa in a private gated community within walking distance to all amenities.Set in 2,600 m2 of landscaped, mature gadens this gem of a property will suit the more discerning client. Beautifully furnished and extemely comfortable the property consists of: charming entrance hall with feature wrought iron staircase, double aspect lounge/ dining room with piano and fireplace, modern, spacious, fully fitted kitchen, bar area, guest cloakroom, four very grand bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and dressing areas, maids bedroom and bathroom, gymnasium, 3 car garage, very private gardens with large pool, covered pavillion with jacuzzi, extensive covered terraces, BBQ area. A superb property.

A totally refurbished three bedroom penthouse in Magna Marbella with a breathtaking view. The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully fitted and equipped kitchen; lounge/dining area with French windows leading out to the large covered terrace; master en-suite bedroom with direct access to the terrace; two guest bedrooms sharing a bathroom. The upper floor consists entirely of a roof solarium with a private plunge pool.

Elegant mansion in private gated estate with spectacular views down to the coast and over to Africa. An impressive long sweeping drive accesses this "wow" factor property. Built over three levels the accomodation comprises of large entrance hall with double feature staircase, guest toilet, library or sitting room opening on to the terrace, formal dining room, large dining kitchen, 3 spacious bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, independent studio, separate staff entrance and staircase to the lower level. Upstairs: master bedroom suite with en-suite bathroom, dressing area, access to sun terrace, 3 further bedrooms all en-suite. Lower level, top quality cinema room, bar, beautiful indoor heated pool with relaxation room, steam bath, sauna, wine cellar, staff apartment with laundry room, lift and underfloor heating throughout. Beautiful, mature grounds with amazing water features and thatched party room. Opulent furnishings throughout.

An outstanding southwest facing rustic villa situated in a gated and secure community with spectacular golf, mountain and sea views. Built on four levels to a very high standard and surrounded by landscaped gardens with a swimming pool. Double wooden gates lead you down the driveway and the entrance to the villa. The accommodation consists of:- entrance hall; two spacious lounges; two dining rooms; guest cloakroom; two fully fitted kitchens; four bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms; TV room; gymnasium; games room, sauna, office/study: All the rooms have direct access to the various terraces with views. Features include air conditioning throughout, wooden and marble flooring and BBQ complete the offering. A great family home offering total privacy and tranquillity on a quiet hilltop with commanding views.

A well presented five bedroom family villa in undoubtedly one of the best areas of Marbella, Atalaya de Rio Verde. This luxurious urbanisation includes some of the most spectacular and yet discreet properties in the Marbella area, with 24 hour security, a short stroll to the yatch harbour of Puerto Banus and a five minute drive to Marbella town center. Built on one level to the highest possible standards, the property offers extensive accommodation consisting of:- entrance lobby; guest cloakroom; spacious open plan combined kitchen lounge and dining room; five double bedrooms , four of which have en-suite facilities. The villa is surrounded by meticulously landscaped gardens and an outdoor heated swimming pool. Further features include video entry and alarm system, elctric blinds, Travertine marble in the bathrooms and hot & cold air conditioning. The entrance of the house is secured with electric gates and there is a garage large enough to take three cars.

An excellent south facing, ground floor three bedroom apartment located in arguably the most exclusive urbanisation in Aloha Park in the heart of the Golf Valley, a five minute drive to Puerto Banus and within easy reach of a whole host of leisure facilities. Surrounded by a pine forest, this luxurious 24 hour gated and secure community has exotic tropical gardens, gymnasium and two swimming pools, one of which is indoors and heated. The accommodation consists of :- large entrance hall; guest cloakroom; very spacious lounge and dining room with French windows leading out to a covered terrace; private garden with a swimming pool; fully equipped and fitted kitchen; utility room; two guest bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and ample walk in wardrobes; master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom and direct access to the sunny terrace. A truly exceptional property that resembles and feels like a villa.
High quality finishes and design with under floor heating throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, video entry system, underground parking for two and a large storeroom

Fantastic ultra modern villa with spectacular views all around set in one of the most luxurious urbanisations in Europe. This 24 hour secure and gated estate of 900 hectares, is a tranquil natural spot, where you are assured total privacy and security. Residents immediately become members of the Country Club with exclusive access to all its facilities including the two 18 hole golf courses, the equestrian club, tennis, cycling, rambling and fishing. Ground floor, 3 master bedrooms en-suite, 2 living rooms,kitchen, dining room, storage area, guest toilet, garage and car port. First floor 2 master bedrooms en-suite, lounge with fireplace, terrace, Basement (optional) 3 bedrooms en-suite, sauna, massage room with shower and toilet, lounge and kitchenette,storage area, large games room. The interior finishing has been carefully chosen to maintain the highest quality with under floor heating, rustic details mixed with high tech equipment and carefully landscaped gardens. A very exclusive property.

A first floor two bedroom apartment set in a gated community in the heart of the Gollf Valley, a five minute drive to both Puerto Banus and Marbella town centre, within easy reach of seven excellent golf courses and a whole host of leisure faciliites nearby. The complex offers a communal swimming pool and beautifully maintained, landscaped gardens that give the whole community a sense of spaciousness and tranquillity. Accommodation now consists of: - Lobby, a bright fully equipped kitchen; lounge/dining room with working fireplace, french windows leading to a terrace; two bedrooms; two bathrooms. The property is air conditioned and would be a wonderful holiday home and/or an excellent investment.

An stunning southwest facing, ground floor three bedroom apartment located in arguably the most exclusive urbanisation in Aloha Park in the heart of the Golf Valley, a five minute drive to Puerto Banus and within easy reach of a whole host of leisure facilities. Surrounded by a pine forest, this luxurious 24 hour gated and secure community has exotic tropical gardens, gymnasium and two swimming pools, one of which is indoors and heated. The accommodation consists of :- large entrance hall; guest cloakroom; very spacious lounge and dining room with French windows leading out to a covered terrace; private garden with a swimming pool; fully equipped and fitted kitchen; utility room; two guest bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and ample walk in wardrobes; master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom and direct access to the sunny terrace. High quality finishes and design, with under floor heating throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, video entry system, underground parking for two and a large storeroom. A truly exceptional property that resembles and feels like a villa.

A brand new three bedroom apartment within an exclusive luxury community offering 24hr security and two swimming pools.Lomas del Rey is located in the heart of the Golden Mile, only a short drive to Puerto Banus and Marbella town centre and within walking distance to Puente Romano hotel and the beach. Finishing touches are of the highest quality and include Mediterranean style marble fittings, hydro-massage baths; spacious terraces with spectacular views, kitchens fitted with Siemens appliances and underfloor heating throughout.

A south facing four bedroom penthouse in La Corniche, in the heart of the the Golf Valley within easy reach of seven local golf courses, a two minute drive to shops, restaurants and other amenities and a short stroll to Los Naranjos Golf Club. Puerto Banus and Marbella town centre are both less than ten minutes away. This gated and secure development offers offers a host of facilities including 24-hour security, superb landscaped grounds with two swimming pools, one of which is heated, and a flood lit paddel tennis court.The accommodation consists of: Entrance hall; guest claokroom; fully fitted and equipped kitchen with utility area; enormous lounge and dining area with access to a large covered terrace; two bedrooms with en-suite bathrroms; two further bedrooms sharing a bathroom.There is an enormous roof terrace with a Jacuzzi and panoramic views, ideal for outdoor entertaining all year round. The finishes are of the highest quality and tastefully decorated. Included are three parking places and a large storeroom.

Recently constructed family villa located in a frontline golf position in Lomas de La Quinta, a gated and secure community in the heart of the Golf Valley.Built on three levels and south facing with panoramic sea, mountain and golf views. Finished to the highest standards, this villa is tiled in a combination of Travertine marble and wooden parquet floors and is equipped with central oil underfloor heating, alarm system, hot & cold air conditrioning, satellite television, Lutron lighting system, central vacuum system and a water tank. This magnificent villa offers an entrance hall, reception room with fireplace, dining room with fireplace, summer dining on the covered porch, six bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, fully fitted kitchen with fireplace and breakfast area, home cinema room, wine cellar and heated indoor swimming pool with sauna and shower in the main house. The master suite includes a dressing room, fireplace, kitchenette and complete bathroom with jacuzzi bath and separate shower. The property includes an independent guest or staff wing consisting of a lounge, bedroom and bathroom. The property includes an infinity swimming pool barbecue with pergola and large terrace areas for great summer entertainment.

Brand new five bedroom family villa in Lomas de Marbella Club in the heart of the Golden Mile offering partial sea and mountain views. The villa is surrounded by a beautiful garden with a heated outdoor swimming pool. Built to a very high standard on three levels, the accommodation consists of, on ground floor:- ample entrance hall; spacious living and dining room with cathedral ceilings with access to the covered terrace, garden and pool; fully fitted and equipped modern kitchen with breakfast area and utility room; guest cloakroom; two guest bedroom suites. The upper floor consists entirely of the large master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, separate walk-in dressing area and a private terrace enjoying mountain views. The lower floor consists of:- two further bedroom suites; staff accommodation; office or games room and spacious garage large enough to take four cars. Further features include Iroco carpentry, underfloor heating throughout.
Architect: Héctor Conte Garriguet

25% Building Allowed. on this great plot in a very good location
Residential Plot, Marbella, Costa del Sol. Garden/Plot 3140 m².
Orientation : South. Views : Sea, Mountain. Security : Gated Complex.

Undoubtedly the most exclusive penthouse in Magna Marbella, in the heart of the Golf Valley, within easy reach of seven local golf courses, a two minute drive to shops, restaurants and other amenities and a short stroll to Los Naranjos Golf Club. Puerto Banus and Marbella town centre are both less than ten minutes away. This gated and secure development offers offers a host of facilities including 24-hour security, large communal swimming pool, a restaurant, nine hole golf course and beautifully maintained and vast landscaped gardens.The accommodation consists of: Impressive entrance hall; fully fitted and equipped kitchen with large dining area; enormous lounge with access to a large covered terrace; five bedrooms all with en-suite facilities. There is an enormous roof terrace with its own private swimming pool with breathtaking views .It also includes 2 memberships of the Magna Marbella Golf Club.

A ground floor two bedroom corner apartment in Las Cañas Beach, a luxurious frontline beach development built in typical Andalucian style and surrounded by lush tropical gardens, three swimming pools, children´s pool and direct access to the beach. Located directly on the Golden Mile, within walking distance to the exclusive Marbella Club and Puente Romano hotels. The accommodation consists of:- entrance hall, fitted kitchen, utility room; lounge/dining area with direct access to a private garden; master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; guest bedroom; guest bathroom. A great holiday home within easy reach of all amenities!

Fully reformed four bedroom villa in quiet residential area next to the Golf course of Guadalmina Alta, just five minutes walk to San Pedro centre, and a few minutes drive to the lake, cable-ski centre, golf course and the beach. Set back from the road this spacious, well proportioned one level villa has an entrance hall with guest cloakroom; fitted and equipped modern kitchen; utility room; leading to a raised terrace ideal for outdoor entertaining; spacious lounge/dining room with beautiful circular sun lounge area which leads down to the swimming pool with views directly towards Gibraltar; four large bedrooms all with direct access to the terrace; three bathrooms.There is self contained basement area with a working sauna, shower, cloakroom and several rooms which could be converted into guest accommodation, gymnasium or staff quarters.
This lovely bright property also has a private garage.
Planning permission has now been granted to extend the property.

A magnificent second line beach villa in one of the best areas of Guadalmina Baja, just steps away form the beach and a five minute drive to Puerto Banus. This exclusive property is surrounded by landscaped gardens with a large outdoor swimming pool and a BBQ area. The accommodation consists of: large entrance hall; guest cloakroom; spacious lounge with French windows leading to the large covered terrace with garden views; dining room; fully equipped kitchen with utility room; guest bedroom with en-suite facilities. The upper floor: en-suite master bedroom; two spacious guest suites. All the rooms have access to the extensive sunny terraces. A truly exceptional property offering privacy and tranquility!

These individually designed villas give new meaning to the concept of luxury living. Modern architecture and superb finishes combine with the exquisite use of light and space to create homes offering the very highest standards of comfort and accommodation. Located only minutes from both Marbella and Puerto Banús, they enjoy pride of place on one of the Costa del Sol´s finest golf courses whilst, at the same time, being a relaxing haven of peace and tranquility. Rarely are such extraordinary qualities found together in one development. Atalaya Fairways comprises 16 individually designed, 3 storey villas with the following characteristics: The basement offers a three car garage, a machine room and a large, open plan area which can be used as the owner desires. The ground floor comprises a large, entrance hall flooded with natural light. The kitchen has a south east aspect, enjoying natural light throughout the day, and magnificent views. The living-dining room is a central feature of the villa, and has been carefully designed to offer supreme comfort and luxury as well as the finest views the location can offer. The ground floor also offers two bedrooms with their individual en-suite bathrooms and a guest toilet and is complemented by a porch and spacious terraces from which the pool is accessed. The first floor houses a further two or three bedrooms with their own complete bathrooms and dressing areas en-suite. The master bedroom suite has a dressing room and a large bathroom with exceptional views as well as ample terraces. Discover luxury living at its very best.

A southwest facing first floor two bedroom apartment set in the gated community of Lorcrimar, within easy reach of seven local golf courses, a two minute drive to shops, restaurants and other amenities and a short stroll to Puerto Banus. This gated and secure development offers a large communal swimming pools set in vast andscaped gardens, that give the whole community a sense of spaciousness and tranquillity.The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully fitted and equipped kitchen with utility room; lounge/dining area with French windows leading out to the large terrace; master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; guest bedroom; guest bathroom. The property is offered with underground parking for one car.

Impressive six bedroom south facing villa in Sierra Blanca, one of the most prestigious areas in Marbella. The property has stunning sea and mountain views from the garden and terraces. Property consists of: Eight meter high entrance hall, large salon, rustic style kitchen with storage room, two dining rooms, six bedrooms with en-suite facilities, cinema room, turkish bath and fitness room. The property boasts of beautiful landscaped gardens with a 12m x 7m swimming pool, antique olive tree, palm trees and flowers. It also enjoys of large sun terraces on all floors. Some features are: Italian marble and antique details and accessories like windows, wooden doors, ceramics, etc; 24/7 security and two alarm systems; A/C hot and cold; large garage for 8 cars, additional apartment for staff.

Brand new villa completed in 2007 with panoramic golf, mountain and sea views. There are various terraces and porches, as well as a garden with private swimming pool. Impressive entrance hall leads you to the spacious living iroom with a beautiful fireplace and double hight, beamed ceiling. The dining room has acces to one of the terraces. The kitchen is modern and totally equipped. To the left side of the entrance hall there are two bedrooms sharing a bathroom and quiet independent there is anothe bedroom suite on this level with a dressing room. The master bedroom is upstairs and has a luxury bathroom and dressing room, all of the rooms have views to the golf course. Marble flooring throughout except kitchen and terraces, air conditioning, excellent interior doors, double glazed high quality aluminium windows and two car garage are some of the extra features of this villa. The property is sold fully furnished.

A magnificent south facing four bedroom townhouse located in the award winning village of La Heredia, set in a quiet hillside and offering spectacular views all the way to Gibraltar and over the sea as far as the African coast. The property is just five minutes from San Pedro de Alcántara and a short drive to Marbella centre. This individually designed, colourful townhouse offers space and quality, the result is modern day comfort and luxury with style and ambience. The skill of Andalucian craftsmen is evident throughout the townhouse. Antique wooden doors, hand painted tiles, wrought ironwork, vaulted wooden ceilings are just a few of the traditional details which are predominant features. An extraordinary property brimming over with beauty, elegance and timeless charm.

This large family villa situated within the residential area of Guadalmina Alta, nestled between golf courses, close to local amenities and within a short drive to both San Pedro town centre and Puerto Banus.This pretty villa is set in a mature and private plot with lovely landscaped gardens, extensive terraces both sunny and shaded and provides excellent accommodation that consists of; entrance hall; large lounge with dining room and working fireplace leading through French doors to a large terrace with lovely open views, spacious kitchen with breakfast area, formal dining room; TV room which could be converted back into a bedroom; five bedroom suites, cloakroom, laundry area; large games room; and an integral garage. Finished to a high standard with marble floors throughout, underfloor heating and electric shutters.

A well presented south facing villa in La Cerquilla, undoubtedly on of the most exclusive areas of Nueva Andalucia, in the heart of the Golf Valley, within easy reach of several golf courses and a short drive to both Puerto Banus and Marbella centre. The villa was constructed in1999 and extended with the guest house in 2003 and is set in landscaped gardens with a swimming pool.. Double wooden gates lead you up the driveway to a large carport and the entrance to villa. The accommodation consists of:- entrance hall; spacious lounge with dining room; a fully fitted kitchen with dining area, laundry room; guest cloakroom; four bedrooms; three bathrooms; maid´s bedroom with en-suite facilities; laundry room and various storeage rooms. The guest house consists of:- two en-suite bedrooms; fitted kitchen; lounge. Further features include central Under Floor Heating, alarm, A/C hot & cold, garage large enough to take two and further private parking and a fruit garden. The extensive terraces have views to the inmaculate gardens and sea views from the master bedroom. A great family home offering total privacy and tranquility.

Magnificent front line golf villa recently renovated by the current owner to a very high standard and decorated in a contemporaray style. The property was originally designed by Melvin Villaroel in a combination of Andalusian and Asian style. The property is accessed through a courtyard entrance with a fountain and is surrounded by landscaped tropical gardens with various fish ponds, Thai pergola and a Gazebo with a Jacuzzi. The accommodation consists of:- spacious lounge with working fireplace and wooden vaulted ceiling; dining room;fully fitted and equipped kitchen; laundry room; five bedrooms; five bathrooms; cienma room and games room. There is a separate guest house consisting of: - one bedroom with en suite bathroom, lounge, private terrace and fully fitted kitchen. Further features include a heated swimming pool with cascade, fibre optic illumination and under water sound system, underfllor heating in the bathrooms, air conditioning, alarm system, security cameras and B & O sound system, automatic irrigation with its own water well with tank, two car garage and various storage areas. A unique property offering peace and tranquility.

Impressive seven bedroom south facing modern villa set in the prestigious gated front line golf community of El Herrojo Alto, offering tranquility and 24 hr security. Built on three levels to a very high standard , the villa enjoys panoramic sea and mountain views reaching all the way to Africa and Gibraltar. The accommodation consists of:-spacious lounge; dining room; office; guest cloakroom; fully fitted kitchen; laundry room; gym and sauna with a massage and relaxation area and shower, en-suite master bedroom with walk-in dressing room , three terraces, solarium and shower. The ground floor has a living room with cinema and billiard room, a bedroom suite and a further two bedrooms sharing one bathroom, another living room with access to a and ironing room, storage, garage for one car and a separate two bedroom staff apartment. The property is to be sold with all the furniture including the sound system , pre-installation of domotic control and installation for cctv security perimeter cameras on the plot with infrared and sensors.

Moorish four bedroom semi-detached villa in Nueva Andalucia, close to the bull ring and just a few minutes walk from Puerto Banus. The accommodation consists of four bedrooms, three bathrooms, an independent maids room, dining area, spacious, sunny living room with open fireplace and underground parking space. It also has a private matured garden with barbecue area and swimming pool.

An excellent front line beach, three bedroom corner duplex apartment located in arguably the most exclusive urbanisation on the Costa del Sol, a five minute walk along the beach to Puerto Banus. This 24 hour gated and secure community has exotic tropical gardens, gymnasium, sauna, beauty centre, Turkish bath and two swimming pools, one of which is indoors and heated. The accommodation consists of :- large entrance hall; guest cloakroom; spacious lounge and dining room with French windows leading out to a covered terrace with steps leading down to a private pool; open plan fully equipped and fitted kitchen; utility room; two guest bedrooms with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom and ample walk in wardrobes. The lower floor consists of:-further bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom; large lounge and direct access to the plunge pool and gardens. High quality finishes and design throughout.
Further features include under floor heating throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, video entry system, underground parking for two cars and a large storeroom.

A modern four bedroom villa built on a south facing hillside offering spectacular mountain and sea views. The property forms part of the mature, well established and gated community country estate El Madroñal, situated on the Ronda Road, with both tennis and golf nearby, only a short drive to both San Pedro de Alcantara and Puerto Banus.The design of this modern property has a rustic feel with every attention to detail and comfort. Built on three floors, the accommodation consists of:- entrance hall; guest cloakroom; spacious lounge with open firepalce and a delightful formal dining area; the kitchen is a paradox of country style and comfort; four large bedrooms suites all with access to the terraces with stunning views. Outside you have extensive terraces, sunny and covered, beautiful lawns, an elegant swimming pool and an outdoor Jacuzzi.The property also has a three-car garage, cinema room, games room and a sauna. A truly exceptional property!

This estate is only 1300 meters away from the cosy village of Benahavis, and six km´s from the beach. A mountain and countryside property on more than 11.000 square meters of land, about 275 meters above sea-level overlooking the mountains, sea, the bay of Marbella and Puerto Banus. "Nido de Aguila" is set in a truly unique location. With an incomparable combination of views and privacy at the same time. From the gate, your own long drive-way leads you to the oasis called "Nido del Aguila". There you find profound tranquillity, absolute and complete privacy, rural surroundings with great and spectacular views. No direct neighbours and "jet-set" Marbella and Puerto Banus at your feet. "Nido del Aguila" has a country atmosphere, combined with all modern comforts. This villa, all on one level, consists of: entrance, study/TV-room, library, dining room, spacious kitchen, living-lounge (50 m2), three bedrooms and three bathrooms. Plans for a roof apartment (two bedrooms suite and bathroom) are ready and available. The stafhouse, seperate from the house, grants you full privacy.

A south facing second floor, two bedroom apartment in Los Arrayanes, a gated and secure exclusive development consisting of thirty five apartments and penthouses set in well maintained landscaped gardens and two communal swimming pools. Located in the heart of the Golf Valley and within easy reach of seven excellent golf courses, local shops, restaurants, Puerto Banus and Centro Plaza and only a five minute drive to both San Pedro and Marbella town centre. The accommodation consists of:- entrance hall; fully fitted and equipped kitchen, spacious lounge/dining area with French windows leading out to a large private terrace with panoramic golf and sea views; master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; guest bedroom with en-suite facilities. Further features include underfloor heating in the bathrooms, hot & cold air conditioning and underground parking for one car and a large storeroom.

URB. LORCRIMAR IV EL RODEO, NUEVA ANDALUCIA/PUERTO BANUS
2 bedroom / 2 bathroom groundfloor apartment. South facing. Gated community. Near the community pool.
A/C with heating, marble floors, parking space.
Close to all amenities, walking distance, 5 to 10 minutes to the beach, Puerto Banus and Marbella town centre.
Community fees: 75€ per month IBI: 790€ per year Basura: 186€ per year

A well presented 4 bedroom villa in the heart of Nueva Andalucia situated on the ever popular Atalaya De Rio Verde. Set on a 1500 SQM plot with a heated private pool and jacuzzi. On entering the property into a spacious hall the Lounge with feature fireplace and dining areas lead out onto elevated terrace´s. The large fully equiped kitchen adjoins the dining area. On this floor there is also a guest bedroom with ensuite and a separate guest bathroom. Upstairs there is the Master bedroom with ensuite and two further bedroom each with ensuite facilities. Downstairs in the basement there is a snooker / games room with bar area and a separate cinema room. A large 2 car garage can also be accessed from the basement.

Fully renovated contemporary style house, finished mid April 2014. Located in one of the most sought after areas in Marbella. Frontline Las Brisas Golf with beautiful views of the golf course and La Concha. Only 3 minutes from Puerto Banus and all amenities. Four golf courses within 5 minutes.
Built to the highest standard and with a lot of extras.
5 bedrooms / 5 bathrooms, open plan kitchen with dining area, cosy living room with fireplace, home cinema/office, second kitchen in the patio, comfortable terraces, infinity pool with pre-installation for heating, underfloor heating & cooling, individual A/C in all rooms, home automation system.

An immaculate southeast facing, first floor three bedroom apartment situated in the gated and secure development Los Dragos, within walking distance of both Puerto Banus and Centro Plaza and only a five minute drive to Marbella town centre.Located in the heart of the Golf Valley and within easy reach of seven excellent golf courses, there are a whole host of leisure faciliites nearby. This residential community offers manicured landscaped tropical gardens, a large communal swimming pool, tennis and paddle courts. The accommodation consists of:-entrance hall; fully fitted and equipped kitchen with laundry room and a spiral staircase leading to a roof terrace; guest cloakroom; lounge/dining area with working fireplace and French windows leading out to a covered terrace with garden, mountain and golf views; en-suite master bedroom with direct access to the terrace, two guest bedrooms sharing a bathroom.

A brand new south facing, front line beach, three bedroom duplex apartment in Casablanca Beach, undoubtedly on the most luxurios developments in San Pedro de Álcantara. This gated and secure community surrounded by exotic tropical gardens, a large communal swmming pool and direct access to the beach. Built to a very high standard the large terraces have unspoilt panoramic views to Africa, the sea and the communal pools and gardens. The bedrooms, living-room and corridors floors are made of first quality marble, fully installed air-conditioning with hot and cold regulation. Totally fitted and equipped kitchen. Spacious rooms and ample terraces, with excellent qualities, selected to create that all important ambient, both inside and outside the property.

A south west facing three bedroom penthouse in the exclusive development in Los Granados Golf in the heart of the Golf Valley, overlooking the fairways of the exclusive Royal Las Brisas Golf course with unspoilt panoramic golf, sea and mountain views. The property is within easy reach of seven other excellent golf courses and are a whole host of leisure faciliites. This complex is part of the Los Granados Group with facilities that include 24 hr security, mature landscaped gardens with a large swimming pool, indoor pool and gymnasium. The accommodation consists of:- entrance lobby; fully fitted and equipped kitchen; utility room; lounge and dining area with spiral staircase leading to a salon that could be used as an occasional fourth bedroom and an enormous sunny terrace with a private plunge pool; en-suite master bedroom with direct access to the terrace, two guest bedrooms with en-suite facilities.Further features include hot & cold air conditioning and alarm system.

A spacious south facing, four bedroom first floor apartment in the prestigious and luxurious gated community of Monte Paraiso, above the Golden Mile and within a five minute drive to Marbella centre or to Puerto Banus. The community has twenty-four-hour security, lush tropical gardens, four communal pools and a fully equipped fitness centre. The apartment has magnificent living rooms and are as practical as they are impressive offering views across the ample terraces to the mountains and sea. Each of the three double bedrooms continue the theme of sophisticated design with varnished wooden flooring and stunning en-suite bathrooms as does the fourth which is located off the fully equipped and fitted kitchen and so can be used as staff quarters. Underground parking for two cars and a large storeroom are included.Totally renovated by the current owner to an exceptionally high standard making the apartment brand new in every respect!

We present to you this five bedroom townhouse located in the heart of the Golden Mile in Marbelah Pueblo. This well maintained gated and secure community offers tranquillity in a traditional Andalucian setting with tropical gardens; two large communal pools, Paddle tennis court, a five minute walk to the beach and only a short drive to Marbella and Puerto Banus. Built on three levels, the accommodation consists of entrance lobby, guest cloakroom; fully equipped and fitted kitchen; spacious lounge/dining area with working fireplace and direct access to a covered terrace and private garden; guest bedroom. The upper floor consists of:- two bedrooms with en-suite facilities; en-suite master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and a private terrace with sea views. The lower floor has a laundry room; games room; guest apartment with en-suite bedroom; lounge and pre-installed kitchen. Further features include underfloor heating, video entry system, alarm and underground parking for two cars.

This large south facing family townhouse situated within the residential area of Guadalmina Alta, nestled between golf courses, close to local amenities and within a short drive to both San Pedro town centre and Puerto Banus. Built on two levels, the accommodation consists of:- entrance lobby; fitted kitchen, separate utility room; a spacious lounge/dining area with French windows leading out on to a covered terrace with a large private garden offering spectacular golf views; four bedrooms, three bathrooms. Finished to a high standard with marble floors throughout, hot and cold air-conditioning and alarm system, this lovely townhouse is perfect as a prestigious holiday home or for all round living.

A modern four bedroom villa designed and built over three floor levels. The property is situated in the Golf valley set in 1100m2 of beautiful mature gardens and terraces.Remote control gates give access to the villa with magnificent double wooden doors lead you into the spacious lounge with open fireplace and separate dining room, with French windows leasding out to the terrace, and the garden,delightful fitted kitchen with dining area, guest cloakroom, one guest bedroom suite ground floor, on the upper floor is situated the spacious master suite with terrace and bathroom with Jacuzzi bath and separate shower, two further bedroom suites. The lower floor consists of: a utility room, and a further rooms whoch could easily be converted into a games room, gymnasium and a further guest bedroom. The villa has exceptional qualities such us marble floors all throughout, It has air conditioning hot and cold, alarm system.

An immaculate southwest facing corner two bedroom penthouse set in the exclusive and gated community of Fuente Aloha, in the heart of Nueva Andalucia, just a few minutes from Centro Plaza, Puerto Banus and within easy reach some of the best beaches and golf courses. This well maintained community offers a host of facilities including 24-hour security, two swimming pools, one of which is heated indoor, fully equipped gymnasium, Jacuzzi and beautiful landscaped gardens. Accommodation consists of: entrance lobby off of which is a living and dining room with French windows leading out to a sunny terrace, a fully fitted kitchen with a utility / laundry room, en-suite guest bedroom with it´s own lounge area. The upper floor consists entirely of the master bedroom with a large en-suite bathroom, ample wardrobe space and access a large roof terrace with a BBQ area and a Jacuzzi, ideal for entertaining.The property includes a parking space and a large storeroom.

A stunning south facing three bedroom corner and very private ground floor apartment situated in an exclusive gated community in Mansion Club, nestling in the foothills of Sierra Blanca and only a short drive to Marbella town centre and Puerto Banus. This development designed by leading architects, Villarroel is set in landscaped tropical gardens with walk ways; lakes, pergolas and mosaics are exquisite features which give this development a marked Andalucian flavour. The accommodation consists of: entrance lobby; very spacious lounge and dining room with French windows leading out to a covered terrace; open plan fully equipped and fitted kitchen; utility room; two guest bedrooms with ample with wardrobe space; master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom. All bedrooms have direct access to the sunny terrace. High quality finishes and design, with under floor heating throughout, hot and cold A/C and video entry system.

Meisho Hills is an exclusive residential development, consisting of fifty eight luxury apartments-villas and located in Sierra Blanca, undoubtedly one of the most exclusive areas of Marbella. Bordering the natural parkland and protected pine forests of Nagüeles, yet only a few minutes drive from the centre of Marbella, Puerto Banús and superb golf courses, Meisho Hills enjoys a privileged elevated location with spectacular sea and mountain views. Two-storey Apartment-Villas of six different types and innovative and modern design, offer a choice of two, three, or four bedrooms, each with suite bathrooms, complete with Jacuzzi or Duravit tub. Villas are dotated with private lifts and private swimming pools, private garages for two, or three cars, two or three basement storage areas which can easily be converted into a gym, media suite or wine cellar. The finest selection of materials is used throughout, combining wood, stone, marble, with modern conveniences such as intelligent house system, under floor heating, air conditioning, top quality Italian Salvarani kitchens fully equipped with Miele appliances.The magnificent onsite facilities include two outdoor swimming pools, three fitness areas featuring gym, indoor pool, saunas, Turkish baths, verdant landscaped gardens with ambient lighting, and 24-hour security. The properties range in size from a total of 350 to 940 square metres.

An exceptional south facing three bedroom villa in the heart of Golf Valley and within walking distance to Los Naranjos Golf Club and only a short drive to Centro Plaza and Puerto Banus. This outstanding villa is surrounded by immaculately landscaped gardens. The accommodation consists of an entrance hall, guest cloakroom; fully equipped and fitted kitchen incorporating a breakfast area, a spacious and bright lounge with working fireplace and French windows leading onto a large partially covered terrace overlooking the large swimming pool which is solar powered, en-suite master bedroom with direct access to the terrace and two guest bedrooms sharing a fully tiled bathroom. The lower floor consists of a wine cellar, a large room which could be converted into a guest bedroom or for staff quarters with lounge area. Further features include under floor heating throughout, hot and cold air conditioning and a secure integral garage large enough for two cars.

Imposing south east facing front line golf family villa, rustic in style, located in a quiet street in Los Naranjos Golf, one of the best areas within the Golf Valley of Nueva Andalucia and within easy reach of schools, shops and leisure amenities including seven golf courses within a seven minute drive. Puerto Banus, San Pedro and Marbella town are all within a ten minute drive away. The property itself provides: on the ground floor, large salon with French doors to the upper terrace with unobstructed golf and sea views, modern kitchen, guest bedroom and bathroom and a bedroom suite. upstairs are two further bedroom suites with terraces that have panoramic sea, golf and mountain views. The lower level has one further bedroom suite and a large cellar suitable for conversion to a number of different uses. The landscapes gardens have a pool and sufficient space for a tennis court if required. This lovely house is excellent as is but has potential for further development.

Set within the famous La Quinta Golf & Country Club, La Mariposas villas boast sea, golf and mountain views. Due to the plot´s level terrain, it offers substantial space, including a landscaped tropical garden with heated swimming pool and pool house. Owners benefit from exclusive privileged use of all the facilities of La Quinta and are only five minutes away from Puerto Banus. Las Mariposas have been designed by Pablo de Mena Owens, one of the leading architects in Spain. A choice of modern style villas where no expense has been spared in construction and design. They include Travertine marble bathrooms, underfloor heating and the highest quality appliances. The villa has 4 en-suite bedrooms with expansive entertainment areas including landscaped terraces. Could also include a home entertainment system, wine cellar and gymnasium if required. Ample garage for two or more cars and 24 hours security system.
One of the Villas is complete the other 2 are shells. The price however is for a completed Villa.

Set within the famous La Quinta Golf & Country Club, La Mariposas villas boast sea, golf and mountain views. Due to the plot´s level terrain, it offers substantial space, including a landscaped tropical garden with heated swimming pool and pool house. Owners benefit from exclusive privileged use of all the facilities of La Quinta and are only five minutes away from Puerto Banus. Las Mariposas have been designed by Pablo de Mena Owens, one of the leading architects in Spain. A choice of modern style villas where no expense has been spared in construction and design. They include Travertine marble bathrooms, underfloor heating and the highest quality appliances. The villa has 4 en-suite bedrooms with expansive entertainment areas including landscaped terraces. Could also include a home entertainment system, wine cellar and gymnasium if required. Ample garage for two or more cars and 24 hours security system.

Set within the famous La Quinta Golf & Country Club, La Mariposas villas boast sea, golf and mountain views. Due to the plot´s level terrain, it offers substantial space, including a landscaped tropical garden with heated swimming pool and pool house. Owners benefit from exclusive privileged use of all the facilities of La Quinta and are only five minutes away from Puerto Banus. Las Mariposas have been designed by Pablo de Mena Owens, one of the leading architects in Spain. A choice of modern style villas where no expense has been spared in construction and design. They include Travertine marble bathrooms, underfloor heating and the highest quality appliances. The villa has 4 en-suite bedrooms with expansive entrertainment areas inlcuding landscaped terraces. Could also include a home entertainment system, wine cellar and gymnasium if required. Ample garage for two or more cars and 24 hours security system. The listed price is for a completed villa.

Charming southeast facing four bedroom villa is a tasteful rustic style property in perfect conditions, located in Las Brisas with an easy reach to golf courses and other leisure facilities, being just ten minutes drive from Puerto Banus and Marbella. Accommodation consists of: entrance hall leading to the bright and spacious living room with fireplace and dining area with french doors leading to the covered terrace with sea views, garden, pool and pagoda which offers fantastic views of the mountains and the sea; kitchen with access to the gardens, two bedrooms, sharing the bathroom, the master bedroom with en-suite facilities and a guest toilet; the upper floor consists entirely of the bright study, which can be converted in another bedroom. On the lower floor there is a laundry/storage room and the guest apartment with french doors, leading to the pool and gardens. Features include: air conditioning, underfloor heating, alarm system, electric blinds, double garage.

Marvellous three bedroom south facing rustic villa of elegant and substantial proportions built by the owner twenty years ago to the highest standards, set in the prestigious gated front line golf community of El Herrojo Alto, offering tranquility and 24 hour security. Around the corner from the La Quinta clubhouse, this villa is within easy reach of a whole host of other golf courses and leisures facilities. The accommodation consists of: Antique entrance door leading to the entrance hall with double hight vaulted ceiling and patio with water feature, guest cloakroom and a hallway leading to the bedrooms: two guest bedrooms sharing a dressing room each with en-suite bathroom and a bright double aspect master bedroom suite at the end, with double hight vaulted ceiling, two dressing rooms, en-suite bathroom with jacuzzi and shower. Off the entrance hall is the lounge with fireplace and french doors to the terrace and private mature landscaped gardens with pool, the double aspect dining room, kitchen, laundry and study. To the rear of the house is another terrace perfect for alfresco dining or conversion to another living room. Features include: hot and cold air conditioning, alarm system, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, two very spacious garages, italian tiling.

This rustic style five bedroom villa built on a southwest facing hillside offering spectacular mountain and sea views. The property forms part of the mature, well established and gated community country estate El Madroñal.. Situated on the Ronda Road, with both tennis and golf nearby, only a five minute drive to San Pedro de Alcantara and ten minutes to Puerto Banus. The entrance is through a tranquil patio with stunning views and a beautiful rustic style door that leads to the high ceiling hall. Accommodation also includes:- a spacious living room with fireplace and separate dinning room, modern design kitchen with breakfast bar, separate breakfast room, guest cloakroom, entertainment room, garage and ample storage space. Separated from the main house is an independent guest apartment. There are sunny terraces all around the property, a large manicured garden with 400m² artificial grass a swimming pool with lounge area and a gated access road with a lawn of fruit trees.

Stunning four bedroom south-west facing family villa set in the prestigious urbanization of El Paraíso Alto, just a stone´s throw away from one of the most prestigious golf courses of the New Golden Mile, two minutes drive to the beach and fifteen minutes to Puerto Banus. The accommodation consists of: Entrance hall with french door leading onto the L shaped terrace with fantastic sea views, cloakroom, laundry room, very light and spacious living room with fireplace and two french doors leading onto the terrace and a huge kitchen with dining area. The upper floor is entirely occupied by the enormous double height vaulted ceiling master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and fireplace. It also has its own private terrace which can be accessed by one the two french doors. On the lower floor there are big french doors giving access to the covered wrap around terraces and a beautiful landscaped gardens with pool and jacuzzi; three more bedrooms, all with french doors leading onto the gardens and two of them with ensuite facilities, plus an extra bathroom and a room which could be used as a gym. Features of this immaculate property include marble floors throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, children´s playground in the garden, a huge driveway which could easily take two or three cars and two double garages.

Brand new south east facing villa finished to a very high standard and with views across Las Brisas golf course set the heart of the golf valley, within very easy reach of all amenities and five minute´s drive to Puerto Banus. Accommodation consists of, on the ground floor; two bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, a guest cloak room, fully fitted kitchen, large living-dining room with working fireplace, substantial private covered terraces leading to the private garden with a 10 x 5 metre swimming pool. At the lower level there is a large three car garage and a separate bedroom with en-suite. On the first floor there is a master suite, luxury bathroom and walk-in dressing area. Features include air conditioning, under-floor heating in the bathrooms, fireplace, automatic watering system in the garden and a private lift from the garage to all floors.

Large south-facing 3-bedroom ground floor corner apartment in the prestigious and luxurious gated community of Monte Paraiso, above the Golden Mile, within a five minute drive to Marbella centre or to Puerto Banus. The community has twenty-four-hour security, lush tropical gardens, four communal pools and a fully equipped fitness centre. The apartment has abundant natural light as a result of its prime southwest corner location and the corresponding additional windows. It is an especially convenient property for families with young children, as the private covered terrace has a lockable gate that opens to a walkway leading directly to one of the swimming pools, located 10 metres from the gate on the other side of a privacy hedge. Inside the apartment is an exceptionally large living area with two sets of glass double doors leading out to the terrace. The master bedroom has a large en-suite bathroom with an oversized Jacuzzi, while the other two bedrooms, which are on the other side of the apartment, share a second bathroom.

A large and luxurious south facing villa high up in Sierra Blanca, easily one of the more prestigious residential areas of Marbella. An ornate perimeter wall with kerbside gate opens to a lush garden with various fountains and statues and Infinity swimming pool with panoramic views to the coast, Gibraltar and across to Africa. Double doorway to house opens to a double height vaulted ceiling foyer with marble floors, leading to a very large living room with floor to ceiling windows, affording stunning views. There is a separate formal dining room with fireplace and seating for ten. The adjoining oak kitchen is similarly spacious and includes of top-of-the-range appliances. The house boasts six bedrooms, each with its own luxurious en-suite bathroom. Three are on the main floor while three are upstairs. The upstairs bedrooms, which include the master suite, are all south facing and share a large wraparound terrace. There is a full basement with bodega, eight-person Jacuzzi, six-car garage and a separate one bedroom staff apartment.

A southwest facing near-luxury two bedroom first floor apartment just steps from the beach in Bahia Marbella, considered to be a jewel in the crown of beachside locations in the Marbella area. A secure and tranquil oasis three minutes´ drive east of Marbella centre, Bahia Marbella is a privileged beachside enclave of a handful of villas, townhouses and apartments all within a short walk to a pristine beach that is bordered by sand dunes still with unspoiled natural vegetation. This apartment has clear views to the sea, as well as to the mountains. Inside, the apartment has a welcoming foyer that opens to a bright living/dining area with built-in shelves and a fireplace, with glass doors leading to a covered terrace that faces the sea. The fitted and equipped kitchen is large enough that it has a small table. A separate utility/laundry room sits beyond it and is a good source of natural light for the kitchen. There are two bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom, and a second full bathroom.
All furniture is included in the price.

A southwest facing one bedroom townhouse in the heart of the Golden Mile in Lomas de Marbella Club Pueblo. This well maintained community offers tranquillity in an idyllic setting, built in typical Andalucian style with whitewashed houses, cobbled streets and Moorish influences. The urbanisation has lush tropical gardens; a large communal pool which is heated in the winter, and is within walking distance to the beach, the five star Puente Romano hotel and a five minute drive to Marbella centre and the cosmopolitan Puerto Banus. This property retains some original features including antique wooden doors and Ronda floor tiles. Accommodation consists of: Entrance lobby; spacious lounge with working fireplace and french windows leading on to a patio. The first floor consists of: spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom. This property is ideal as a holiday home or permanent residence.

A traditional south facing five bedroom villa surrounded by mature landscaped gardens in the heart of ´Golf valley´, close to Puerto Banus, Centro Plaza and Marbella. The accommodation consists of :- spacious lounge with working fireplace and French windows leading on to the large terrace with spectacular views to Los Naranjos golf course and the sea; dining room; fully equipped and fitted kitchen with breakfast area; guest cloakroom, two double en-suite bedrooms: The upper floor consists entirely of the master bedroom with a private terrace with sea and golf views; en-suite bathroom, ample wardrobe space. The lower floor consists of: two en-suite guest bedrooms, wine cellar; utility room; laundry room; a large office, guest shower room; a bar with direct access to the covered terrace which is ideal for entertaining guests. The villa is surrounded by mature landscaped gardens with steps down to a swimming pool and BBQ area. This delightful villa has under floor heating throughout and a garage.

A substantial south facing seven bedroom villa in of one of most luxurious developments on the Costa del Sol. La Zagaleta is nestled on a mountainside in an idyllic valley with lush vegetation including olive and pine trees, as well as wildlife and natural lakes. The Villa is new and ready to move in. The Villa has a 10 car garage.

An immaculate FRONTLINE beach, ground floor three bedroom apartment in one of the best developments in Puerto Banus, only a few minutes drive to Marbella town centre. This 24 hour secure and gated community has well maintained tropical landscaped gardens with walkways and direct access to the beach, two swimming pools, one heated, the other fresh-water, a fully equipped gym and two indoor Jacuzzis. The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully equipped and fitted kitchen; utility room; dining area and spacious lounge with fireplace and direct access to the large sunny terrace with spectacular sea views; cinema room; three spacious bedrooms; en-suite facilities and direct access to the terrace. Built to the highest standards with furniture and design by Pedro Peña, features include marble floors throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, under floor heating, Domotic system.

A large south facing four bedroom townhouse above the Golden Mile in Marbella Hill Village with magnificent sea views and only a five minute drive to both Puerto Banus and Marbella town centre. The accommodation consists of :- entrance hall; guest cloakroom; bright and spacious lounge with working fireplace and French windows leading to a sunny terrace with sea views; dining room; kitchen which is to be fitted with independent entrance; guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom. The upper floor consists entirely of a large master bedroom; en-suite Jacuzzi bath and ample wardrobe space. The lower floor consists of :- two double guest bedrooms with en-suite facilities and a garage large enough to take two cars. Further features of this property include video entry system, alarm, under floor heating throughout. An excellent property for someone looking for a peaceful and quiet location with spectacular views!

A large south facing, three bedroom ground floor apartment in the 24hr gated community of Albatross Hill Club at the top of the Golf Valley and within easy reach of Puerto Banus. The well maintained community has excellent facilities including lush tropical gardens, two swimming pools, sauna, fully equipped gym, tennis court and a clubhouse. The accommodation consists of: entrance hall; fully equipped kitchen with breakfast area; utility room; bright and spacious lounge with fireplace and access to a large, partially covered terrace with impressive sea, golf and mountain views; dining area; master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom and separate double walk-in shower; ample wardrobe space; en-suite guest bedroom; third bedroom with en-suite facilities. Features include hot & cold A/C, electric blinds, under floor heating throughout and video door entry. There is underground parking for one car and a store room.

A charming four bedroom cortijo in a secure and gated estate in the Marbella Club Golf & Country Club Resort. Entry gates lead to an impressive palm-clad, antique paved driveway and on through a bell tower arch to a formal courtyard with ample parking space as well as access to the Andalucian patio and main front doors. The accommodation consists of: - entrance hall leading to a spacious lounge with working fireplace; cinema room; guest cloakroom; fully equipped and fitted open plan kitchen incorporating a large dining room; separate utility room; two guest bedrooms with en-suite facilities. The upper floor consist of :- an impressive master bedroom with wooden beam ceiling; large en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom and double walk-in shower; separate lounge area; a further en-suite guest bedroom. All the rooms have direct access to the sunny terraces with breathtaking panoramic views. The property is surrounded by exotic gardens with walkways, fountain, a BBQ area and there is a large outdoor swimming pool.

An impressive south facing frontline beach five bedroom villa in Guadalmina Baja, just meters away for the beach and short drive to San Pedro and Puerto Banus. Wrought iron gates open onto a courtyard with water feature leading to gardens and the entrance to house. The accommodation:- large entrance hall with sweeping staircase to the upper floor, guest cloakroom; fully equipped kitchen; utility room; laundry room; one bedroom staff quarters with en-suite facilities; sunny lounge with fireplace and French windows leading to the large partially covered terrace; study, dining room; guest bedroom with en-suite and wardrobe space. The upper floor:- en-suite master bedroom with access to terrace, walk-in wardrobe; two double bedrooms; en-suite bathrooms. All bedrooms have direct access to the terrace with breathtaking views. This unique property is set in beautifully landscaped gardens with direct access to the beach, an outdoor swimming pool with dining area, integral two car garage and large driveway.

A magnificent FRONTLINE beach mansion set in the grounds of the Puente Romano Hotel. Built on three levels, this impressive property is accessed through a private driveway and ornate gardens. The accommodation consists of, ground floor:- entrance hall; guest cloakroom; fully fitted and equipped kitchen with independent entrance; utility room; dining room with steps leading to a bright lounge; two en-suite guest bedrooms with direct access to the terrace with sea views. The lower floor:- games room; lounge with minstrels gallery and French windows leading to a covered terrace with bar; guest cloakroom with shower and changing facilities and a large swimming pool with direct access to the gardens and beach. The upper floor:- master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi bathroom, dressing room; en-suite guest bedroom. Other features include eight working fireplaces, wine cellar, pool bar, BBQ area with covered terrace. There are separate staff quarters with two bedrooms and one bathroom.

A magnificent second line beach villa in one of the best areas of Guadalmina Baja, just steps away form the beach and a five minute drive to Puerto Banus. This exclusive property is surrounded by landscaped gardens with a large outdoor heated swimming pool; water feature and a pavilion BBQ. The accommodation consists of: large entrance hall with impressive staircase leading to upper floor; guest cloakroom; spacious lounge with French windows leading to the large covered terrace with garden views; study with fireplace; dining room; fully equipped kitchen with breakfast area; wine cellar; gym; guest bedroom with en-suite facilities, two bedroom staff quarters with independent entrance. The upper floor: en-suite master bedroom; walk in dressing room; two spacious guest suites. Further features include central music system, alarm, video entry system, hot & cold A/C, electric blinds, and under-floor heating.

CHARMING UNIQUE TOWNHOUSE reduced in price from 520,000€ with 2 bedrooms 2 bathrooms southwest facing situated in the stunning Lomas Pueblo, Marbella Club in the heart of the Golden Mile. This well maintained and secure community has 96 unique properties and offers peace and tranquillity in a traditional Andalucian setting of whitewashed houses and cobbled streets. It has lush tropical gardens; a large communal pool (heated in the winter)and a lovely private Clubhouse. Built over three levels and retains many original features including antique floor tiles and wooden doors. Accommodation consists of entrance lobby, spacious lounge; a work studio/office (originally a large bedroom which can easily be reconverted), large bathroom. The first floor consists of a lounge with feature fireplace and French windows leading to a partially covered patio with a fountain feature, new fully fitted kitchen. The top floor consists of the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a sunny and private terrace.
The beach is a 10 minute walk away and Marbella and Puerto Banus only a short drive.
There is a private garage with extra storage space available by seperate negotiation.

Modern, stylish south facing ground-floor apartment in Terrazas de Puente Romano, a select community within the Puente Romano complex situated just a few meters from the beach in the heart of Marbella´s Golden Mile, adjacent to the five star Hotel Puente Romano. The prestigious, newly built complex consists of just three luxury buildings finished to the highest standards. This spacious two bedroom apartment consists of a large entrance leading into a tastefully furnished open plan living room with separate dining area and working fireplace, a modern kitchen and two large double en-suite bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. The guest bedroom includes a four poster bed and en-suite, while the master bathroom has garden views from the Jacuzzi bath as well and a separate shower room. Large French doors open onto an expansive terrace leading to a carefully manicured garden, infinity pool and an even larger second swimming pool. Each bathroom has under floor heating. A Bang & Olufsen sound system is installed throughout.

A uniquely private south facing seven bedroom villa in the exclusive community of Monte Mayor, located in Benahavis, one of the most picturesque and relatively undiscovered areas of the Costa del Sol. Accommodation consists of:- entrance hall; large bright lounge with working fireplace; dining room; fully equipped aad fitted kitchen; separate utility room; a laundry room ; cinema room; seven large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes; en-suite facilities; fitness room, servants quarters. This property has unobstructed sea views from the large terraces. The well maintained gardens lead you to a swimming pool and the views to La Concha Mountain are breathtaking. This villa is built with the best qualities and there are marble floors throughout, hot and cold air conditioning, under floor heating and an underground garage also includes a golf share.

Avec un lac magnifique et vue sur la montagne, la maison et la piscine stands dans 2 hectares de jardins sauvages, dans un verger en terrasse d'oliviers, d'amandiers et d'arbres fruitiers. Le secteur privé et tranquille La Palmera est accessible par la route de montagne pittoresque et un chemin privé. Une forte voiture vous amène dans le jardin merveilleusement sauvage, lumineux avec les fleurs sauvages au printemps. Quelque 100 mètres du chalet, une piste de la maison mène au lac. La Palmera est entré par le niveau supérieur qui dispose de trois chambres à coucher, le maître avec salle de bains familiale et supplémentaires. Un escalier en colimaçon vous emmène vers le niveau de vie qui a un style de cuisine / salle à manger de pays ayant accès à l'une des terrasses extérieures pour les repas al fresco, un salon avec une cheminée et baies vitrées aussi donnent sur la terrasse plein sud . Une grande salle de douche est également fournie à cet étage avec une laverie. Dans les jardins, il ya un bâtiment supplémentaire actuellement utilisé comme une autre chambre / bureau.

One of three remaining stunning Italianate villas, built to the highest standards in a secure gated community in one of the best locations on The Golden Mile close to The Marbella Club and Puente Romano Hotels. Accommodation consists of: Ground floor; magnificent double entrance doors leading to a double height vaulted entrance hall leading to a kitchen which is to be fitted, dining room, study, guest cloakroom and impressive galleried living area with access to the large terraces and the landscaped gardens and outdoor salt water pool. Immaculate south east facing three-bedroom, first floor apartment in the luxurious gated community of Monte Paraiso, above the Golden Mile, within a five minute drive to Marbella centre or Puerto Banus. The apartment includes spacious lounge and dining room, recently renovated fully equipped kitchen with separate utility room, master bedroom with en-suite Jacuzzi, plus a guest toilet and two guest bedrooms sharing a fully tiled bathroom. FANTASTIC OPPORTUNITY - BETTER THAN 90 % OF THE BANK REPOSITIONS!!!!!! Luxury villa, very bright with high room heights and high quality fittings, located within an exclusive and gated community of only 18 villas. The original sales price was of 2.150.000€, now the owner has decided to sell if for 1.200.000€, this means a price reduction of 45 %! There some other villas for sale in this development but they cannot keep up with this one due to the qualities and the situation. Therefore, this corner villa in our opinion is the best unit in the whole development. The ground floor offers an entrance hall, kitchen with breakfast corner, guest cloak, elevator, bedroom with bathroom en suite, large living room with dining area and nice terrace. The first floor comprises the master bedroom with private terrace and dressing room and two further bedrooms en suite. Moreover, there are two further bedrooms en suite and a living room in the basement. The large garage, which is also in the basement, offers space for up to 3 cars. Although the villa has no private pool, there is a marvellous heated swimming pool with sun deck and pergola in the large communal garden. Worth mentioning is the fact that all the villas in this marvellous development are accessed through an underground access which leads you directly into your garage so that there is no traffic on the exterior which is of advantage specially if you have children. Purchasing the furniture is negotiable.

These individually designed villas give new meaning to the concept of luxury living. Modern architecture and superb finishes combine with the exquisite use of light and space to create homes offering the very highest standards of comfort and accommodation. Located only minutes from the cosmopolitan centres of Marbella and Puerto Banús, they enjoy pride of place on one of the Costa del Sol´s finest golf courses whilst, at the same time, being a relaxing haven of peace and tranquility. Rarely are such extraordinary qualities found together in one development. Discover for yourself the charm and beauty of Atalaya Fairways. Discover luxury living at its very best. The ground floor comprises a large, entrance hall flooded with natural light. The kitchen has a south east aspect, enjoying natural light throughout the day, and magnificent views. The living-dining room is a central feature of the villa, and has been carefully designed to offer supreme comfort and luxury as well as the finest views the location can offer. The ground floor also offers two bedrooms with their individual en-suite bathrooms and a guest toilet. The ground floor is complemented by a porch and spacious terraces from which the pool is accessed. The first floor houses a further two or three bedrooms with their own complete bathrooms and dressing areas en-suite. The master bedroom suite has a dressing room and a large bathroom with exceptional views as well as ample terraces.

Here you will experience dazzling vistas from private terraces and secret gardens. Take pleasure in your own cinema, library, health spa, and game rooms. Escape to lavishly appointed suites. Irresistible temptation will entice you beyond Maona. To hike ancient trails and stroll secluded beaches. To discover world class golf, yachting, snow skiing (half the year) and horse racing. Enjoy museums, marvelous boutiques, splendid restaurants and glittering nightlife – all literally minutes away in the renowned coastal resort towns of Marbella and Fuengirola. Also to journey farther, into the charming Andalusian countryside, to explore historical Cordoba, Granada and Sevilla.
Cares will drift away. Splendor will envelop the senses. The outside world, forgotten. Such is the magic of Maona.
The villa has : 2 reception halls, 2 sitting rooms, 1 drawing room, bar, study, dining room, dedicated cinema, 1 family kitchen, 1 main kitchen, numerous storerooms, laundry room, indoor pool and spa, 2 turkish baths, 2 saunas, jacuzzi, hairdressing salon, 2 massage / treatment rooms, lift and service lift, butlers pantry, walk-in cold room, 10 well-appointed bedrooms each with en-suite bathroom and secluded individual terraces facing the ocean, 6 further guest bathrooms

Fantastic beachside villa located in Carib Playa within close walking distance to the beach and local shops.
Large 6 bedroom, 6 bathroom detached villa offering partial sea views from the upper level. Heated swimming pool, soft water system, temperature controlled wine cellar, gym and garage for 3 cars.
This is great value for a good location and property size.

A charming 3 bedroom townhouse at the lower part of Riviera del Sol with great access to all shops and local amenities. Only minutes away from the beach.
This house is situated on a quiet, well maintained and very friendly urbanisation with only 12 houses sharing a very large communal pool and garden area.
Property offers, 3 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 of which is newly renovated. Tastefully reformed kitchen, newly laid flooring throughout the groundfloor, large covered conservatory with removable patio doors. All windows have fitted mosquito screens for the summer months.
This has been a very well maintained family home. Perfect location for a holiday home!

Large family Andalucian style house located in the picturesque town of Alhaurin el Grande, 5 bed (possible expand to 6) and 2 bath. Only 30 minutes drive to the coastal town of Fuengirola or the same distance to Malaga airport.
This spacious town house occupies a corner position in a quiet area but only a 5 minute walk to shops and bars in the town centre. There are schools and bus service close by.
The entrance hall leads into the comfortable salon/lounge with beamed ceiling. The fully fitted kitchen is modern with gas and electric appliances and with good storage space. The separate dining room has plenty of room for family and guests. The hall then leads into two double bedrooms and one single bedroom at this level with bathrooms and toilet separate. Large built in wardrobes in the main bedroom. Air conditioning unit serves all rooms.
From this mid level there is another hall and stairs that lead to the lower area where a studio/ self contained living space has been created with own bathroom and toilet and adjacent is a large secure internal garage . The walls have been fully tiled as the previous owner had permission for a bakery so commercial use is still a possibility.
Going up to the top level of this property there is a further bedroom with large storage areas and then there is access to the south/ west facing terrace which covers approximately 42.00sq mts and has stunning views of the countryside and sierras.
The owner has installed double glazed windows throughout the house with new blinds/shutters. Grilles/bars are fitted at most windows and it is well decorated inside and out .
The property could very easily become a bed and breakfast family business and there is ample on street parking close by.
Viewing is strongly recommended to appreciate this beautiful Spanish home which we consider is well priced for this busy and popular town.
